h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^P5.0001^ea^ ^a^T5.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``avijjaa, bhikkhave, pubba"ngamaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa, anvadeva {anudeva (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ahirika.m anottappa.m ^a^V3.0002^ea^. avijjaagatassa, bhikkhave, aviddasuno micchaadi.t.thi pahoti; micchaadi.t.thissa micchaasa"nkappo pahoti; micchaasa"nkappassa micchaavaacaa pahoti; micchaavaacassa micchaakammanto pahoti; micchaakammantassa micchaaaajiivo pahoti; micchaaaajiivassa micchaavaayaamo pahoti; micchaavaayaamassa micchaasati pahoti; micchaasatissa micchaasamaadhi pahoti.

[03] ``vijjaa ^a^M3.0002^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, pubba"ngamaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa, anvadeva hirottappa.m. vijjaagatassa, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0002^ea^, viddasuno sammaadi.t.thi ^a^T5.0002^ea^ pahoti; sammaadi.t.thissa sammaasa"nkappo pahoti; sammaasa"nkappassa sammaavaacaa pahoti; sammaavaacassa sammaakammanto pahoti; sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivo pahoti; sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamo pahoti; sammaavaayaamassa sammaasati pahoti; sammaasatissa sammaasamaadhi pahotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakyesu viharati nagaraka.m naama {naagaraka.m naama (sii0), sakkara.m naama (syaa0 ka0)} sakyaana.m nigamo. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``upa.d.dhamida.m, bhante, brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti.

[03] ``maa heva.m, aananda, maa heva.m, aananda! sakalamevida.m, aananda, brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, aananda, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessati, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarissati.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idhaananda, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m; sammaasa"nkappa.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m ^a^T5.0003^ea^ ...pe0... sammaavaaca.m bhaaveti ^a^V3.0003^ea^ ...pe0... sammaakammanta.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaaaajiiva.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaavaayaama.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasati.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, aananda, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti.

[03] ``tadaminaapeta.m ^a^M3.0003^ea^ ^a^P5.0003^ea^, aananda, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa sakalamevida.m brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa. mama~nhi, aananda, kalyaa.namitta.m aagamma jaatidhammaa sattaa jaatiyaa parimuccanti; jaraadhammaa sattaa jaraaya parimuccanti; mara.nadhammaa sattaa mara.nena parimuccanti; sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa sattaa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimuccanti. iminaa kho eta.m, aananda, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa sakalamevida.m brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sakalamida.m, bhante, brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^T5.0004^ea^ saadhu, saariputta! sakalamida.m, saariputta, brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, saariputta, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa -- ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessati, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m ^a^V3.0004^ea^ bahuliikarissati. katha~nca, saariputta, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti?

[03] ``idha, saariputta, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m ^a^P5.0004^ea^ vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, saariputta, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti.

[03] ``tadaminaapeta.m, saariputta, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa sakalamida.m brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa. mama~nhi, saariputta, kalyaa.namitta.m aagamma jaatidhammaa sattaa jaatiyaa ^a^M3.0004^ea^ parimuccanti; jaraadhammaa sattaa jaraaya parimuccanti; mara.nadhammaa sattaa mara.nena parimuccanti; sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa sattaa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimuccanti. iminaa kho eta.m, saariputta, pariyaayena veditabba.m ^a^T5.0005^ea^ yathaa sakalamida.m brahmacariya.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m sabbasetena va.lavaabhirathena {va.labhiirathena (sii0)} saavatthiyaa niyyaayanta.m. setaa suda.m assaa yuttaa honti setaala"nkaaraa, seto ratho, setaparivaaro, setaa rasmiyo, setaa patodala.t.thi, seta.m chatta.m, seta.m u.nhiisa.m ^a^V3.0005^ea^, setaani vatthaani, setaa upaahanaa, setaaya suda.m vaalabiijaniyaa biijiiyati. tamena.m jano disvaa evamaaha -- ``brahma.m vata, bho, yaana.m! brahmayaanaruupa.m vata, bho''ti!!

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^P5.0005^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhante, jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m sabbasetena va.lavaabhirathena saavatthiyaa niyyaayanta.m. setaa suda.m assaa yuttaa honti setaala"nkaaraa, seto ratho, setaparivaaro, setaa rasmiyo, setaa patodala.t.thi, seta.m chatta.m, seta.m u.nhiisa.m, setaani vatthaani, setaa ^a^T5.0006^ea^ upaahanaa, setaaya suda.m vaalabiijaniyaa biijiiyati. tamena.m jano disvaa evamaaha -- `brahma.m vata, bho, yaana.m! brahmayaanaruupa.m vata, bho'ti!! sakkaa nu kho, bhante, imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmayaana.m pa~n~naapetu''nti?

[03] ``sakkaa ^a^M3.0005^ea^, aanandaa''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``imasseva kho eta.m, aananda, ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa adhivacana.m -- `brahmayaana.m' itipi, `dhammayaana.m' itipi, `anuttaro sa"ngaamavijayo' itipii''ti.

[03] ``sammaadi.t.thi, aananda, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa raagavinayapariyosaanaa hoti, dosavinayapariyosaanaa hoti, mohavinayapariyosaanaa hoti. sammaasa"nkappo, aananda, bhaavito bahuliikato raagavinayapariyosaano hoti, dosavinayapariyosaano hoti, mohavinayapariyosaano hoti. sammaavaacaa, aananda, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa raagavinayapariyosaanaa hoti, dosa...pe0... mohavinayapariyosaanaa hoti. sammaakammanto, aananda, bhaavito bahuliikato raagavinayapariyosaano hoti, dosa... mohavinayapariyosaano hoti. sammaaaajiivo, aananda, bhaavito bahuliikato raagavinayapariyosaano hoti, dosa... mohavinayapariyosaano hoti ^a^V3.0006^ea^. sammaavaayaamo, aananda, bhaavito bahuliikato raagavinayapariyosaano ^a^T5.0007^ea^ hoti, dosa... mohavinayapariyosaano hoti. sammaasati, aananda, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa raagavinayapariyosaanaa hoti, dosa... mohavinayapariyosaanaa hoti. sammaasamaadhi, aananda, bhaavito bahuliikato raagavinayapariyosaano ^a^P5.0006^ea^ hoti, dosa... mohavinayapariyosaano hoti.

[03] ``iminaa kho eta.m, aananda, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa imasseveta.m ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa adhivacana.m -- `brahmayaana.m' itipi, `dhammayaana.m' itipi, `anuttaro sa"ngaamavijayo' itipii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``yassa saddhaa ca pa~n~naa ca, dhammaa yuttaa sadaa dhura.m.
[22] hirii iisaa mano yotta.m, sati aarakkhasaarathi..
[21] ``ratho siilaparikkhaaro, jhaanakkho cakkaviiriyo.
[22] upekkhaa dhurasamaadhi, anicchaa parivaara.na.m..
[21] ``abyaapaado avihi.msaa, viveko yassa aavudha.m.
[22] titikkhaa cammasannaaho {vammasannaaho (sii0)}, yogakkhemaaya vattati..
[21] ``etadattani ^a^T5.0008^ea^ ^a^M3.0006^ea^ sambhuuta.m, brahmayaana.m anuttara.m.
[22] niyyanti dhiiraa lokamhaa, a~n~nadatthu jaya.m jaya''nti.. catuttha.m.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu...pe0... ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``idha no, bhante, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa amhe eva.m pucchanti -- `kimatthiya.m, aavuso, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa maya.m, bhante, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m ^a^V3.0007^ea^ paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakaroma -- `dukkhassa kho, aavuso, pari~n~nattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti. kacci maya.m, bhante, eva.m pu.t.thaa eva.m byaakaramaanaa vuttavaadino ceva bhagavato homa, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhaama, dhammassa caanudhamma.m ^a^P5.0007^ea^ byaakaroma, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti?

[03] ``taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m pu.t.thaa eva.m byaakaramaanaa vuttavaadino ceva me hotha, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhatha, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakarotha, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati. dukkhassa hi pari~n~nattha.m mayi brahmacariya.m vussati. sace vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `atthi panaavuso, maggo, atthi pa.tipadaa etassa dukkhassa ^a^T5.0009^ea^ pari~n~naayaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `atthi kho, aavuso, maggo, atthi pa.tipadaa etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naayaa'''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo, katamaa pa.tipadaa etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naayaati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo, aya.m pa.tipadaa etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naayaati. eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaathaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M3.0007^ea^. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```brahmacariya.m, brahmacariya'nti, bhante, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, bhante, brahmacariya.m, katama.m brahmacariyapariyosaana''nti?

[03] ``ayameva kho, bhikkhu, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo brahmacariya.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi ^a^V3.0008^ea^ ^a^P5.0008^ea^. yo kho, bhikkhu, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- ida.m brahmacariyapariyosaana''nti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m ^a^T5.0010^ea^ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```raagavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kissa nu kho eta.m, bhante, adhivacana.m -- `raagavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo'''ti? ``nibbaanadhaatuyaa kho eta.m, bhikkhu, adhivacana.m -- `raagavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo'ti. aasavaana.m khayo tena vuccatii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```amata.m, amata'nti, bhante, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, bhante, amata.m, katamo amatagaamimaggo''ti? ``yo kho, bhikkhu, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- ida.m vuccati amata.m. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo amatagaamimaggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ariya.m vo, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m desessaami vibhajissaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi? ya.m kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe ^a^M3.0008^ea^ ~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye ~naa.na.m ^a^V3.0009^ea^, dukkhanirodhe ^a^P5.0009^ea^ ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo? yo kho, bhikkhave, nekkhammasa"nkappo ^a^T5.0011^ea^, abyaapaadasa"nkappo, avihi.msaasa"nkappo -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa? yaa kho, bhikkhave, musaavaadaa verama.nii, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto? yaa kho, bhikkhave, paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, abrahmacariyaa verama.nii -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako micchaaaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaaaajiivena jiivita.m kappeti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaayaamo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati -- aya.m ^a^T5.0012^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaavaayaamo.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaasati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; citte cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano ^a^P5.0010^ea^ satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati ^a^V3.0010^ea^ aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaasati.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M3.0009^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaasamaadhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaasamaadhii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0013^ea^. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saalisuuka.m vaa yavasuuka.m vaa micchaapa.nihita.m hatthena vaa paadena vaa akkanta.m hattha.m vaa paada.m vaa bhindissati {bhecchati (ka0)}, lohita.m vaa uppaadessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? micchaapa.nihitattaa, bhikkhave, suukassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu micchaapa.nihitaaya di.t.thiyaa micchaapa.nihitaaya maggabhaavanaaya avijja.m bhindissati, vijja.m uppaadessati, nibbaana.m sacchikarissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? micchaapa.nihitattaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thiyaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saalisuuka.m vaa yavasuuka.m vaa sammaapa.nihita.m hatthena vaa paadena vaa akkanta.m hattha.m vaa paada.m vaa bhindissati, lohita.m vaa uppaadessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? sammaapa.nihitattaa, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0011^ea^, suukassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu sammaapa.nihitaaya di.t.thiyaa sammaapa.nihitaaya maggabhaavanaaya avijja.m ^a^V3.0011^ea^ bhindissati, vijja.m uppaadessati, nibbaana.m sacchikarissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? sammaapa.nihitattaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thiyaa.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaapa.nihitaaya di.t.thiyaa sammaapa.nihitaaya maggabhaavanaaya avijja.m bhindati, vijja.m uppaadeti, nibbaana.m sacchikarotiiti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m ^a^M3.0010^ea^ vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m ^a^T5.0014^ea^ bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaapa.nihitaaya di.t.thiyaa sammaapa.nihitaaya maggabhaavanaaya avijja.m bhindati, vijja.m uppaadeti, nibbaana.m sacchikarotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho nandiyo paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho nandiyo paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho, bho gotama, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa nibbaana"ngamaa honti nibbaanaparaayanaa nibbaanapariyosaanaa''ti?

[01] ``a.t.thime kho, nandiya, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa nibbaana"ngamaa honti nibbaanaparaayanaa nibbaanapariyosaanaa. katame a.t.tha? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ime kho, nandiya, a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa nibbaana"ngamaa honti nibbaanaparaayanaa nibbaanapariyosaanaa''ti. eva.m vutte nandiyo paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m ^a^V3.0012^ea^, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama ^a^P5.0012^ea^ ^a^T5.0015^ea^ ...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. dasama.m.
[06] avijjaavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] avijja~nca upa.d.dha~nca, saariputto ca braahma.no.
[22] kimatthiyo ca dve bhikkhuu, vibha"ngo suukanandiyaati..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0016^ea^. ``icchaamaha.m, bhikkhave, a.d.dhamaasa.m pa.tisalliyitu.m. namhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakenaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti ^a^M3.0011^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa naassudha koci bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamati, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakena.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tassa a.d.dhamaasassa accayena pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yena svaaha.m, bhikkhave, vihaarena pa.thamaabhisambuddho viharaami, tassa padesena vihaasi.m. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `micchaadi.t.thipaccayaapi vedayita.m; sammaadi.t.thipaccayaapi vedayita.m...pe0... ^a^V3.0013^ea^ micchaasamaadhipaccayaapi vedayita.m; sammaasamaadhipaccayaapi vedayita.m; chandapaccayaapi vedayita.m; vitakkapaccayaapi vedayita.m; sa~n~naapaccayaapi vedayita.m; chando ca avuupasanto hoti, vitakko ca avuupasanto hoti, sa~n~naa ca avuupasantaa hoti, tappaccayaapi vedayita.m; chando ^a^P5.0013^ea^ ca vuupasanto hoti, vitakko ca vuupasanto hoti, sa~n~naa ca vuupasantaa hoti, tappaccayaapi vedayita.m; appattassa pattiyaa atthi aayaama.m {vaayaama.m (sii0 syaa0)}, tasmimpi .thaane anuppatte tappaccayaapi vedayita'''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``icchaamaha.m, bhikkhave, temaasa.m pa.tisalliyitu.m. namhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakenaa''ti ^a^T5.0017^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa naassudha koci bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamati, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakena.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tassa temaasassa accayena pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yena svaaha.m, bhikkhave, vihaarena pa.thamaabhisambuddho viharaami, tassa padesena vihaasi.m. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `micchaadi.t.thipaccayaapi vedayita.m; micchaadi.t.thivuupasamapaccayaapi vedayita.m; sammaadi.t.thipaccayaapi vedayita.m; sammaadi.t.thivuupasamapaccayaapi vedayita.m...pe0... ^a^V3.0014^ea^ micchaasamaadhipaccayaapi vedayita.m; micchaasamaadhivuupasamapaccayaapi vedayita.m, sammaasamaadhipaccayaapi vedayita.m; sammaasamaadhivuupasamapaccayaapi vedayita.m; chandapaccayaapi vedayita.m; chandavuupasamapaccayaapi vedayita.m; vitakkapaccayaapi vedayita.m; vitakkavuupasamapaccayaapi vedayita.m; sa~n~naapaccayaapi vedayita.m; sa~n~naavuupasamapaccayaapi vedayita.m; chando ca avuupasanto hoti, vitakko ca avuupasanto hoti, sa~n~naa ca avuupasantaa hoti, tappaccayaapi vedayita.m; chando ^a^P5.0014^ea^ ca vuupasanto hoti ^a^M3.0012^ea^, vitakko ca vuupasanto hoti, sa~n~naa ca vuupasantaa hoti, tappaccayaapi vedayita.m; appattassa pattiyaa atthi aayaama.m {vaayaama.m (sii0 syaa0)}, tasmimpi .thaane anuppatte tappaccayaapi vedayita'''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^T5.0018^ea^ -- ```sekkho, sekkho'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sekkho hotii''ti?
[03] ``idha, bhikkhu, sekkhaaya sammaadi.t.thiyaa samannaagato hoti...pe0... sekkhena sammaasamaadhinaa samannaagato hoti. ettaavataa kho, bhikkhu, sekkho hotii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa. katame a.t.tha? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0015^ea^. ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa. katame a.t.tha? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi ^a^P5.0015^ea^. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa ana"nga.naa vigatuupakkilesaa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa. katame a.t.tha? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa ^a^M3.0013^ea^ ana"nga.naa vigatuupakkilesaa ^a^T5.0019^ea^ anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa ana"nga.naa vigatuupakkilesaa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa. katame a.t.tha? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha dhammaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa ana"nga.naa vigatuupakkilesaa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca aanando aayasmaa ca bhaddo paa.taliputte viharanti kukku.taaraame. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddo saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m ^a^V3.0016^ea^ katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa bhaddo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ```abrahmacariya.m, abrahmacariya'nti, aavuso aananda, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, abrahmacariya''nti? ``saadhu ^a^P5.0016^ea^ saadhu, aavuso bhadda! bhaddako kho te, aavuso bhadda, umma"ngo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, aavuso bhadda, pucchasi -- `abrahmacariya.m, abrahmacariyanti, aavuso aananda, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, abrahmacariya'''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``ayameva kho ^a^T5.0020^ea^, aavuso, a.t.tha"ngiko micchaamaggo abrahmacariya.m, seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thi...pe0... micchaasamaadhii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ paa.taliputtanidaana.m. ```brahmacariya.m, brahmacariya'nti, aavuso aananda, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, brahmacariya.m, katama.m brahmacariyapariyosaana''nti? ``saadhu saadhu, aavuso bhadda! bhaddako kho te, aavuso bhadda, umma"ngo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, aavuso bhadda, pucchasi -- `brahmacariya.m, brahmacariyanti, aavuso aananda, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso ^a^M3.0014^ea^, brahmacariya.m, katama.m brahmacariyapariyosaana'''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo brahmacariya.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. yo kho, aavuso, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- ida.m brahmacariyapariyosaana''nti. navama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ paa.taliputtanidaana.m. ```brahmacariya.m, brahmacariya'nti, aavuso aananda, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, brahmacariya.m, katamo brahmacaarii, katama.m brahmacariyapariyosaana''nti? ``saadhu ^a^P5.0017^ea^ saadhu, aavuso bhadda! bhaddako kho te, aavuso bhadda, umma"ngo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, aavuso bhadda, pucchasi -- `brahmacariya.m, brahmacariyanti, aavuso ^a^V3.0017^ea^ aananda, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, brahmacariya.m, katamo brahmacaarii, katama.m brahmacariyapariyosaana'''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko ^a^T5.0021^ea^ maggo brahmacariya.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. yo kho, aavuso, iminaa ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena maggena samannaagato -- aya.m vuccati brahmacaarii. yo kho, aavuso, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- ida.m brahmacariyapariyosaana''nti. dasama.m.
[06] tii.ni suttantaani ekanidaanaani.vihaaravaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve vihaaraa ca sekkho ca, uppaadaa apare duve.
[22] parisuddhena dve vuttaa, kukku.taaraamena tayoti..

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0022^ea^. ``micchatta~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, sammatta~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca ^a^P5.0018^ea^, bhikkhave, micchatta.m? seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thi...pe0... micchaasamaadhi ^a^M3.0015^ea^. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, micchatta.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, sammatta.m? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammatta''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``akusale ca kho, bhikkhave, dhamme desessaami, kusale ca dhamme. ta.m su.naatha. katame ca, bhikkhave, akusalaa dhammaa? seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thi...pe0... micchaasamaadhi. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, akusalaa dhammaa. katame ca, bhikkhave, kusalaa dhammaa ^a^V3.0018^ea^? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, kusalaa dhammaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``micchaapa.tipada~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, sammaapa.tipada~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipadaa? seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thi...pe0... micchaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipadaa. katamaa ^a^T5.0023^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipadaa? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipadaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``gihino vaaha.m, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vaa micchaapa.tipada.m na va.n.nemi. gihi vaa, bhikkhave, pabbajito vaa micchaapa.tipanno micchaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu ^a^P5.0019^ea^ naaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m''.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipadaa? seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thi...pe0... micchaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipadaa. gihino vaaha.m, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vaa micchaapa.tipada.m na va.n.nemi. gihi vaa, bhikkhave, pabbajito vaa micchaapa.tipanno micchaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu naaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``gihino vaaha.m, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vaa sammaapa.tipada.m va.n.nemi. gihi vaa, bhikkhave, pabbajito vaa sammaapa.tipanno sammaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipadaa? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipadaa. gihino vaaha.m, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vaa sammaapa.tipada.m va.n.nemi. gihi vaa, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0016^ea^, pabbajito vaa sammaapa.tipanno sammaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0019^ea^. ``asappurisa~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, sappurisa~nca ^a^T5.0024^ea^. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappuriso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaadi.t.thiko hoti, micchaasa"nkappo, micchaavaaco, micchaakammanto, micchaaaajiivo, micchaavaayaamo, micchaasati, micchaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, asappuriso''.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sappuriso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaadi.t.thiko hoti, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaaco, sammaakammanto ^a^P5.0020^ea^, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sappuriso''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``asappurisa~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, asappurisena asappurisatara~nca. sappurisa~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami sappurisena sappurisatara~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappuriso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaadi.t.thiko hoti...pe0... micchaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, asappuriso''.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisena asappurisataro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaadi.t.thiko hoti...pe0... micchaasamaadhi, micchaa~naa.nii, micchaavimutti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, asappurisena asappurisataro.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sappuriso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaadi.t.thiko ^a^T5.0025^ea^ hoti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sappuriso.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sappurisena sappurisataro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaadi.t.thiko hoti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi, sammaa~naa.nii, sammaavimutti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sappurisena sappurisataro''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M3.0017^ea^ ^a^V3.0020^ea^. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kumbho anaadhaaro suppavattiyo hoti, saadhaaro duppavattiyo hoti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, citta.m anaadhaara.m suppavattiya.m hoti, saadhaara.m duppavattiya.m hoti. ko ^a^P5.0021^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, cittassa aadhaaro? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m cittassa aadhaaro. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kumbho anaadhaaro suppavattiyo hoti, saadhaaro duppavattiyo hoti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, citta.m anaadhaara.m suppavattiya.m hoti, saadhaara.m duppavattiya.m hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``ariya.m vo, bhikkhave, sammaasamaadhi.m desessaami saupanisa.m saparikkhaara.m. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo sammaasamaadhi saupaniso saparikkhaaro? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasati {sammaasamaadhi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. yaa ^a^T5.0026^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, imehi sattaha"ngehi cittassa ekaggataa saparikkhaarataa {saparikkhataa (sii0 pii0)} -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo sammaasamaadhi saupaniso itipi saparikkhaaro itipii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi ^a^P5.0022^ea^. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0021^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa uttiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa uttiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko ^a^M3.0018^ea^ udapaadi -- `pa~nca kaamagu.naa vuttaa bhagavataa. katame nu kho pa~nca kaamagu.naa vuttaa bhagavataa'''ti? ``saadhu saadhu, uttiya! pa~ncime kho, uttiya, kaamagu.naa vuttaa mayaa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa ^a^T5.0027^ea^ pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, uttiya, pa~nca kaamagu.naa vuttaa mayaa. imesa.m kho, uttiya, pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m pahaanaaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. imesa.m kho, uttiya, pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m pahaanaaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. dasama.m.
[06] micchattavaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] micchatta.m akusala.m dhamma.m, duve pa.tipadaapi ca.
[22] asappurisena dve kumbho, samaadhi vedanuttiyenaati..

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0028^ea^ ^a^P5.0023^ea^. ``micchaapa.tipatti~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, sammaapa.tipatti~nca ^a^V3.0022^ea^. ta.m su.naatha. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipatti? seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thi...pe0... micchaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipatti. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipatti? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipattii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``micchaapa.tipanna~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, sammaapa.tipanna~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipanno? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaadi.t.thiko hoti...pe0... micchaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0019^ea^, micchaapa.tipanno. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipanno? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaadi.t.thiko hoti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaapa.tipanno''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo viraddho, viraddho tesa.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo aaraddho, aaraddho tesa.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. katamo ^a^P5.0024^ea^ ^a^T5.0029^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo viraddho, viraddho tesa.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo aaraddho, aaraddho tesa.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya ^a^V3.0023^ea^ sa.mvattanti. katame a.t.tha? seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ime kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``appakaa te manussesu, ye janaa paaragaamino.
[22] athaaya.m itaraa pajaa, tiiramevaanudhaavati..
[21] ``ye ca kho sammadakkhaate, dhamme dhammaanuvattino.
[22] te janaa paaramessanti, maccudheyya.m suduttara.m..
[21] ``ka.nha.m dhamma.m vippahaaya, sukka.m bhaavetha pa.n.dito.
[22] okaa anokamaagamma, viveke yattha duurama.m..
[21] ``tatraabhiratimiccheyya, hitvaa kaame aki~ncano.

[21] ``yesa.m ^a^M3.0020^ea^ ^a^T5.0030^ea^ sambodhiya"ngesu, sammaa citta.m subhaavita.m.
[27] aadaanapa.tinissagge, anupaadaaya ye rataa.
[22] khii.naasavaa jutimanto, te loke parinibbutaa''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P5.0025^ea^. ``saama~n~na~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, saama~n~naphalaani ca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca, bhikkhave, saama~n~na.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saama~n~na.m. katamaani ca, bhikkhave, saama~n~naphalaani? sotaapattiphala.m, sakadaagaamiphala.m, anaagaamiphala.m, arahattaphala.m -- imaani vuccanti, bhikkhave, saama~n~naphalaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0024^ea^. ``saama~n~na~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, saama~n~nattha~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca kho, bhikkhave, saama~n~na.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saama~n~na.m. katamo ca, bhikkhave, saama~n~nattho? yo kho, bhikkhave, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saama~n~nattho''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``brahma~n~na~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, brahma~n~naphalaani ca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca kho, bhikkhave, brahma~n~na.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, brahma~n~na.m. katamaani ca, bhikkhave, brahma~n~naphalaani ^a^T5.0031^ea^? sotaapattiphala.m ^a^P5.0026^ea^, sakadaagaamiphala.m, anaagaamiphala.m, arahattaphala.m -- imaani vuccanti, bhikkhave, brahma~n~naphalaanii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``brahma~n~na~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, brahma~n~nattha~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca, bhikkhave, brahma~n~na.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, brahma~n~na.m. katamo ^a^M3.0021^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, brahma~n~nattho? yo kho, bhikkhave, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, brahma~n~nattho''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``brahmacariya~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, brahmacariyaphalaani ca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m ^a^V3.0025^ea^ -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m. katamaani ^a^T5.0032^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaphalaani? sotaapattiphala.m, sakadaagaamiphala.m, anaagaamiphala.m, arahattaphala.m -- imaani vuccanti, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaphalaanii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``brahmacariya~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, brahmacariyattha~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katama~nca, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m. katamo ^a^P5.0027^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, brahmacariyattho? yo kho, bhikkhave, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, brahmacariyattho''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0033^ea^. ``sace vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `kimatthiya.m, aavuso, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti, eva.m ^a^M3.0022^ea^ pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `raagaviraagattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti. sace pana vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa ^a^V3.0026^ea^ eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `atthi panaavuso, maggo, atthi pa.tipadaa raagaviraagaayaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `atthi kho, aavuso, maggo, atthi pa.tipadaa raagaviraagaayaa'ti. katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo, katamaa ca pa.tipadaa raagaviraagaaya ^a^P5.0028^ea^? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo, aya.m pa.tipadaa raagaviraagaayaati. eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaathaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 42-47^b^.^eb^ ``sace vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `kimatthiya.m, aavuso, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m ^a^T5.0034^ea^ paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `sa.myojanappahaanattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti...pe0... `anusayasamugghaatanattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti...pe0... `addhaanapari~n~nattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti...pe0... `aasavaana.m khayattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti...pe0... `vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti...pe0... `~naa.nadassanattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti...pe0.... sattama.m.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``sace ^a^P5.0029^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `kimatthiya.m, aavuso, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `anupaadaaparinibbaanattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti. sace pana vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `atthi panaavuso, maggo, atthi pa.tipadaa anupaadaaparinibbaanaayaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m ^a^T5.0035^ea^ paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha ^a^M3.0023^ea^ -- `atthi kho, aavuso, maggo, atthi pa.tipadaa anupaadaaparinibbaanaayaa'ti ^a^V3.0027^ea^. katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo, katamaa ca pa.tipadaa anupaadaaparinibbaanaaya? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo, aya.m pa.tipadaa anupaadaaparinibbaanaayaati. eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaathaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0036^ea^. ``suuriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- aru.nugga.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0030^ea^, bhikkhuno ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa uppaadaaya eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessati, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarissati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... ^a^V3.0028^ea^ sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 50-54^b^.^eb^ ``suuriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- aru.nugga.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa uppaadaaya ^a^M3.0024^ea^ eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- siilasampadaa. siilasampannasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m... yadida.m ^a^T5.0037^ea^ -- chandasampadaa... yadida.m -- attasampadaa... yadida.m -- di.t.thisampadaa... yadida.m -- appamaadasampadaa.... cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T5.0065^ea^, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici ja"ngalaana.m paa.naana.m padajaataani, sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti; hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- mahantattena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te appamaadamuulakaa appamaadasamosara.naa; appamaado tesa.m dhammaana.m aggamakkhaayati. appamattasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessati ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarissati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appamatto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appamatto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0052^ea^, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa yaa kaaci gopaanasiyo sabbaa taa kuu.ta"ngamaa kuu.taninnaa kuu.tasamosara.naa; kuu.ta.m taasa.m aggamakkhaayati ^a^M3.0041^ea^; evameva kho, bhikkhave...pe0... tatiya.m.
[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0044^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci muulagandhaa, kaa.laanusaariya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave...pe0... catuttha.m.
[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T5.0066^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci saaragandhaa, lohitacandana.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave...pe0... ^a^V3.0053^ea^ pa~ncama.m.
[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci pupphagandhaa, vassika.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave...pe0... cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci ku.t.taraajaano, sabbe te ra~n~no cakkavattissa anuyantaa bhavanti, raajaa tesa.m cakkavatti aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave...pe0... sattama.m.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0054^ea^, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci taarakaruupaana.m pabhaa, sabbaa taa candimappabhaaya {candimaapabhaaya (syaa0 ka0)} kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m, candappabhaa taasa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave...pe0... a.t.thama.m.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve aadicco nabha.m abbhussakkamaano sabba.m aakaasagata.m tamagata.m abhivihacca bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave...pe0... navama.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0045^ea^, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici tantaavutaana.m vatthaana.m, kaasikavattha.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te appamaadamuulakaa appamaadasamosara.naa; appamaado tesa.m dhammaana.m aggamakkhaayati. appamattasseta.m, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0055^ea^, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessati ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarissati. katha~nca ^a^T5.0067^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appamatto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appamatto ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti. dasama.m.
