[03] 149^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0068^ea^. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya ^a^P5.0046^ea^ evamete balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti.
[03] (paraga"ngaapeyyaaliiva.n.niyato paripu.n.nasuttanti vitthaaramaggii).

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0056^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya evamete balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti. katha~nca ^a^T5.0069^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti raagavinayapariyosaana.m dosavinayapariyosaana.m mohavinayapariyosaana.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti raagavinayapariyosaana.m dosavinayapariyosaana.m mohavinayapariyosaana.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0043^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya evamete balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti amatogadha.m amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti amatogadha.m amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0057^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci balakara.niiyaa kammantaa ^a^T5.0070^ea^ kariiyanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya evamete balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti nibbaananinna.m nibbaanapo.na.m nibbaanapabbhaara.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti nibbaananinna.m nibbaanapo.na.m nibbaanapabbhaara.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye kecime biijagaamabhuutagaamaa vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya evamete biijagaamabhuutagaamaa vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m paapu.naati dhammesu. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto vu.d.dhi.m ^a^M3.0044^ea^ viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m paapu.naati dhammesu? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0071^ea^, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m ^a^P5.0047^ea^ vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m paapu.naati dhammesuu''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0058^ea^, bhikkhave, himavanta.m pabbataraaja.m nissaaya naagaa kaaya.m va.d.dhenti, bala.m gaahenti; te tattha kaaya.m va.d.dhetvaa bala.m gaahetvaa kusobbhe otaranti, kusobbhe {kussubbhe (sii0 syaa0), kusubbhe (pii0 ka0)} otaritvaa mahaasobbhe otaranti, mahaasobbhe otaritvaa kunnadiyo otaranti, kunnadiyo otaritvaa mahaanadiyo otaranti, mahaanadiyo otaritvaa mahaasamudda.m {mahaasamuddasaagara.m (sabbattha) sa.m0 ni0 2.23} otaranti, te tattha mahantatta.m vepullatta.m aapajjanti kaayena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesu. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesu? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m ^a^T5.0072^ea^ nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesuu''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho paaciinaninno paaciinapo.no paaciinapabbhaaro. so muulacchinno {muulacchinde kate (syaa0)} katamena papateyyaa''ti? ``yena ^a^P5.0048^ea^, bhante, ninno yena po.no yena pabbhaaro''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno ^a^M3.0045^ea^ hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0059^ea^, bhikkhave, kumbho nikkujjo vamateva udaka.m, no paccaavamati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto vamateva ^a^T5.0073^ea^ paapake akusale dhamme, no paccaavamati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto vamateva paapake akusale dhamme, no paccaavamati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto vamateva paapake akusale dhamme, no paccaavamatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saalisuuka.m vaa yavasuuka.m vaa sammaapa.nihita.m hatthena vaa paadena vaa akkanta.m hattha.m vaa paada.m vaa bhindissati lohita.m vaa uppaadessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? sammaapa.nihitattaa, bhikkhave, suukassa. evameva ^a^P5.0049^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaapa.nihitaaya di.t.thiyaa sammaapa.nihitaaya maggabhaavanaaya avijja.m bhindissati, vijja.m uppaadessati, nibbaana.m sacchikarissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? sammaapa.nihitattaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thiyaa. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaapa.nihitaaya di.t.thiyaa sammaapa.nihitaaya maggabhaavanaaya avijja.m bhindati, vijja.m uppaadeti, nibbaana.m sacchikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... ^a^T5.0074^ea^ sammaasamaadhi.m ^a^M3.0046^ea^ bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaapa.nihitaaya di.t.thiyaa sammaapa.nihitaaya maggabhaavanaaya avijja.m bhindati, vijja.m uppaadeti, nibbaana.m sacchikarotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0060^ea^, bhikkhave, aakaase vividhaa vaataa vaayanti -- puratthimaapi vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaapi vaataa vaayanti, uttaraapi vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naapi vaataa vaayanti, sarajaapi vaataa vaayanti, arajaapi vaataa vaayanti, siitaapi vaataa vaayanti, u.nhaapi vaataa vaayanti, parittaapi vaataa vaayanti, adhimattaapi vaataa vaayanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayato ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroto cattaaropi satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi sammappadhaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi iddhipaadaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncapi indriyaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncapi balaani bhaavanaaparipuuri.m gacchanti, sattapi bojjha"ngaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayato ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroto cattaaropi satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi sammappadhaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi iddhipaadaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncapi indriyaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m ^a^T5.0075^ea^ gacchanti, pa~ncapi balaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, sattapi bojjha"ngaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m ^a^P5.0050^ea^ bhaavayato ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroto cattaaropi satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi sammappadhaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaropi iddhipaadaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncapi indriyaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, pa~ncapi balaani bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, sattapi bojjha"ngaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gimhaana.m pacchime maase uuhata.m rajojalla.m, tamena.m mahaaakaalamegho .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasameti; evameva ^a^M3.0047^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasameti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ^a^V3.0061^ea^ ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasameti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m ^a^T5.0076^ea^ nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasametii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uppanna.m mahaamegha.m, tamena.m mahaavaato antaraayeva antaradhaapeti vuupasameti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme antaraayeva antaradhaapeti vuupasameti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme antaraayeva antaradhaapeti vuupasameti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m ^a^P5.0051^ea^ vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme antaraayeva antaradhaapeti vuupasametii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saamuddikaaya naavaaya vettabandhanabandhaaya cha maasaani udake pariyaadaaya {pariyaataaya (ka0), pariyaahataaya (?)} hemantikena thala.m ukkhittaaya vaataatapaparetaani bandhanaani taani paavussakena meghena abhippavu.t.thaani ^a^T5.0077^ea^ appakasireneva pa.tippassambhanti, puutikaani bhavanti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayato ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroto appakasireneva sa.myojanaani pa.tippassambhanti, puutikaani bhavanti ^a^M3.0048^ea^. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayato ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroto appakasireneva sa.myojanaani pa.tippassambhanti, puutikaani bhavanti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m ^a^V3.0062^ea^ bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavayato ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroto appakasireneva sa.myojanaani pa.tippassambhanti, puutikaani bhavantii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aagantukaagaara.m. tattha puratthimaayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, pacchimaayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, uttaraayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, dakkhi.naayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, khattiyaapi aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, braahma.naapi ^a^P5.0052^ea^ aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, vessaapi aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, suddaapi aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa parijaanaati ^a^T5.0078^ea^, ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa pahaatabbaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa pajahati, ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa sacchikaatabbaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa sacchikaroti, ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa bhaaveti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa? pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaatissa vacaniiya.m. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho...pe0... vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa. katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pahaatabbaa? avijjaa ca bhavata.nhaa ca -- ime, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pahaatabbaa. katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa sacchikaatabbaa? vijjaa ca vimutti ca -- ime, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa sacchikaatabbaa. katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa? samatho ca vipassanaa ca -- ime, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto, ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa te dhamme abhi~n~naa parijaanaati...pe0... ye ^a^M3.0049^ea^ dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa bhaaveti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m ^a^V3.0063^ea^ nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T5.0079^ea^ ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa parijaanaati, ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa pahaatabbaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa pajahati, ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa sacchikaatabbaa, te dhamme ^a^P5.0053^ea^ abhi~n~naa sacchikaroti, ye dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, te dhamme abhi~n~naa bhaavetii''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ga"ngaa nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa. atha mahaajanakaayo aagaccheyya kuddaala-pi.taka.m aadaaya -- `maya.m ima.m ga"nga.m nadi.m pacchaaninna.m karissaama pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara'nti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so mahaajanakaayo ga"nga.m nadi.m pacchaaninna.m kareyya pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``ga"ngaa, bhante, nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa. saa na sukaraa pacchaaninna.m kaatu.m pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara.m. yaavadeva pana so mahaajanakaayo kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaventa.m ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronta.m raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa ~naatisaalohitaa vaa bhogehi abhiha.t.thu.m pavaareyyu.m -- `ehambho purisa, ki.m te ime kaasaavaa anudahanti, ki.m mu.n.do kapaalamanusa.mcarasi! ehi, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu, pu~n~naani ca karohii'ti. so ^a^T5.0080^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavento ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaronto sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, citta.m diigharatta.m vivekaninna.m vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara.m ta.m vata hiinaayaavattissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idha ^a^P5.0054^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... ^a^V3.0064^ea^ sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^M3.0050^ea^ ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarotii''ti. (yadapi balakara.niiya.m, tadapi vitthaaretabba.m.) dvaadasama.m.
[06] balakara.niiyavaggo cha.t.tho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] bala.m biija~nca naago ca, rukkho kumbhena suukiyaa.
[22] aakaasena ca dve meghaa, naavaa aagantukaa nadiiti..

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0081^ea^. ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, esanaa. katamaa tisso? kaamesanaa, bhavesanaa, brahmacariyesanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti.

[03] ``tisso imaa kho, bhikkhave, esanaa. katamaa tisso? kaamesanaa, bhavesanaa, brahmacariyesanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... ^a^V3.0065^ea^ sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti raagavinayapariyosaana.m dosavinayapariyosaana.m mohavinayapariyosaana.m. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti.

[03] ``tisso ^a^T5.0082^ea^ imaa kho, bhikkhave, esanaa. katamaa tisso? kaamesanaa, bhavesanaa, brahmacariyesanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanaa. imaasa.m kho ^a^M3.0051^ea^, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti amatogadha.m amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti.

[03] ``tisso imaa kho, bhikkhave, esanaa. katamaa tisso? kaamesanaa, bhavesanaa, brahmacariyesanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... ^a^V3.0066^ea^ sammaasamaadhi.m ^a^P5.0055^ea^ bhaaveti nibbaananinna.m nibbaanapo.na.m nibbaanapabbhaara.m. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m abhi~n~naaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti.

[03] ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, esanaa. katamaa tisso? kaamesanaa, bhavesanaa, brahmacariyesanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso ^a^T5.0083^ea^ esanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m pari~n~naaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. (yadapi abhi~n~naa, tadapi pari~n~naaya vitthaaretabba.m.)

[03] ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, esanaa. katamaa tisso? kaamesanaa, bhavesanaa, brahmacariyesanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m parikkhayaaya...pe0... ^a^V3.0067^ea^ aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. (yadapi abhi~n~naa, tadapi parikkhayaaya vitthaaretabba.m.)

[03] ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, esanaa. katamaa tisso? kaamesanaa, bhavesanaa, brahmacariyesanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m pahaanaaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m esanaana.m pahaanaaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo ^a^T5.0084^ea^ bhaavetabbo''ti. (yadapi abhi~n~naa, tadapi pahaanaaya vitthaaretabba.m.) pa.thama.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^M3.0052^ea^ ^a^P5.0056^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, vidhaa. katamaa tisso? `seyyohamasmii'ti vidhaa, `sadisohamasmii'ti vidhaa, `hiinohamasmii'ti vidhaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vidhaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m vidhaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... ^a^V3.0068^ea^ sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave tissanna.m vidhaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. (yathaa esanaa, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). dutiya.m.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, aasavaa. katame tayo? kaamaasavo, bhavaasavo, avijjaasavo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo aasavaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m aasavaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, bhavaa. katame tayo? kaamabhavo ^a^T5.0085^ea^, ruupabhavo, aruupabhavo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhavaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m bhavaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... ^a^V3.0069^ea^ aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, dukkhataa. katamaa tisso? dukkhadukkhataa, sa"nkhaaradukkhataa, vipari.naamadukkhataa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso dukkhataa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m dukkhataana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^V3.0070^ea^ ^a^P5.0057^ea^, bhikkhave, khilaa. katame tayo? raago khilo, doso khilo, moho khilo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo khilaa. imesa.m ^a^M3.0053^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m khilaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, malaani. katamaani tii.ni? raago mala.m, doso mala.m, moho mala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni malaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m malaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya ^a^T5.0086^ea^ parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... ^a^V3.0071^ea^ aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, niighaa. katame tayo? raago niigho, doso niigho, moho niigho -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo niighaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m niighaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m vedanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... ^a^V3.0072^ea^ aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^P5.0058^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa. katamaa tisso? kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso ta.nhaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m ta.nhaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0087^ea^, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m ta.nhaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^M3.0054^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, tasinaa. katamaa tisso? kaamatasinaa, bhavatasinaa, vibhavatasinaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m tasinaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... ^a^V3.0073^ea^ raagavinayapariyosaana.m dosavinayapariyosaana.m mohavinayapariyosaana.m...pe0... amatogadha.m amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m...pe0... ^a^V3.0074^ea^ nibbaananinna.m nibbaanapo.na.m nibbaanapabbhaara.m. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m tasinaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] esanaavaggo sattamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] esanaa vidhaa aasavo, bhavo ca dukkhataa khilaa.
[22] mala.m niigho ca vedanaa, dve ta.nhaa tasinaaya caati..

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0088^ea^ ^a^V3.0075^ea^. ``cattaarome ^a^P5.0059^ea^, bhikkhave, oghaa. katame cattaaro? kaamogho, bhavogho, di.t.thogho, avijjogho -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro oghaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m oghaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. (yathaa esanaa, eva.m sabba.m vitthaaretabba.m.) pa.thama.m.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, yogaa. katame cattaaro? kaamayogo, bhavayogo, di.t.thiyogo avijjaayogo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro yogaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m yogaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... ^a^V3.0076^ea^ aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^M3.0055^ea^, bhikkhave, upaadaanaani. katamaani cattaari? kaamupaadaana.m, di.t.thupaadaana.m, siilabbatupaadaana.m, attavaadupaadaana.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari upaadaanaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m upaadaanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^T5.0089^ea^, bhikkhave, ganthaa. katame cattaaro? abhijjhaa kaayagantho, byaapaado kaayagantho, siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho, ida.msaccaabhiniveso kaayagantho -- ime ^a^P5.0060^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro ganthaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m ganthaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, anusayaa. katame satta? kaamaraagaanusayo, pa.tighaanusayo, di.t.thaanusayo ^a^V3.0077^ea^, vicikicchaanusayo, maanaanusayo, bhavaraagaanusayo, avijjaanusayo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, sattaanusayaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, sattanna.m anusayaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa...pe0... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. imesa.m ^a^T5.0090^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^M3.0056^ea^, bhikkhave, niivara.naani. katamaani pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m, byaapaadaniivara.na.m, thinamiddhaniivara.na.m, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca niivara.naani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m niivara.naana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, upaadaanakkhandhaa. katame pa~nca? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho ^a^V3.0078^ea^, vedanupaadaanakkhandho ^a^P5.0061^ea^, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. katamaani pa~nca? sakkaayadi.t.thi, vicikicchaa, siilabbataparaamaaso, kaamacchando, byaapaado -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncorambhaagiyaani ^a^T5.0091^ea^ sa.myojanaani. imesa.m kho bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya...pe0... aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, uddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruuparaago, aruuparaago, maano, uddhacca.m, avijjaa -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncuddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m uddhambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m uddhambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya ^a^M3.0057^ea^ parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti.

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, uddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruuparaago, aruuparaago, maano, uddhacca.m, avijjaa -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncuddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. imesa.m ^a^T5.0092^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m uddhambhaagiyaana.m ^a^P5.0062^ea^ sa.myojanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo. katamo ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko ^a^V3.0079^ea^ maggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti raagavinayapariyosaana.m dosavinayapariyosaana.m mohavinayapariyosaana.m... amatogadha.m amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m... nibbaananinna.m nibbaanapo.na.m nibbaanapabbhaara.m. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m uddhambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya aya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavetabbo''ti. dasama.m.
[06] oghavaggo a.t.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] ogho yogo upaadaana.m, gantha.m anusayena ca.
[22] kaamagu.naa niivara.na.m, khandhaa oruddhambhaagiyaati..
[01] vagguddaana.m --
[21] avijjaavaggo pa.thamo, dutiya.m vihaara.m vuccati.
[22] micchatta.m tatiyo vaggo, catuttha.m pa.tipanneneva..
[21] titthiya.m ^a^V3.0080^ea^ pa~ncamo vaggo, cha.t.tho suuriyena ca.
[22] bahukate sattamo vaggo, uppaado a.t.thamena ca..
[21] divasavaggo navamo, dasamo appamaadena ca.
[27] ekaadasabalavaggo, dvaadasa esanaa paa.liya.m.
[22] oghavaggo bhavati terasaati..
[06] maggasa.myutta.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0081^ea^ ^a^M3.0058^ea^ ^a^P5.0063^ea^. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, himavanta.m ^a^T5.0093^ea^ pabbataraajaana.m nissaaya naagaa kaaya.m va.d.dhenti, bala.m gaahenti; te tattha kaaya.m va.d.dhetvaa bala.m gaahetvaa kusobbhe otaranti, kusobbhe otaritvaa mahaasobbhe otaranti, mahaasobbhe otaritvaa kunnadiyo otaranti, kunnadiyo otaritvaa mahaanadiyo otaranti, mahaanadiyo otaritvaa mahaasamuddasaagara.m otaranti; te tattha mahantatta.m vepullatta.m aapajjanti kaayena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesu. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesuuti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m; dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m ^a^P5.0064^ea^ bhaaveti...pe0... viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m ^a^T5.0094^ea^ bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesuu''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0082^ea^. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aya.m kaayo aahaara.t.thitiko, aahaara.m pa.ticca ti.t.thati, anaahaaro no ti.t.thati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca niivara.naa aahaara.t.thitikaa, aahaara.m pa.ticca ti.t.thanti, anaahaaraa no ti.t.thanti.

[03] ``ko ^a^M3.0059^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimitta.m. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa byaapaadassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa byaapaadassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, pa.tighanimitta.m. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa byaapaadassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa byaapaadassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi ^a^T5.0095^ea^, bhikkhave, arati tandi vijambhitaa bhattasammado cetaso ca liinatta.m. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro ^a^P5.0065^ea^ -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso avuupasamo. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya uppaadaaya, uppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, vicikicchaa.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro ^a^V3.0083^ea^ -- ayamaahaaro anuppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya uppaadaaya, uppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aya.m kaayo aahaara.t.thitiko, aahaara.m pa.ticca ti.t.thati, anaahaaro no ti.t.thati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ime pa~nca niivara.naa aahaara.t.thitikaa, aahaara.m pa.ticca ti.t.thanti, anaahaaraa no ti.t.thanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0060^ea^, bhikkhave, aya.m kaayo aahaara.t.thitiko, aahaara.m pa.ticca ^a^T5.0096^ea^ ti.t.thati, anaahaaro no ti.t.thati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa aahaara.t.thitikaa, aahaara.m pa.ticca ti.t.thanti, anaahaaraa no ti.t.thanti.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, satisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[01] ``ko ^a^P5.0066^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, kusalaakusalaa dhammaa, saavajjaanavajjaa dhammaa, hiinapa.niitaa dhammaa, ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagaa dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, aarambhadhaatu {aarabbhadhaatu (syaa0 ka0)} nikkamadhaatu parakkamadhaatu. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa ^a^T5.0097^ea^ vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ^a^V3.0084^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, piitisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0061^ea^, kaayapassaddhi, cittapassaddhi. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, samathanimitta.m {samaadhinimitta.m (syaa0)} abyagganimitta.m. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ^a^T5.0098^ea^ ^a^P5.0067^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aya.m kaayo aahaara.t.thitiko, aahaara.m pa.ticca ti.t.thati, anaahaaro no ti.t.thati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjha"ngaa aahaara.t.thitikaa, aahaara.m pa.ticca ti.t.thanti, anaahaaraa no ti.t.thantii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ``ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu siilasampannaa samaadhisampannaa ~naa.nasampannaa vimuttisampannaa ^a^V3.0085^ea^ vimutti~naa.nadassanasampannaa, dassanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m bahukaara.m {bahuupakaara.m (syaa0)} vadaami; savanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m bahukaara.m vadaami; upasa"nkamanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m bahukaara.m vadaami; payirupaasanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m bahukaara.m vadaami; anussatimpaaha.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m bahukaara.m vadaami; anupabbajjampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m bahukaara.m vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaaruupaana.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m sutvaa dvayena vuupakaasena vuupaka.t.tho {dvayena vuupaka.t.tho (sii0 syaa0)} viharati -- kaayavuupakaasena ca cittavuupakaasena ca. so tathaa vuupaka.t.tho viharanto ta.m dhamma.m anussarati anuvitakketi.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^T5.0099^ea^ ^a^M3.0062^ea^ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaa vuupaka.t.tho viharanto ta.m dhamma.m anussarati anuvitakketi, satisambojjha"ngo ^a^P5.0068^ea^ tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti; satisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti; satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. so tathaa sato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaa sato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti; dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti; dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. tassa ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicarato pariviima.msamaapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicarato pariviima.msamaapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m, viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti; viiriyasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti; viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti niraamisaa.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti ^a^T5.0100^ea^ niraamisaa, piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti; piitisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti; piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^V3.0086^ea^ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati cittampi passambhati, passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti; passaddhisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti; passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m ^a^P5.0069^ea^ gacchati. passaddhakaayassa sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno passaddhakaayassa sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati, samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti ^a^M3.0063^ea^; samaadhisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti; samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. so tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti; upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti; upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, sattasu sambojjha"ngesu eva.m bahuliikatesu satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame satta phalaa ^a^T5.0101^ea^ sattaanisa.msaa? di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, atha mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, atha pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, atha pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce pa~ncanna.m ^a^P5.0070^ea^ orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, atha pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m ^a^V3.0087^ea^ sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, atha ^a^T5.0102^ea^ pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti ^a^M3.0064^ea^, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, no ce pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, atha pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii. eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, sattasu bojjha"ngesu eva.m bahuliikatesu ime satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, bhikkhavo''ti! ``aavuso''ti ^a^P5.0071^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``sattime, aavuso, bojjha"ngaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo, piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, aavuso, satta bojjha"ngaa. imesa.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m yena yena bojjha"ngena ^a^T5.0103^ea^ aaka"nkhaami pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, tena tena bojjha"ngena pubba.nhasamaya.m viharaami; yena yena bojjha"ngena aaka"nkhaami majjhanhika.m samaya.m viharitu.m, tena tena bojjha"ngena majjhanhika.m samaya.m viharaami; yena yena bojjha"ngena aaka"nkhaami saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, tena tena bojjha"ngena saayanhasamaya.m viharaami. satisambojjha"ngo iti ce me, aavuso, hoti, `appamaa.no'ti me hoti, `susamaaraddho'ti me hoti, ti.t.thanta~nca na.m `ti.t.thatii'ti pajaanaami. sacepi me cavati, `idappaccayaa me cavatii'ti pajaanaami...pe0... ^a^V3.0088^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo iti ce me, aavuso, hoti, `appamaa.no'ti me hoti, `susamaaraddho'ti me hoti, ti.t.thanta~nca na.m `ti.t.thatii'ti pajaanaami. sacepi me cavati, `idappaccayaa me cavatii'ti pajaanaami.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, ra~n~no vaa raajamahaamattassa vaa naanaarattaana.m dussaana.m dussakara.n.dako puuro assa. so ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya ^a^M3.0065^ea^ pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya majjhanhika.m samaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m majjhanhika.m samaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya saayanhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m saayanhasamaya.m paarupeyya. evameva ^a^P5.0072^ea^ khvaaha.m, aavuso, imesa.m sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m yena yena bojjha"ngena aaka"nkhaami pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, tena tena bojjha"ngena pubba.nhasamaya.m viharaami; ^a^T5.0104^ea^ yena yena bojjha"ngena aaka"nkhaami majjhanhika.m samaya.m viharitu.m, tena tena bojjha"ngena majjhanhika.m samaya.m viharaami; yena yena bojjha"ngena aaka"nkhaami saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, tena tena bojjha"ngena saayanhasamaya.m viharaami. satisambojjha"ngo iti ce me, aavuso, hoti, `appamaa.no'ti me hoti, `susamaaraddho'ti me hoti, ti.t.thanta~nca na.m `ti.t.thatii'ti pajaanaami. sacepi me cavati, `idappaccayaa me cavatii'ti pajaanaami...pe0... ^a^V3.0089^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo iti ce me, aavuso, hoti, `appamaa.no'ti me hoti, `susamaaraddho'ti me hoti, ti.t.thanta~nca na.m `ti.t.thatii'ti pajaanaami. sacepi me cavati, `idappaccayaa me cavatii'ti pajaanaamii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```bojjha"ngaa, bojjha"ngaa'ti, bhante, vuccanti. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, `bojjha"ngaa'ti vuccantii''ti? ``bodhaaya sa.mvattantiiti kho, bhikkhu, tasmaa `bojjha"ngaa'ti vuccanti. idha, bhikkhu, satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. tassime satta bojjha"nge bhaavayato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati ^a^T5.0105^ea^, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. bodhaaya sa.mvattantiiti, bhikkhu, tasmaa `bojjha"ngaa'ti vuccantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0090^ea^ ^a^M3.0066^ea^ ^a^P5.0073^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saakete viharati a~njanavane migadaaye. atha kho ku.n.daliyo paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ku.n.daliyo paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ahamasmi, bho gotama, aaraamanissayii {aaraamanisaadii (sii0), aaraamaniyaadii (syaa0)} parisaavacaro. tassa mayha.m, bho gotama, pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraasassa ayamaacaaro {ayamaahaaro (syaa0 ka0)} hoti -- aaraamena aaraama.m uyyaanena uyyaana.m anuca"nkamaami anuvicaraami. so tattha passaami eke sama.nabraahma.ne itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msa~nceva katha.m kathente upaarambhaanisa.msa~nca -- `bhava.m pana gotamo kimaanisa.mso viharatii'''ti? ``vijjaavimuttiphalaanisa.mso kho, ku.n.daliya, tathaagato viharatii''ti.

[03] ``katame pana, bho gotama, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurentii''ti? ``satta kho, ku.n.daliya, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurentii''ti. ``katame pana, bho gotama, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurentii''ti? ``cattaaro kho, ku.n.daliya, satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurentii''ti ^a^T5.0106^ea^. ``katame pana, bho gotama, dhammaa bhaavitaa, bahuliikataa cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuurentii''ti? ``tii.ni kho, ku.n.daliya, sucaritaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuurentii''ti. ``katame pana, bho gotama, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa tii.ni sucaritaani paripuurentii''ti? ``indriyasa.mvaro ^a^P5.0074^ea^ kho, ku.n.daliya, bhaavito bahuliikato tii.ni sucaritaani paripuuretii''ti.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavito ca, ku.n.daliya, indriyasa.mvaro katha.m bahuliikato tii.ni sucaritaani paripuuretiiti? idha, ku.n.daliya, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa manaapa.m naabhijjhati naabhiha.msati, na raaga.m janeti. tassa .thito ca kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m. cakkhunaa kho paneva ruupa.m disvaa amanaapa.m na ma"nku hoti appati.t.thitacitto adiinamaanaso abyaapannacetaso. tassa .thito ca kaayo hoti .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0067^ea^ capara.m, ku.n.daliya, bhikkhu sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ^a^V3.0091^ea^ ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya manaapa.m naabhijjhati naabhiha.msati, na raaga.m janeti. tassa .thito ca kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m. manasaa kho paneva dhamma.m vi~n~naaya amanaapa.m na ma"nku hoti appati.t.thitacitto adiinamaanaso abyaapannacetaso. tassa .thito ca kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m.

[03] ``yato kho, ku.n.daliya, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa manaapaamanaapesu ruupesu ^a^T5.0107^ea^ .thito ca kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya manaapaamanaapesu dhammesu .thito ca kaayo hoti, .thita.m citta.m ajjhatta.m susa.n.thita.m suvimutta.m ^a^P5.0075^ea^. eva.m bhaavito kho, ku.n.daliya, indriyasa.mvaro eva.m bahuliikato tii.ni sucaritaani paripuureti.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavitaani ca, ku.n.daliya, tii.ni sucaritaani katha.m bahuliikataani cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuurenti? idha, ku.n.daliya, bhikkhu kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaaveti, vaciiduccarita.m ^a^V3.0092^ea^ pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaaveti, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaaveti. eva.m bhaavitaani kho, ku.n.daliya, tii.ni sucaritaani eva.m bahuliikataani cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuurenti.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, ku.n.daliya, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa katha.m bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti? idha, ku.n.daliya, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, ku.n.daliya, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa eva.m bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^T5.0108^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, ku.n.daliya, satta bojjha"ngaa katha.m bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurenti? idha, ku.n.daliya, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m ^a^M3.0068^ea^ bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, ku.n.daliya, satta bojjha"ngaa eva.m bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurentii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte ku.n.daliyo paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0093^ea^, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa yaa kaaci gopaanasiyo, sabbaa taa kuu.taninnaa kuu.tapo.naa kuu.tapabbhaaraa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^P5.0076^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro ^a^T5.0109^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca upavaano aayasmaa ca saariputto kosambiya.m viharanti ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa upavaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa upavaanena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m upavaana.m etadavoca --

[03] ``jaaneyya ^a^M3.0069^ea^ nu kho, aavuso upavaana, bhikkhu `paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa eva.m susamaaraddhaa me satta bojjha"ngaa phaasuvihaaraaya sa.mvattantii'''ti? ``jaaneyya kho, aavuso saariputta ^a^V3.0094^ea^, bhikkhu `paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa eva.m susamaaraddhaa me satta bojjha"ngaa phaasuvihaaraaya sa.mvattantii'''ti.

[03] ``satisambojjha"nga.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu aarabbhamaano pajaanaati `citta~nca me suvimutta.m, thinamiddha~nca me susamuuhata.m, uddhaccakukkucca~nca me suppa.tiviniita.m, aaraddha~nca me viiriya.m, a.t.thi.mkatvaa manasi karomi, no ^a^T5.0110^ea^ ca liina'nti...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m aavuso, bhikkhu aarabbhamaano pajaanaati `citta~nca ^a^P5.0077^ea^ me suvimutta.m, thinamiddha~nca me susamuuhata.m, uddhaccakukkucca~nca me suppa.tiviniita.m, aaraddha~nca me viiriya.m, a.t.thi.mkatvaa manasi karomi, no ca liina'nti. eva.m kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu jaaneyya `paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa eva.m susamaaraddhaa me satta bojjha"ngaa phaasuvihaaraaya sa.mvattantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... ^a^V3.0095^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa anuppannaa uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] pabbatavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] himavanta.m ^a^T5.0111^ea^ kaaya.m siila.m, vattha.m bhikkhu ca ku.n.dali.
[22] kuu.ta~nca upavaana~nca, uppannaa apare duveti..

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0070^ea^ ^a^P5.0078^ea^ ^a^T5.0112^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci paa.naa cattaaro iriyaapathe kappenti -- kaalena gamana.m, kaalena .thaana.m, kaalena nisajja.m, kaalena seyya.m, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya evamete cattaaro iriyaapathe kappenti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V3.0096^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ ``suuriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- aru.nugga.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m uppaadaaya eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- satta bojjha"nge bhaavessati, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarissati.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^T5.0113^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^P5.0079^ea^ kalyaa.namitto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ``suuriyassa ^a^M3.0071^ea^, bhikkhave, udayato eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- aru.nugga.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m uppaadaaya eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m ^a^V3.0097^ea^ pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- yonisomanasikaaro. yonisomanasikaarasampannasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- satta bojjha"nge bhaavessati, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarissati.

[01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikaarasampanno satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikaarasampanno satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaakassapo pippaliguhaaya.m {vipphaliguhaaya.m (sii0)} viharati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha ^a^T5.0114^ea^ kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kacci te, kassapa, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na ^a^P5.0080^ea^ me, bhante, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] ``sattime, kassapa, bojjha"ngaa mayaa sammadakkhaataa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo kho, kassapa, mayaa sammadakkhaato bhaavito bahuliikato abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... ^a^V3.0098^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo kho, kassapa, mayaa sammadakkhaato bhaavito bahuliikato abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya ^a^M3.0072^ea^ nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, kassapa, satta bojjha"ngaa mayaa sammadakkhaataa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. ``taggha, bhagavaa, bojjha"ngaa; taggha, sugata, bojjha"ngaa''ti.

[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandi. vu.t.thahi caayasmaa mahaakassapo tamhaa aabaadhaa. tathaapahiino caayasmato mahaakassapassa so aabaadho ahosiiti. catuttha.m.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0115^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano gijjhakuu.te pabbate viharati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kacci te, moggallaana, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] ``sattime, moggallaana, bojjha"ngaa mayaa sammadakkhaataa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo kho, moggallaana, mayaa sammadakkhaato bhaavito bahuliikato abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... ^a^V3.0099^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo kho, moggallaana, mayaa sammadakkhaato bhaavito bahuliikato abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, moggallaana, satta bojjha"ngaa mayaa sammadakkhaataa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. ``taggha ^a^T5.0116^ea^, bhagavaa, bojjha"ngaa; taggha, sugata, bojjha"ngaa''ti.

[03] idamavoca ^a^M3.0073^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandi. vu.t.thahi caayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tamhaa aabaadhaa. tathaapahiino caayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa so aabaadho ahosiiti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P5.0081^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho aayasmaa mahaacundo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mahaacunda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhantu ta.m, cunda, bojjha"ngaa''ti.

[03] ``sattime, bhante, bojjha"ngaa bhagavataa sammadakkhaataa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo kho, bhante, bhagavataa sammadakkhaato bhaavito bahuliikato abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... ^a^V3.0100^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo kho, bhante, bhagavataa sammadakkhaato bhaavito bahuliikato abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhante, satta bojjha"ngaa bhagavataa sammadakkhaataa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. ``taggha ^a^T5.0117^ea^, cunda, bojjha"ngaa; taggha, cunda, bojjha"ngaa''ti.
[03] idamavocaayasmaa cundo. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. vu.t.thahi ca bhagavaa tamhaa aabaadhaa. tathaapahiino ca bhagavato so aabaadho ahosiiti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ ``yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa viraddhaa, viraddho tesa.m ^a^T5.0118^ea^ ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa aaraddhaa, aaraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjha"ngaa viraddhaa, viraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjha"ngaa aaraddhaa, aaraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ariyaa niyyaanikaa niiyanti takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ariyaa niyyaanikaa niiyanti takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^M3.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ^a^V3.0102^ea^ ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dasama.m.
