[03] ```bojjha"ngaa, bojjha"ngaa'ti, bhante, vuccanti. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, `bojjha"ngaa'ti vuccantii''ti? ```bodhaaya sa.mvattantii'ti kho, bhikkhu, tasmaa bojjha"ngaati vuccanti. idha, bhikkhu, satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. `bodhaaya sa.mvattantii'ti kho, bhikkhu, tasmaa `bojjha"ngaa'ti vuccantii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``satta ^a^V3.0103^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, bojjha"nge desessaami; ta.m su.naatha. katame ca, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``kaamaraaga.t.thaaniyaana.m ^a^M3.0076^ea^ ^a^P5.0084^ea^, {kaamaraaga.t.thaaniiyaana.m (sii0)} bhikkhave, dhammaana.m manasikaarabahuliikaaraa anuppanno ceva kaamacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kaamacchando bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati. byaapaada.t.thaaniyaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m manasikaarabahuliikaaraa anuppanno ceva byaapaado uppajjati, uppanno ca byaapaado bhiyyobhaavaaya ^a^T5.0121^ea^ vepullaaya sa.mvattati. thinamiddha.t.thaaniyaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m manasikaarabahuliikaaraa anuppanna~nceva thinamiddha.m uppajjati, uppanna~nca thinamiddha.m bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.m sa.mvattati. uddhaccakukkucca.t.thaaniyaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m manasikaarabahuliikaaraa anuppanna~nceva uddhaccakukkucca.m uppajjati, uppanna~nca uddhaccakukkucca.m bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati. vicikicchaa.t.thaaniyaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m manasikaarabahuliikaaraa anuppannaa ceva vicikicchaa uppajjati, uppannaa ca vicikicchaa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``satisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniyaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m manasikaarabahuliikaaraa anuppanno ceva satisambojjha"ngo uppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjha"ngo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati...pe0... ^a^V3.0104^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"nga.t.thaaniyaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m manasikaarabahuliikaaraa anuppanno ceva upekkhaasambojjha"ngo uppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhaasambojjha"ngo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ``ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva kaamacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kaamacchando bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppanno ^a^P5.0085^ea^ ceva byaapaado uppajjati, uppanno ca byaapaado bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppanna~nceva ^a^T5.0122^ea^ thinamiddha.m uppajjati, uppanna~nca thinamiddha.m bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppanna~nceva uddhaccakukkucca.m uppajjati, uppanna~nca uddhaccakukkucca.m bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppannaa ceva vicikicchaa uppajjati, uppannaa ca vicikicchaa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppanno ceva satisambojjha"ngo nuppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjha"ngo nirujjhati...pe0... anuppanno ceva upekkhaasambojjha"ngo nuppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhaasambojjha"ngo nirujjhati.

[03] yoniso ^a^M3.0077^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva kaamacchando nuppajjati, uppanno ca kaamacchando pahiiyati; anuppanno ceva byaapaado nuppajjati, uppanno ca byaapaado pahiiyati; anuppanna~nceva thinamiddha.m nuppajjati, uppanna~nca thinamiddha.m pahiiyati; anuppanna~nceva uddhaccakukkucca.m ^a^V3.0105^ea^ nuppajjati, uppanna~nca uddhaccakukkucca.m pahiiyati; anuppannaa ceva vicikicchaa nuppajjati, uppannaa ca vicikicchaa pahiiyati.

[03] ``anuppanno ceva satisambojjha"ngo uppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjha"ngo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati...pe0... anuppanno ceva upekkhaasambojjha"ngo uppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhaasambojjha"ngo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ``satta ^a^T5.0123^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, aparihaaniye dhamme desessaami; ta.m su.naatha. katame ^a^P5.0086^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihaaniyaa dhammaa? yadida.m -- satta bojjha"ngaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta aparihaaniyaa dhammaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ``yo, bhikkhave, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa ta.nhakkhayaaya sa.mvattati, ta.m magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m bhaavetha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katamaa ca pa.tipadaa ta.nhakkhayaaya sa.mvattati? yadida.m -- satta bojjha"ngaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''ti. eva.m vutte aayasmaa udaayii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m bhaavitaa nu kho, bhante, satta bojjha"ngaa, katha.m bahuliikataa ta.nhakkhayaaya sa.mvattantii''ti?

[03] ``idha ^a^V3.0106^ea^, udaayi, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m vipula.m mahaggata.m appamaa.na.m abyaapajja.m {abyaapajjha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. tassa satisambojjha"nga.m bhaavayato vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m vipula.m mahaggata.m appamaa.na.m abyaapajja.m ta.nhaa pahiiyati. ta.nhaaya pahaanaa kamma.m pahiiyati. kammassa pahaanaa dukkha.m pahiiyati...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m ^a^M3.0078^ea^ nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m vipula.m mahaggata.m appamaa.na.m abyaapajja.m. tassa upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaavayato vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m vipula.m mahaggata.m appamaa.na.m abyaapajja.m ta.nhaa pahiiyati ^a^P5.0087^ea^ ta.nhaaya pahaanaa kamma.m pahiiyati ^a^V3.0107^ea^. kammassa pahaanaa dukkha.m pahiiyati. iti kho, udaayi, ta.nhakkhayaa kammakkhayo, kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^T5.0124^ea^, bhikkhave, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa ta.nhaanirodhaaya sa.mvattati, ta.m magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m bhaavetha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katamaa ca pa.tipadaa ta.nhaanirodhaaya sa.mvattati? yadida.m -- satta bojjha"ngaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. katha.m bhaavitaa, ca bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa katha.m bahuliikataa ta.nhaanirodhaaya sa.mvattanti?

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa eva.m bahuliikataa ta.nhaanirodhaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ``nibbedhabhaagiya.m vo, bhikkhave, magga.m desessaami; ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, nibbedhabhaagiyo maggo? yadida.m -- satta bojjha"ngaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''ti. eva.m vutte aayasmaa udaayii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m bhaavitaa nu kho, bhante, satta bojjha"ngaa katha.m bahuliikataa nibbedhaaya sa.mvattantii''ti?

[03] ``idha, udaayi, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m vipula.m mahaggata.m appamaa.na.m ^a^P5.0088^ea^ abyaapajja.m. so satisambojjha"nga.m bhaavitena cittena anibbiddhapubba.m appadaalitapubba.m lobhakkhandha.m nibbijjhati padaaleti ^a^V3.0108^ea^; anibbiddhapubba.m appadaalitapubba.m ^a^T5.0125^ea^ dosakkhandha.m nibbijjhati padaaleti; anibbiddhapubba.m appadaalitapubba.m mohakkhandha.m nibbijjhati padaaleti...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m ^a^M3.0079^ea^ vossaggapari.naami.m vipula.m mahaggata.m appamaa.na.m abyaapajja.m. so upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaavitena cittena anibbiddhapubba.m appadaalitapubba.m lobhakkhandha.m nibbijjhati padaaleti; anibbiddhapubba.m appadaalitapubba.m dosakkhandha.m nibbijjhati padaaleti; anibbiddhapubba.m appadaalitapubba.m mohakkhandha.m nibbijjhati padaaleti. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, udaayi, satta bojjha"ngaa eva.m bahuliikataa nibbedhaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``naaha.m ^a^V3.0109^ea^, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekadhammampi samanupassaami, yo eva.m bhaavito bahuliikato sa.myojaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya sa.mvattati, yathayida.m, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa katha.m bahuliikataa sa.myojaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya sa.mvattanti?

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa eva.m bahuliikataa sa.myojaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``katame ^a^T5.0126^ea^ ^a^P5.0089^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniiyaa dhammaa? cakkhu, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniiyo dhammo. etthete uppajjanti sa.myojanavinibandhaa ajjhosaanaa...pe0... jivhaa sa.myojaniiyaa dhammaa. etthete uppajjanti sa.myojanavinibandhaa ajjhosaanaa...pe0... mano sa.myojaniiyo dhammo. etthete uppajjanti sa.myojanavinibandhaa ajjhosaanaa. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniiyaa dhammaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sumbhesu viharati setaka.m naama sumbhaana.m nigamo. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa udaayii bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava bahukata~nca me, bhante, bhagavati pema~nca gaaravo ^a^V3.0110^ea^ ca hirii ca ottappa~nca. aha~nhi, bhante, pubbe agaarikabhuuto samaano ^a^M3.0080^ea^ abahukato ahosi.m dhammena {dhamme (?)} abahukato sa"nghena. so khvaaha.m bhagavati pema~nca gaarava~nca hiri~nca ottappa~nca sampassamaano agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. tassa me bhagavaa dhamma.m desesi -- `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa...pe0... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti.

[03] ``so khvaaha.m, bhante, su~n~naagaaragato imesa.m pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaana.m ^a^T5.0127^ea^ ukkujjaavakujja.m samparivattento `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti ^a^P5.0090^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. dhammo ca me, bhante, abhisamito, maggo ca me pa.tiladdho; yo me bhaavito bahuliikato tathaa tathaa viharanta.m tathattaaya upanessati yathaaha.m -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanissaami.

[03] ``satisambojjha"ngo me, bhante, pa.tiladdho, yo me bhaavito bahuliikato tathaa tathaa viharanta.m tathattaaya upanessati yathaaha.m -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanissaami...pe0... ^a^V3.0111^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo me, bhante, pa.tiladdho, yo me bhaavito bahuliikato tathaa tathaa viharanta.m tathattaaya upanessati yathaaha.m -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanissaami. aya.m kho me, bhante, maggo pa.tiladdho, yo me bhaavito bahuliikato tathaa tathaa viharanta.m tathattaaya upanessati yathaaha.m -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanissaamii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, udaayi! eso hi te, udaayi, maggo pa.tiladdho, yo te bhaavito bahuliikato tathaa tathaa viharanta.m tathattaaya upanessati yathaa tva.m -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m ^a^T5.0128^ea^ kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanissasii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] udaayivaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] bodhaaya ^a^M3.0081^ea^ desanaa .thaanaa, ayoniso caaparihaanii.
[22] khayo nirodho nibbedho, ekadhammo udaayinaati..

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^T5.0129^ea^ ^a^P5.0091^ea^ keci, bhikkhave, dhammaa kusalaa kusalabhaagiyaa kusalapakkhikaa, sabbe te appamaadamuulakaa appamaadasamosara.naa; appamaado tesa.m dhammaana.m aggamakkhaayati. appamattasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- satta bojjha"nge bhaavessati, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarissati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appamatto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti ^a^V3.0112^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appamatto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ ``ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammaa kusalaa kusalabhaagiyaa kusalapakkhikaa, sabbe te yonisomanasikaaramuulakaa yonisomanasikaarasamosara.naa; yonisomanasikaaro tesa.m dhammaana.m aggamakkhaayati. yonisomanasikaarasampannasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- satta bojjha"nge bhaavessati, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarissati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikaarasampanno satta bojjha"nge ^a^T5.0130^ea^ bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0082^ea^, bhikkhu yonisomanasikaarasampanno satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P5.0092^ea^, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya. katame pa~nca? ayo, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya. loha.m, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m...pe0... tipu, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkileso...pe0... ^a^V3.0113^ea^ siisa.m, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkileso...pe0... sajjhu, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya. ime ^a^T5.0131^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca jaataruupassa upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime cittassa upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m citta.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya. katame pa~nca? kaamacchando, bhikkhave, cittassa upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.tha.m citta.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya...pe0... ime ^a^P5.0093^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca cittassa upekkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m citta.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaayaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^V3.0114^ea^, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anupakkilesaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattanti ^a^T5.0132^ea^. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, anaavara.no aniivara.no ^a^M3.0083^ea^ cetaso anupakkileso bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, anaavara.no aniivara.no cetaso anupakkileso bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anupakkilesaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva kaamacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kaamacchando bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppanno ceva byaapaado uppajjati, uppanno ca byaapaado bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppanna~nceva thinamiddha.m uppajjati, uppanna~nca thinamiddha.m bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppanna~nceva uddhaccakukkucca.m uppajjati, uppanna~nca uddhaccakukkucca.m bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati; anuppannaa ^a^P5.0094^ea^ ceva vicikicchaa uppajjati, uppannaa ca vicikicchaa ^a^T5.0133^ea^ bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``yoniso ^a^V3.0115^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppanno ceva satisambojjha"ngo uppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjha"ngo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati...pe0... anuppanno ceva upekkhaasambojjha"ngo uppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhaasambojjha"ngo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa buddhiyaa aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa buddhiyaa aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso upakkilesaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchando, bhikkhave, aavara.no niivara.no ^a^M3.0084^ea^ cetaso upakkileso pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.no. byaapaado, bhikkhave, aavara.no niivara.no cetaso upakkileso pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.no. thinamiddha.m, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m niivara.na.m cetaso upakkilesa.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. uddhaccakukkucca.m ^a^P5.0095^ea^, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m niivara.na.m cetaso upakkilesa.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. vicikicchaa, bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso upakkilesaa ^a^V3.0116^ea^ pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso upakkilesaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa.

[03] ``sattime ^a^T5.0134^ea^, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anupakkilesaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, anaavara.no aniivara.no cetaso anupakkileso bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, anaavara.no aniivara.no cetaso anupakkileso bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anupakkilesaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattantiiti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabba.m cetaso samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati, imassa pa~nca niivara.naa tasmi.m samaye na honti. satta bojjha"ngaa tasmi.m samaye bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti.

[03] ``katame pa~nca niivara.naa tasmi.m samaye na honti? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m tasmi.m samaye na hoti, byaapaadaniivara.na.m tasmi.m samaye na hoti, thinamiddhaniivara.na.m tasmi.m samaye na hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m tasmi.m samaye na hoti, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m tasmi.m samaye na hoti. imassa pa~nca niivara.naa tasmi.m samaye na honti.

[03] ``katame satta bojjha"ngaa tasmi.m samaye bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti ^a^T5.0135^ea^? satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati...pe0... ^a^V3.0117^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. ime satta bojjha"ngaa tasmi.m samaye bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti. yasmi.m ^a^P5.0096^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabba.m cetaso samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto ^a^M3.0085^ea^ dhamma.m su.naati, imassa pa~nca niivara.naa tasmi.m samaye na honti. ime satta bojjha"ngaa tasmi.m samaye bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bhikkhave, mahaarukkhaa a.nubiijaa mahaakaayaa rukkhaana.m ajjhaaruhaa, yehi rukkhaa ajjhaaruu.lhaa obhaggavibhaggaa vipatitaa senti. katame ca te, bhikkhave, mahaarukkhaa a.nubiijaa mahaakaayaa rukkhaana.m ajjhaaruhaa, yehi rukkhaa ajjhaaruu.lhaa obhaggavibhaggaa vipatitaa senti {senti. seyyathida.m (katthaci)}? assattho, nigrodho, pilakkho, udumbaro, kacchako, kapitthano -- ime kho te, bhikkhave, mahaarukkhaa a.nubiijaa mahaakaayaa rukkhaana.m ajjhaaruhaa, yehi rukkhaa ajjhaaruu.lhaa obhaggavibhaggaa vipatitaa senti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto yaadisake kaame ohaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so taadisakehi kaamehi tato vaa paapi.t.thatarehi obhaggavibhaggo vipatito seti.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya ^a^T5.0136^ea^ dubbaliikara.naa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchando, bhikkhave, aavara.no niivara.no cetaso ajjhaaruho pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.no. byaapaado, bhikkhave, aavara.no niivara.no cetaso ajjhaaruho pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.no. thinamiddha.m, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m niivara.na.m cetaso ajjhaaruha.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. uddhaccakukkucca.m, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m niivara.na.m cetaso ajjhaaruha.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. vicikicchaa, bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa. ime kho, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0097^ea^, pa~nca aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa.

[03] ``sattime ^a^V3.0118^ea^, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anajjhaaruhaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, anaavara.no aniivara.no cetaso anajjhaaruho bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, anaavara.no ^a^M3.0086^ea^ aniivara.no cetaso anajjhaaruho bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anajjhaaruhaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, niivara.naa andhakara.naa acakkhukara.naa a~n~naa.nakara.naa pa~n~naanirodhikaa vighaatapakkhiyaa anibbaanasa.mvattanikaa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m, bhikkhave, andhakara.na.m acakkhukara.na.m a~n~naa.nakara.na.m pa~n~naanirodhika.m vighaatapakkhiya.m anibbaanasa.mvattanika.m ^a^T5.0137^ea^. byaapaadaniivara.na.m, bhikkhave...pe0... thinamiddhaniivara.na.m, bhikkhave... uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, bhikkhave... vicikicchaaniivara.na.m, bhikkhave, andhakara.na.m acakkhukara.na.m a~n~naa.nakara.na.m pa~n~naanirodhika.m vighaatapakkhiya.m anibbaanasa.mvattanika.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca niivara.naa andhakara.naa acakkhukara.naa a~n~naa.nakara.naa pa~n~naanirodhikaa vighaatapakkhiyaa anibbaanasa.mvattanikaa.

[03] ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa cakkhukara.naa ~naa.nakara.naa pa~n~naabuddhiyaa avighaatapakkhiyaa nibbaanasa.mvattanikaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, cakkhukara.no ~naa.nakara.no pa~n~naabuddhiyo avighaatapakkhiyo nibbaanasa.mvattaniko...pe0... ^a^V3.0119^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo, bhikkhave, cakkhukara.no ~naa.nakara.no pa~n~naabuddhiyo avighaatapakkhiyo nibbaanasa.mvattaniko. ime kho, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0098^ea^, satta bojjha"ngaa cakkhukara.naa ~naa.nakara.naa pa~n~naabuddhiyaa avighaatapakkhiyaa nibbaanasa.mvattanikaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] niivara.navaggo catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve kusalaa kilesaa ca, dve yoniso ca buddhi ca.
[22] aavara.naa niivara.naa rukkha.m, niivara.na~nca te dasaati..

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0138^ea^ ^a^M3.0087^ea^. ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa tisso vidhaa pajahi.msu, sabbe te sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa tisso vidhaa pajahissanti, sabbe te sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa tisso vidhaa pajahanti, sabbe te sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. katamesa.m sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m? satisambojjha"ngassa...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa tisso vidhaa pajahi.msu...pe0... pajahissanti...pe0... pajahanti, sabbe te imesa.myeva sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ``ra~n~no ^a^V3.0120^ea^ ^a^P5.0099^ea^, bhikkhave, cakkavattissa paatubhaavaa sattanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo hoti. katamesa.m sattanna.m? cakkaratanassa paatubhaavo hoti, hatthiratanassa paatubhaavo hoti, assaratanassa paatubhaavo hoti, ma.niratanassa paatubhaavo hoti, itthiratanassa paatubhaavo hoti, gahapatiratanassa paatubhaavo hoti, pari.naayakaratanassa paatubhaavo hoti ^a^T5.0139^ea^. ra~n~no, bhikkhave, cakkavattissa paatubhaavaa imesa.m sattanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo hoti.

[03] ``tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa sattanna.m bojjha"ngaratanaana.m paatubhaavo hoti. katamesa.m sattanna.m? satisambojjha"ngassa ratanassa paatubhaavo hoti...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa ratanassa paatubhaavo hoti. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa imesa.m sattanna.m bojjha"ngaratanaana.m paatubhaavo hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``maarasenappamaddana.m ^a^M3.0088^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, magga.m desessaami; ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, maarasenappamaddano maggo? yadida.m -- satta bojjha"ngaa. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- aya.m kho, bhikkhave, maarasenappamaddano maggo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```duppa~n~no e.lamuugo, duppa~n~no e.lamuugo'ti ^a^V3.0121^ea^, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, `duppa~n~no e.lamuugo'ti vuccatii''ti? ``sattanna.m kho, bhikkhu, bojjha"ngaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa `duppa~n~no e.lamuugo'ti vuccati. katamesa.m ^a^P5.0100^ea^ sattanna.m? satisambojjha"ngassa...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa -- imesa.m kho, bhikkhu ^a^T5.0140^ea^, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa `duppa~n~no e.lamuugo'ti vuccatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ```pa~n~navaa ane.lamuugo, pa~n~navaa ane.lamuugo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, `pa~n~navaa ane.lamuugo'ti vuccatii''ti? ``sattanna.m kho, bhikkhu, bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa `pa~n~navaa ane.lamuugo'ti vuccati. katamesa.m sattanna.m? satisambojjha"ngassa...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa -- imesa.m kho, bhikkhu, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa `pa~n~navaa ane.lamuugo'ti vuccatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ```daliddo, daliddo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, `daliddo'ti vuccatii''ti? ``sattanna.m kho, bhikkhu, bojjha"ngaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa `daliddo'ti vuccati. katamesa.m sattanna.m? satisambojjha"ngassa...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa -- imesa.m kho, bhikkhu, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa `daliddo'ti vuccatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ```adaliddo ^a^M3.0089^ea^, adaliddo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, `adaliddo'ti vuccatii''ti? ``sattanna.m kho, bhikkhu, bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa `adaliddo'ti vuccati. katamesa.m sattanna.m? satisambojjha"ngassa ^a^T5.0141^ea^ ...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa -- imesa.m ^a^V3.0122^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa `adaliddo'ti vuccatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``aadiccassa ^a^P5.0101^ea^, bhikkhave, udayato eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- aru.nugga.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m uppaadaaya eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- kalyaa.namittataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- satta bojjha"nge bhaavessati, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarissati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``ajjhattika.m, bhikkhave, a"nganti karitvaa naa~n~na.m eka"ngampi samanupassaami sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m uppaadaaya, yathayida.m -- bhikkhave, yonisomanasikaaro. yonisomanasikaarasampannasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- satta bojjha"nge bhaavessati, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarissati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikaarasampanno satta bojjha"nge ^a^T5.0142^ea^ bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti ^a^V3.0123^ea^ vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikaarasampanno satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``baahira.m ^a^M3.0090^ea^ ^a^P5.0102^ea^, bhikkhave, a"nganti karitvaa naa~n~na.m eka"ngampi samanupassaami sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m uppaadaaya, yathayida.m -- bhikkhave, kalyaa.namittataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- satta bojjha"nge bhaavessati, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarissati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaroti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto satta bojjha"nge bhaaveti, satta bojjha"nge bahuliikarotii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] cakkavattivaggo pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] vidhaa cakkavatti maaro, duppa~n~no pa~n~navena ca.
[22] daliddo adaliddo ca, aadicca"ngena te dasaati..

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0143^ea^. ``pa~ncanna~nca, bhikkhave, niivara.naana.m sattanna~nca bojjha"ngaana.m aahaara~nca anaahaara~nca desessaami; ta.m su.naatha. ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa bhiyyobhaavaaya ^a^P5.0103^ea^ vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0124^ea^, subhanimitta.m. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa byaapaadassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa byaapaadassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, pa.tighanimitta.m ^a^M3.0091^ea^. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa byaapaadassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa byaapaadassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, arati tandi vijambhitaa bhattasammado cetaso ca liinatta.m. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhaavaaya ^a^T5.0144^ea^ vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso avuupasamo. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya uppaadaaya, uppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, vicikicchaa.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha ayonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya uppaadaaya, uppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, satisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa ^a^P5.0104^ea^ dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ^a^V3.0125^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya ^a^T5.0145^ea^ paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, kusalaakusalaa dhammaa saavajjaanavajjaa dhammaa hiinapa.niitaa dhammaa ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagaa dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ^a^M3.0092^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, aarambhadhaatu nikkamadhaatu parakkamadhaatu. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, piitisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, kaayappassaddhi cittappassaddhi ^a^T5.0146^ea^. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ^a^P5.0105^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, samathanimitta.m abyagganimitta.m. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, aahaaro anuppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa ^a^V3.0126^ea^ dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, asubhanimitta.m ^a^M3.0093^ea^. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa kaamacchandassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ^a^T5.0147^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa byaapaadassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa byaapaadassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, mettaacetovimutti. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa byaapaadassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa byaapaadassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, aarambhadhaatu nikkamadhaatu parakkamadhaatu. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa uppaadaaya ^a^P5.0106^ea^, uppannassa vaa thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso vuupasamo. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya uppaadaaya, uppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya? atthi, bhikkhave, kusalaakusalaa dhammaa saavajjaanavajjaa dhammaa hiinapa.niitaa dhammaa ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagaa dhammaa. tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro ^a^T5.0148^ea^ ^a^V3.0127^ea^ -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya uppaadaaya, uppannaaya vaa vicikicchaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, satisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha amanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ^a^M3.0094^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, kusalaakusalaa dhammaa saavajjaanavajjaa dhammaa hiinapa.niitaa dhammaa ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagaa dhammaa. tattha amanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa ^a^P5.0107^ea^ bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, aarambhadhaatu nikkamadhaatu parakkamadhaatu. tattha amanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa ^a^T5.0149^ea^ bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, piitisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha amanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, kaayappassaddhi cittappassaddhi. tattha amanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ^a^V3.0128^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, samathanimitta.m abyagganimitta.m. tattha amanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, anaahaaro anuppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa ^a^T5.0150^ea^ uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa? atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. tattha amanasikaarabahuliikaaro -- ayamanaahaaro anuppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya ^a^M3.0095^ea^, uppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P5.0108^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya pavisi.msu. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m --

[03] ``sama.no, aavuso, gotamo saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m deseti -- `etha tumhe, bhikkhave, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavethaa'ti. mayampi kho, aavuso, saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m desema -- `etha tumhe, aavuso, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavethaa'ti. idha no, aavuso, ko viseso, ko ^a^T5.0151^ea^ adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m sama.nassa vaa ^a^V3.0129^ea^ gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa, yadida.m -- dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m, anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani''nti?

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandi.msu nappa.tikkosi.msu; anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu -- ``bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^P5.0109^ea^ nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``idha ^a^M3.0096^ea^ maya.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya pavisimha. tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m, ya.mnuuna maya.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodimha. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidimha. ekamanta.m nisinne kho amhe, bhante, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m --

[03] ``sama.no, aavuso, gotamo saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m deseti `etha tumhe, bhikkhave, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya ^a^T5.0152^ea^ dubbaliikara.ne satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavethaa'ti. mayampi kho, aavuso, saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m desema -- `etha tumhe, aavuso, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavethaa'ti. idha no, aavuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m sama.nassa vaa gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa, yadida.m -- dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m, anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani''nti?

[03] ``atha kho maya.m, bhante, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandimha nappa.tikkosimha, anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamimha -- `bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.mvaadino ^a^V3.0130^ea^, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `atthi panaavuso, pariyaayo, ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma pa~nca niivara.naa dasa honti, satta bojjha"ngaa catuddasaa'ti. eva.m pu.t.thaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa na ceva sampaayissanti, uttari~nca vighaata.m aapajjissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi.m. ``naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhave, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya, a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa tathaagatasaavakena vaa ito vaa pana sutvaa''.

[03] ``katamo ^a^T5.0153^ea^ ^a^M3.0097^ea^ ^a^P5.0110^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo, ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma pa~nca niivara.naa dasa honti? yadapi, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m kaamacchando tadapi niivara.na.m, yadapi bahiddhaa kaamacchando tadapi niivara.na.m. `kaamacchandaniivara.na'nti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti. yadapi, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m byaapaado tadapi niivara.na.m, yadapi bahiddhaa byaapaado tadapi niivara.na.m. `byaapaadaniivara.na'nti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti. yadapi, bhikkhave, thina.m tadapi niivara.na.m, yadapi middha.m tadapi niivara.na.m. `thinamiddhaniivara.na'nti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti. yadapi, bhikkhave, uddhacca.m tadapi niivara.na.m, yadapi kukkucca.m tadapi niivara.na.m. `uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na'nti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti. yadapi, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m dhammesu vicikicchaa tadapi niivara.na.m, yadapi bahiddhaa dhammesu vicikicchaa tadapi niivara.na.m. `vicikicchaaniivara.na'nti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo, ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma pa~nca niivara.naa dasa honti.

[03] ``katamo ^a^T5.0154^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo, ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma satta bojjha"ngaa catuddasa honti? yadapi, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjha"ngo, yadapi bahiddhaa dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjha"ngo. `satisambojjha"ngo'ti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yadapi ^a^P5.0111^ea^, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m dhammesu pa~n~naaya pavicinati {pavicinaati (ka0)} pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati ^a^V3.0131^ea^ tadapi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, yadapi bahiddhaa dhammesu pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati tadapi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo. `dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo'ti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, kaayika.m viiriya.m tadapi viiriyasambojjha"ngo, yadapi cetasika.m viiriya.m tadapi viiriyasambojjha"ngo. `viiriyasambojjha"ngo'ti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yadapi ^a^M3.0098^ea^, bhikkhave, savitakkasavicaaraa piiti tadapi piitisambojjha"ngo, yadapi avitakkaavicaaraa piiti tadapi piitisambojjha"ngo. `piitisambojjha"ngo'ti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, kaayappassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjha"ngo, yadapi cittappassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjha"ngo. `passaddhisambojjha"ngo'ti ^a^T5.0155^ea^ iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, savitakko savicaaro samaadhi tadapi samaadhisambojjha"ngo, yadapi avitakkaavicaaro samaadhi tadapi samaadhisambojjha"ngo. `samaadhisambojjha"ngo'ti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m dhammesu upekkhaa tadapi upekkhaasambojjha"ngo, yadapi bahiddhaa dhammesu upekkhaa tadapi upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. `upekkhaasambojjha"ngo'ti iti hida.m uddesa.m gacchati. tadaminaapeta.m pariyaayena dvaya.m hoti. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo, ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma satta bojjha"ngaa catuddasaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P5.0112^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthiya.m ^a^V3.0132^ea^ pi.n.daaya pavisi.msu ^a^V3.0133^ea^. (pariyaayasuttasadisa.m).

[03] ``eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye liina.m citta.m hoti, katamesa.m tasmi.m samaye bojjha"ngaana.m akaalo bhaavanaaya, katamesa.m tasmi.m samaye bojjha"ngaana.m kaalo bhaavanaaya? yasmi.m panaavuso, samaye uddhata.m citta.m hoti, katamesa.m tasmi.m samaye bojjha"ngaana.m akaalo bhaavanaaya, katamesa.m tasmi.m samaye bojjha"ngaana.m kaalo bhaavanaayaa'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa ^a^T5.0156^ea^, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa na ceva sampaayissanti, uttari~nca vighaata.m aapajjissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi.m.

[03] ``naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhave, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m veyyaakara.nena ^a^M3.0099^ea^ citta.m aaraadheyya, a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa tathaagatasaavakena vaa ito vaa pana sutvaa.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye liina.m citta.m hoti, akaalo tasmi.m samaye passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? liina.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi dussamu.t.thaapaya.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso paritta.m aggi.m ujjaaletukaamo assa. so tattha allaani ^a^V3.0134^ea^ ceva ti.naani pakkhipeyya, allaani ca gomayaani pakkhipeyya, allaani ca ka.t.thaani pakkhipeyya ^a^P5.0113^ea^, udakavaata~nca dadeyya, pa.msukena ca okireyya; bhabbo nu kho so puriso paritta.m aggi.m ujjaalitu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye liina.m citta.m hoti, akaalo tasmi.m samaye passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? liina.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi dussamu.t.thaapaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yasmi~nca kho, bhikkhave, samaye liina.m citta.m hoti, kaalo tasmi.m ^a^T5.0157^ea^ samaye dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? liina.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi susamu.t.thaapaya.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso paritta.m aggi.m ujjaaletukaamo assa. so tattha sukkhaani ceva ti.naani pakkhipeyya, sukkhaani gomayaani pakkhipeyya, sukkhaani ka.t.thaani pakkhipeyya, mukhavaata~nca dadeyya, na ca pa.msukena okireyya; bhabbo nu kho so puriso paritta.m aggi.m ujjaalitu''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye liina.m citta.m hoti, kaalo tasmi.m samaye dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? liina.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi susamu.t.thaapaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^M3.0100^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye uddhatta.m citta.m hoti, akaalo tasmi.m samaye dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo piitisambojjha"ngassa ^a^P5.0114^ea^ bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? uddhata.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi duvuupasamaya.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0135^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m nibbaapetukaamo assa. so tattha sukkhaani ceva ti.naani pakkhipeyya, sukkhaani ca gomayaani pakkhipeyya, sukkhaani ca ka.t.thaani pakkhipeyya, mukhavaata~nca dadeyya, na ca pa.msukena okireyya; bhabbo nu kho so puriso ^a^T5.0158^ea^ mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m nibbaapetu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye uddhata.m citta.m hoti, akaalo tasmi.m samaye dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, akaalo piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? uddhata.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi duvuupasamaya.m hoti.

[03] ``yasmi~nca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhata.m citta.m hoti, kaalo tasmi.m samaye passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? uddhata.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi suvuupasamaya.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m nibbaapetukaamo assa. so tattha allaani ceva ti.naani pakkhipeyya, allaani ca gomayaani pakkhipeyya, allaani ca ka.t.thaani pakkhipeyya, udakavaata~nca dadeyya, pa.msukena ca okireyya; bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m nibbaapetu''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye uddhata.m citta.m ^a^P5.0115^ea^ hoti, kaalo tasmi.m samaye passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya, kaalo upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? uddhata.m, bhikkhave, citta.m ta.m etehi dhammehi suvuupasamaya.m hoti. sati~nca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbatthika.m vadaamii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0159^ea^ ^a^M3.0101^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa koliyesu viharati haliddavasana.m naama koliyaana.m nigamo. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya haliddavasana.m pi.n.daaya pavisi.msu ^a^V3.0136^ea^. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava haliddavasane pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m --

[03] ``sama.no, aavuso, gotamo saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m deseti -- `etha tumhe, bhikkhave, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa ^a^P5.0116^ea^ vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharatha. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya ^a^T5.0160^ea^ sabbaavanta.m loka.m karu.naasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharatha. muditaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m muditaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharatha. upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharathaa'''ti.

[03] ``mayampi ^a^M3.0102^ea^ kho, aavuso, saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m desema -- `etha tumhe, aavuso, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha...pe0... karu.naasahagatena cetasaa... muditaasahagatena cetasaa... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa ^a^V3.0137^ea^ eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharathaa'ti. idha no, aavuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m sama.nassa vaa gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa, yadida.m -- dhammadesanaaya ^a^P5.0117^ea^ vaa ^a^T5.0161^ea^ dhammadesana.m, anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani''nti?

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandi.msu nappa.tikkosi.msu. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu -- ``bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu haliddavasane pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``idha maya.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya haliddavasane pi.n.daaya pavisimha. tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `atippago kho taava haliddavasane pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho maya.m, bhante, yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkamimha, upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodimha. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidimha. ekamanta.m nisinne kho amhe, bhante, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m --

[03] ``sama.no, aavuso, gotamo saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m deseti -- `etha ^a^T5.0162^ea^ tumhe, bhikkhave, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa ^a^M3.0103^ea^ viharatha...pe0... karu.naasahagatena cetasaa ^a^V3.0138^ea^... muditaasahagatena cetasaa... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena ^a^P5.0118^ea^ appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharathaa'''ti.

[03] ``mayampi kho, aavuso, saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m desema -- `etha tumhe, aavuso, pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha...pe0... karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa ^a^T5.0163^ea^ viharathaa'ti. idha no, aavuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m sama.nassa vaa gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa, yadida.m, dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m, anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani''nti?

[03] atha kho maya.m, bhante, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandimha nappa.tikkosimha, anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamimha -- `bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa'ti.

[03] ``eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `katha.m bhaavitaa panaavuso, mettaacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa? katha.m bhaavitaa panaavuso, karu.naacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa? katha.m bhaavitaa panaavuso, muditaacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa? katha.m bhaavitaa panaavuso, upekkhaacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa'''ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa ^a^V3.0139^ea^ paribbaajakaa na ceva sampaayissanti, uttari~nca vighaata.m aapajjissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi.m. ``naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhave, passaami sadevake ^a^M3.0104^ea^ loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya, a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa tathaagatasaavakena ^a^T5.0164^ea^ vaa ito vaa pana sutvaa''.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^P5.0119^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, mettaacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettaasahagata.m satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... mettaasahagata.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. so sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, appa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, appa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuula~nca pa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya.m sato sampajaano'ti, upekkhako ca tattha viharati sato sampajaano, subha.m vaa kho pana vimokkha.m upasampajja viharati. subhaparamaaha.m, bhikkhave, mettaacetovimutti.m vadaami, idhapa~n~nassa bhikkhuno uttarivimutti.m appa.tivijjhato.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, karu.naacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu karu.naasahagata.m satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... ^a^V3.0140^ea^ karu.naasahagata.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m ^a^T5.0165^ea^. so sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati...pe0... sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuula~nca pa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya.m sato sampajaano'ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajaano. sabbaso vaa pana ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanaparamaaha.m ^a^P5.0120^ea^, bhikkhave, karu.naacetovimutti.m ^a^M3.0105^ea^ vadaami, idhapa~n~nassa bhikkhuno uttarivimutti.m appa.tivijjhato.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, muditaacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu muditaasahagata.m satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... muditaasahagata.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. so sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati ^a^V3.0141^ea^ ...pe0... sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuula~nca pa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya.m sato sampajaano'ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajaano. sabbaso vaa pana aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanaparamaaha.m, bhikkhave, muditaacetovimutti.m vadaami, idhapa~n~nassa bhikkhuno uttarivimutti.m appa.tivijjhato.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^T5.0166^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, upekkhaacetovimutti, ki.mgatikaa hoti, ki.mparamaa, ki.mphalaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upekkhaasahagata.m satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasahagata.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. so sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, appa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, appa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati `appa.tikuula~nca pa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya.m sato sampajaano'ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajaano. sabbaso ^a^P5.0121^ea^ vaa pana vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aaki~nca~n~naayatanaparamaaha.m, bhikkhave, upekkhaacetovimutti.m vadaami, idhapa~n~nassa bhikkhuno uttarivimutti.m appa.tivijjhato''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0142^ea^ ^a^M3.0106^ea^. atha kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ko ^a^T5.0167^ea^ nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yenekadaa diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa? ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yenekadaa diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa''ti?

[03] ``yasmi.m kho, braahma.na, samaye kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto sa.msa.t.tho laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya vaa. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m na jaaneyya na passeyya. evameva kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m ^a^P5.0122^ea^ samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``puna ^a^T5.0168^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ^a^V3.0143^ea^ ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto agginaa santatto pakkuthito {pakkudhito (ka0), ukka.t.thito (sii0), ukku.t.thito (syaa0)} usmudakajaato ^a^M3.0107^ea^ {ussadakajaato (sii0), usmaadakajaato (syaa0)}. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m na jaaneyya na passeyya. evameva kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi tasmi.m samaye...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye ^a^T5.0169^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto sevaalapa.nakapariyonaddho. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano ^a^P5.0123^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m na jaaneyya na passeyya. evameva kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ^a^V3.0144^ea^ ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto vaaterito calito bhanto uumijaato. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m ^a^T5.0170^ea^ ^a^M3.0108^ea^ na jaaneyya na passeyya. evameva kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi... diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto aavilo lu.lito kalaliibhuuto andhakaare nikkhitto. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m na jaaneyya na ^a^P5.0124^ea^ passeyya. evameva kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati, paratthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati ^a^T5.0171^ea^ na passati, ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati; diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, hetu aya.m paccayo yenekadaa diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``yasmi~nca kho, braahma.na, samaye na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye ^a^V3.0145^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m jaanaati passati, paratthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m jaanaati passati, ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m jaanaati passati; diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0109^ea^, braahma.na, udapatto asa.msa.t.tho laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya vaa. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m jaaneyya passeyya. evameva kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0....

[03] ``sattime ^a^M3.0111^ea^, braahma.na, bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anupakkilesaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattanti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo kho, braahma.na, anaavara.no ^a^T5.0175^ea^ aniivara.no cetaso anupakkileso bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo kho, braahma.na, anaavara.no aniivara.no cetaso anupakkileso bhaavito bahuliikato vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, braahma.na, satta bojjha"ngaa anaavara.naa aniivara.naa cetaso anupakkilesaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. eva.m vutte sa"ngaaravo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ^a^V3.0148^ea^ upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho abhayo raajakumaaro yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho abhayo raajakumaaro bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``puura.no, bhante, kassapo evamaaha -- `natthi hetu, natthi paccayo a~n~naa.naaya adassanaaya. ahetu, appaccayo {appaccayaa (sii0), appaccaya.m (?)} a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m hoti. natthi hetu, natthi paccayo ~naa.naaya dassanaaya. ahetu, appaccayo ~naa.na.m dassana.m hotii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti? ``atthi, raajakumaara, hetu, atthi paccayo a~n~naa.naaya adassanaaya. sahetu, sappaccayo {sappaccayaa (sii0), sappaccaya.m (?)} a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m hoti. atthi ^a^P5.0127^ea^, raajakumaara, hetu, atthi paccayo ~naa.naaya dassanaaya. sahetu, sappaccayo ~naa.na.m ^a^T5.0176^ea^ dassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana, bhante, hetu, katamo paccayo a~n~naa.naaya adassanaaya? katha.m sahetu, sappaccayo a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m hotii''ti? ``yasmi.m kho, raajakumaara, samaye kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati -- ayampi kho, raajakumaara, hetu, aya.m ^a^M3.0112^ea^ paccayo a~n~naa.naaya adassanaaya. evampi sahetu sappaccayo a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, raajakumaara, yasmi.m samaye byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena...pe0... thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena... uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena... vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m na jaanaati na passati -- ayampi kho, raajakumaara, hetu, aya.m ^a^V3.0149^ea^ paccayo a~n~naa.naaya adassanaaya. evampi sahetu sappaccayo a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] ``ko ^a^T5.0177^ea^ naamaaya.m, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti? ``niivara.naa naamete, raajakumaaraa''ti. ``taggha, bhagavaa, niivara.naa; taggha, sugata, niivara.naa! ekamekenapi kho, bhante, niivara.nena abhibhuuto yathaabhuuta.m na jaaneyya na passeyya, ko pana vaado pa~ncahi niivara.nehi?

[03] ``katamo pana, bhante, hetu, katamo paccayo ~naa.naaya dassanaaya? katha.m sahetu, sappaccayo ~naa.na.m dassana.m hotii''ti? ``idha ^a^P5.0128^ea^, raajakumaara, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. so satisambojjha"nga.m bhaavitena cittena yathaabhuuta.m jaanaati passati -- ayampi kho, raajakumaara, hetu, aya.m paccayo ~naa.naaya dassanaaya. evampi sahetu, sappaccayo ~naa.na.m dassana.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, raajakumaara, bhikkhu...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. so upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaavitena cittena yathaabhuuta.m jaanaati passati -- ayampi kho, raajakumaara, hetu, aya.m paccayo ~naa.naaya dassanaaya. eva.m sahetu, sappaccayo ~naa.na.m dassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] ``nirodhasa~n~naaya, bhikkhave, bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa. katha.m bhaavitaaya, bhikkhave, nirodhasa~n~naaya katha.m bahuliikataaya dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T5.0183^ea^ nirodhasa~n~naasahagata.m satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... nirodhasa~n~naasahagata.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m bhaavitaaya kho, bhikkhave, nirodhasa~n~naaya eva.m bahuliikataaya dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti.

[03] ``nirodhasa~n~naa, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahato atthaaya sa.mvattati, mahato yogakkhemaaya sa.mvattati, mahato sa.mvegaaya sa.mvattati, mahato phaasuvihaaraaya sa.mvattati. katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, nirodhasa~n~naa katha.m bahuliikataa ^a^P5.0134^ea^ mahato atthaaya sa.mvattati, mahato yogakkhemaaya ^a^M3.0118^ea^ sa.mvattati, mahato sa.mvegaaya sa.mvattati, mahato phaasuvihaaraaya sa.mvattati? idha, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0164^ea^, bhikkhu nirodhasa~n~naasahagata.m satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... nirodhasa~n~naasahagata.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, nirodhasa~n~naa eva.m bahuliikataa mahato atthaaya sa.mvattati, mahato yogakkhemaaya sa.mvattati, mahato sa.mvegaaya sa.mvattati, mahato phaasuvihaaraaya sa.mvattatii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] nirodhavaggo a.t.thamo.

[03] 258-269^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ga"ngaa nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no ^a^T5.0184^ea^ nibbaanapabbhaaro. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjha"nge bhaavento satta bojjha"nge bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro''ti. (yaava esanaa paa.li vitthaaretabbaa).
[06] ga"ngaapeyyaalavaggo navamo.

[21] cha ^a^V3.0165^ea^ ^a^M3.0119^ea^ ^a^P5.0135^ea^ paaciinato ninnaa, cha ninnaa ca samuddato.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, uddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruuparaago, aruuparaago, maano, uddhacca.m, avijjaa ^a^P5.0137^ea^ -- imaani kho, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0190^ea^, pa~ncuddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m uddhambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavetabbaa. katame satta? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti raagavinayapariyosaana.m dosavinayapariyosaana.m mohavinayapariyosaana.m... amatogadha.m amataparaayana.m amatapariyosaana.m... nibbaananinna.m nibbaanapo.na.m nibbaanapabbhaara.m. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncanna.m uddhambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m abhi~n~naaya pari~n~naaya parikkhayaaya pahaanaaya ime satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. dasama.m.

[06] so.lasamo.

[21] bala.m ^a^M3.0122^ea^ biija~nca naago ca, rukkho kumbhena suukiyaa.
[22] aakaasena ca dve meghaa, naavaa aagantukaa nadiiti..
[03] (bojjha"ngasa.myuttassa balakara.niiyavaggo raagavasena vitthaaretabbo).
