[03] 367^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0190^ea^ ^a^V3.0220^ea^ ^a^M3.0123^ea^ ^a^P5.0141^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati ambapaalivane. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ekaayano aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; citte cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ekaayano aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^T5.0191^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0221^ea^ ^a^P5.0142^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati ambapaalivane. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajaano. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya ^a^M3.0124^ea^ loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaano hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaanakaarii hoti. sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajaano. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0192^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho ^a^P5.0143^ea^ appamatto aataapii ^a^V3.0222^ea^ pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``evameva panidhekacce moghapurisaa ma~nceva {mameva (sii0)} ajjhesanti, dhamme ca bhaasite mameva anubandhitabba.m ma~n~nantii''ti. ``desetu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m, desetu sugato sa.mkhittena dhamma.m. appeva naamaaha.m bhagavato bhaasitassa attha.m jaaneyya.m, appeva naamaaha.m bhagavato bhaasitassa daayaado assa''nti. ``tasmaatiha tva.m, bhikkhu, aadimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. ko caadi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? siila~nca suvisuddha.m, di.t.thi ca ujukaa. yato kho te, bhikkhu, siila~nca suvisuddha.m bhavissati di.t.thi ca ujukaa, tato tva.m, bhikkhu, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya cattaaro satipa.t.thaane tividhena bhaaveyyaasi.

[03] katame ^a^M3.0125^ea^ cattaaro? idha tva.m, bhikkhu, ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; bahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; ajjhattabahiddhaa ^a^T5.0193^ea^ vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ajjhatta.m vaa vedanaasu...pe0... bahiddhaa vaa vedanaasu...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ajjhatta.m vaa citte...pe0... bahiddhaa vaa citte...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa citte cittaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ajjhatta.m vaa dhammesu...pe0... bahiddhaa vaa dhammesu...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. yato kho tva.m, bhikkhu, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m tividhena bhaavessasi, tato tuyha.m, bhikkhu, yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagamissati vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaanii''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa ^a^P5.0144^ea^ anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m ^a^V3.0223^ea^ abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho so bhikkhu eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati ^a^T5.0194^ea^. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahata.m ahosiiti. tatiya.m.
[03] 370^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati saalaaya braahma.nagaame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... etadavoca --

[03] ``ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, te vo, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaaya samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa. katamesa.m catunna.m? etha tumhe, aavuso, kaaye ^a^M3.0126^ea^ kaayaanupassino viharatha aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, kaayassa yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.naaya; vedanaasu vedanaanupassino viharatha aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, vedanaana.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.naaya; citte cittaanupassino viharatha aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, cittassa yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.naaya; dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharatha aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, dhammaana.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.naaya. yepi ^a^P5.0145^ea^ te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sekhaa appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, tepi kaaye kaayaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa ^a^T5.0195^ea^, kaayassa pari~n~naaya; vedanaasu vedanaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, vedanaana.m pari~n~naaya; citte cittaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, cittassa pari~n~naaya; dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, dhammaana.m pari~n~naaya.

[03] ``yepi ^a^V3.0224^ea^ te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, tepi kaaye kaayaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, kaayena visa.myuttaa; vedanaasu vedanaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, vedanaahi visa.myuttaa; citte cittaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, cittena visa.myuttaa; dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharanti aataapino sampajaanaa ekodibhuutaa vippasannacittaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa, dhammehi visa.myuttaa.

[03] ``yepi te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, te vo, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imesa.m catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaaya ^a^T5.0196^ea^ samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M3.0127^ea^. tatra kho bhagavaa etadavoca -- ```akusalaraasii'ti, bhikkhave, vadamaano pa~nca niivara.ne sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, akusalaraasi, yadida.m -- pa~nca niivara.naa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m ^a^P5.0146^ea^, byaapaadaniivara.na.m, thinamiddhaniivara.na.m, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m. `akusalaraasii'ti, bhikkhave, vadamaano ime pa~nca niivara.ne sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, akusalaraasi, yadida.m -- pa~nca niivara.naa.

[03] ```kusalaraasii'ti, bhikkhave, vadamaano cattaaro satipa.t.thaane sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, kusalaraasi, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m ^a^V3.0225^ea^. `kusalaraasii'ti, bhikkhave, vadamaano ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, kusalaraasi, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, saku.nagghi laapa.m saku.na.m sahasaa ajjhappattaa aggahesi. atha kho, bhikkhave, laapo saku.no saku.nagghiyaa hariyamaano eva.m paridevasi -- `mayamevamha {mayamevaamha (ka0)} alakkhikaa, maya.m ^a^T5.0197^ea^ appapu~n~naa, ye maya.m agocare carimha paravisaye. sacejja maya.m gocare careyyaama sake pettike visaye, na myaaya.m {na caaya.m (sii0)}, saku.nagghi, ala.m abhavissa, yadida.m -- yuddhaayaa'ti. `ko pana te, laapa, gocaro sako pettiko visayo'ti? `yadida.m -- na"ngalaka.t.thakara.na.m le.d.du.t.thaana'''nti. ``atha ^a^P5.0147^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, saku.nagghi sake bale apatthaddhaa sake bale asa.mvadamaanaa {avacamaanaa (sii0)} laapa.m saku.na.m pamu~nci -- `gaccha kho tva.m, laapa, tatrapi me gantvaa na mokkhasii'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^M3.0128^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, laapo saku.no na"ngalaka.t.thakara.na.m le.d.du.t.thaana.m gantvaa mahanta.m le.d.du.m abhiruhitvaa saku.nagghi.m vadamaano a.t.thaasi -- `ehi kho daani me, saku.nagghi, ehi kho daani me, saku.nagghii'ti. atha kho saa, bhikkhave, saku.nagghi sake bale apatthaddhaa sake bale asa.mvadamaanaa ubho pakkhe sannayha {sandhaaya (sii0 syaa0)} laapa.m saku.na.m sahasaa ajjhappattaa. yadaa kho, bhikkhave, a~n~naasi laapo saku.no `bahuaagato kho myaaya.m saku.nagghii'ti, atha tasseva le.d.dussa antara.m paccupaadi. atha kho, bhikkhave, saku.nagghi tattheva ura.m paccataa.lesi. eva~nhi ta.m {eva.m heta.m (sii0)}, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, maa agocare carittha paravisaye. agocare, bhikkhave, carata.m paravisaye lacchati maaro otaara.m, lacchati maaro aaramma.na.m. ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo? yadida.m -- pa~nca kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa ^a^T5.0198^ea^ saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa ^a^V3.0226^ea^ gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo.

[03] ``gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye. gocare, bhikkhave, carata.m sake pettike visaye na lacchati maaro otaara.m, na lacchati maaro aaramma.na.m. ko ^a^P5.0148^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo? yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbataraajassa duggaa visamaa desaa, yattha neva makka.taana.m caarii na manussaana.m. atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbataraajassa ^a^M3.0129^ea^ duggaa visamaa desaa, yattha makka.taana~nhi kho caarii, na manussaana.m. atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbataraajassa samaa bhuumibhaagaa rama.niiyaa, yattha makka.taana~nceva caarii manussaana~nca. tatra, bhikkhave, luddaa makka.taviithiisu lepa.m o.d.denti makka.taana.m baadhanaaya.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te makka.taa abaalajaatikaa alolajaatikaa, te ta.m lepa.m disvaa aarakaa parivajjanti. yo pana so hoti ^a^T5.0199^ea^ makka.to baalajaatiko lolajaatiko, so ta.m lepa.m upasa"nkamitvaa hatthena ga.nhaati. so tattha bajjhati. `hattha.m mocessaamii'ti dutiyena hatthena ga.nhaati. so tattha bajjhati. `ubho hatthe mocessaamii'ti paadena ga.nhaati. so tattha bajjhati. `ubho hatthe mocessaami paada~ncaa'ti dutiyena paadena ga.nhaati. so tattha bajjhati. `ubho hatthe mocessaami paade caa'ti tu.n.dena ga.nhaati. so tattha bajjhati. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, makka.to pa~nco.d.dito thuna.m seti anaya.m aapanno byasana.m aapanno yathaakaamakara.niiyo ^a^V3.0227^ea^ ^a^P5.0149^ea^ luddassa. tamena.m, bhikkhave, luddo vijjhitvaa tasmi.myeva ka.t.thakata"ngaare {tasmi.myeva makka.ta.m uddharitvaa (sii0 syaa0)} avassajjetvaa yena kaama.m pakkamati. eva.m so ta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, maa agocare carittha paravisaye. agocare, bhikkhave, carata.m paravisaye lacchati maaro otaara.m, lacchati maaro aaramma.na.m. ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo? yadida.m -- pa~nca kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo.

[03] ``gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye. gocare, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0200^ea^, carata.m sake pettike visaye na lacchati maaro otaara.m, na lacchati maaro aaramma.na.m. ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo? yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro ^a^M3.0130^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, baalo abyatto akusalo suudo raajaana.m vaa raajamahaamatta.m vaa {raajamahaamattaana.m vaa (sii0)} naanaccayehi suupehi paccupa.t.thito assa -- ambilaggehipi, tittakaggehipi, ka.tukaggehipi, madhuraggehipi, khaarikehipi, akhaarikehipi, lo.nikehipi, alo.nikehipi.

[03] ``sa ^a^P5.0150^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, baalo abyatto akusalo suudo sakassa bhattu nimitta.m na ugga.nhaati -- `ida.m vaa me ajja bhattu suupeyya.m ruccati, imassa vaa abhiharati, imassa vaa bahu.m ga.nhaati, imassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaasati. ambilagga.m vaa me ajja bhattu suupeyya.m ruccati ^a^V3.0228^ea^, ambilaggassa vaa abhiharati, ambilaggassa vaa bahu.m ga.nhaati, ambilaggassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaasati. tittakagga.m vaa me ajja... ka.tukagga.m vaa me ajja... madhuragga.m vaa me ajja... khaarika.m vaa me ajja... akhaarika.m vaa me ajja... lo.nika.m ^a^T5.0201^ea^ vaa me ajja... alo.nika.m vaa me ajja bhattu suupeyya.m ruccati, alo.nikassa vaa abhiharati, alo.nikassa vaa bahu.m ga.nhaati, alo.nikassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaasatii'''ti.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, baalo abyatto akusalo suudo na ceva laabhii hoti acchaadanassa, na laabhii vetanassa, na laabhii abhihaaraana.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so, bhikkhave, baalo abyatto akusalo suudo sakassa bhattu nimitta.m na ugga.nhaati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco baalo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato citta.m na samaadhiyati, upakkilesaa na pahiiyanti. so ta.m nimitta.m na ugga.nhaati. vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati...pe0... citte cittaanupassii viharati ^a^M3.0131^ea^ ...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharato citta.m na samaadhiyati, upakkilesaa na pahiiyanti. so ta.m nimitta.m na ugga.nhaati.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, baalo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu na ceva laabhii hoti di.t.theva dhamme sukhavihaaraana.m, na laabhii satisampaja~n~nassa ^a^P5.0151^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so, bhikkhave, baalo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimitta.m na ugga.nhaati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto kusalo suudo raajaana.m ^a^T5.0202^ea^ vaa raajamahaamatta.m vaa naanaccayehi suupehi paccupa.t.thito assa -- ambilaggehipi, tittakaggehipi, ka.tukaggehipi, madhuraggehipi, khaarikehipi, akhaarikehipi, lo.nikehipi, alo.nikehipi.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto kusalo suudo sakassa bhattu nimitta.m ugga.nhaati -- `ida.m vaa me ajja bhattu suupeyya.m ruccati, imassa vaa abhiharati, imassa vaa bahu.m ga.nhaati, imassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaasati. ambilagga.m vaa me ajja bhattu suupeyya.m ruccati ^a^V3.0229^ea^, ambilaggassa vaa abhiharati, ambilaggassa vaa bahu.m ga.nhaati, ambilaggassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaasati. tittakagga.m vaa me ajja... ka.tukagga.m vaa me ajja... madhuragga.m vaa me ajja... khaarika.m vaa me ajja... akhaarika.m vaa me ajja... lo.nika.m vaa me ajja... alo.nika.m vaa me ajja bhattu suupeyya.m ruccati, alo.nikassa vaa abhiharati, alo.nikassa vaa bahu.m ga.nhaati, alo.nikassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaasatii'''ti.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto kusalo suudo laabhii ceva hoti acchaadanassa, laabhii vetanassa, laabhii abhihaaraana.m. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto kusalo suudo sakassa bhattu nimitta.m ugga.nhaati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco pa.n.dito byatto kusalo bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato ^a^T5.0203^ea^ citta.m samaadhiyati, upakkilesaa pahiiyanti ^a^P5.0152^ea^. so ta.m nimitta.m ugga.nhaati. vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati...pe0... citte cittaanupassii viharati...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati ^a^M3.0132^ea^ aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharato citta.m samaadhiyati, upakkilesaa pahiiyanti. so ta.m nimitta.m ugga.nhaati.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto kusalo bhikkhu laabhii ceva hoti di.t.theva dhamme sukhavihaaraana.m, laabhii hoti satisampaja~n~nassa. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimitta.m ugga.nhaatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati ve.luvagaamake {beluvagaamake (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``etha tumhe, bhikkhave, samantaa vesaaliyaa yathaamitta.m yathaasandi.t.tha.m yathaasambhatta.m vassa.m upetha. idhevaaha.m ve.luvagaamake vassa.m upagacchaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti ^a^V3.0230^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa samantaa vesaaliyaa yathaamitta.m yathaasandi.t.tha.m yathaasambhatta.m vassa.m upagacchu.m. bhagavaa pana tattheva ve.luvagaamake vassa.m upagacchi {upaga~nchi (sii0 pii0)}.

[03] atha kho bhagavato vassuupagatassa kharo aabaadho uppajji, baa.lhaa vedanaa vattanti maara.nantikaa. tatra suda.m bhagavaa sato sampajaano adhivaasesi aviha~n~namaano. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``na kho ^a^T5.0204^ea^ me ta.m patiruupa.m, yoha.m anaamantetvaa upa.t.thaake anapaloketvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m parinibbaayeyya.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m aabaadha.m viiriyena pa.tipa.naametvaa jiivitasa"nkhaara.m adhi.t.thaaya ^a^P5.0153^ea^ vihareyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m aabaadha.m viiriyena pa.tipa.naametvaa jiivitasa"nkhaara.m adhi.t.thaaya vihaasi. (atha kho bhagavato so aabaadho pa.tippassambhi) {( ) dii0 ni0 2.164 dissati}.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa gilaanaa vu.t.thito {gilaanavu.t.thito (saddaniiti)} aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa vihaaraa nikkhamitvaa vihaarapacchaayaaya.m {vihaarapacchaachaayaaya.m (bahuusu)} pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m ^a^M3.0133^ea^ etadavoca -- ``di.t.tho me, bhante, bhagavato phaasu; di.t.tha.m, bhante, bhagavato khamaniiya.m; di.t.tha.m, bhante, bhagavato yaapaniiya.m. api ca me, bhante, madhurakajaato viya kaayo, disaapi me na pakkhaayanti, dhammaapi ma.m nappa.tibhanti bhagavato gela~n~nena. api ca me, bhante, ahosi kaacideva assaasamattaa -- `na taava bhagavaa parinibbaayissati, na yaava bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m aarabbha ki~ncideva udaaharatii'''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana daani, aananda, bhikkhusa"ngho mayi paccaasiisati {paccaasi.msati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}? desito, aananda, mayaa dhammo anantara.m abaahira.m karitvaa. natthaananda, tathaagatassa dhammesu aacariyamu.t.thi. yassa nuuna, aananda, evamassa -- `aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti vaa, `mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho'ti vaa, so nuuna, aananda, bhikkhusa"ngha.m aarabbha ki~ncideva udaahareyya. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti vaa ^a^T5.0205^ea^, `mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho'ti vaa. sa ki.m {so nuuna (sii0 pii0)}, aananda, tathaagato bhikkhusa"ngha.m aarabbha ki~ncideva udaaharissati! etarahi kho panaaha.m, aananda, ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. aasiitiko me vayo vattati. seyyathaapi, aananda, jajjarasaka.ta.m {jarasaka.ta.m (sabbattha)} ve.lamissakena {vegamissakena (sii0), ve.lumissakena (syaa0 ka.m0), vedhamissakena (pii0 ka0), vekhamissakena (ka0)} yaapeti; evameva kho, aananda, vedhamissakena ma~n~ne tathaagatassa kaayo yaapeti.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^V3.0231^ea^ ^a^P5.0154^ea^, aananda, samaye tathaagato sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa ekaccaana.m vedanaana.m nirodhaa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati, phaasutaro {phaasutara.m (sabbattha)}, aananda, tasmi.m samaye tathaagatassa kaayo hoti {tathaagatassa hoti (bahuusu)}. tasmaatihaananda, attadiipaa viharatha attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no? idhaananda, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano ^a^M3.0134^ea^ satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, aananda, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no. ye hi keci, aananda, etarahi vaa mamaccaye vaa attadiipaa viharissanti attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa ^a^T5.0206^ea^; tamatagge mete, aananda, bhikkhuu bhavissanti ye keci sikkhaakaamaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena a~n~nataro bhikkhunupassayo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``idha, bhante aananda, sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa {supa.t.thitacittaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} viharantiyo u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m sa~njaanantii''ti {sampajaanantiiti (ka0)}. ``evameta.m ^a^P5.0155^ea^, bhaginiyo, evameta.m, bhaginiyo! yo hi koci, bhaginiyo, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto viharati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m sa~njaanissatii'''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0232^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando taa bhikkhuniyo dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa aanando saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena a~n~nataro bhikkhunupassayo ^a^T5.0207^ea^ tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.m. atha kho, bhante, sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^M3.0135^ea^ nisinnaa kho, bhante, taa bhikkhuniyo ma.m etadavocu.m -- `idha, bhante aananda, sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa viharantiyo u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m sa~njaanantii'ti. eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante, taa bhikkhuniyo etadavoca.m -- `evameta.m, bhaginiyo, evameta.m, bhaginiyo! yo hi koci, bhaginiyo, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto viharati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m sa~njaanissatii'''ti.

[03] ``evameta.m, aananda, evameta.m, aananda! yo hi koci, aananda, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto viharati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m sa~njaanissati''' {sa~njaanissatiiti (bahuusu)}.

[03] ``katamesu catuusu? idhaananda, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa ^a^P5.0156^ea^ kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato kaayaaramma.no vaa uppajjati kaayasmi.m pari.laaho, cetaso vaa liinatta.m, bahiddhaa vaa citta.m vikkhipati. tenaananda {tenahaananda (sii0)}, bhikkhunaa kismi~ncideva pasaadaniiye nimitte citta.m pa.nidahitabba.m. tassa kismi~ncideva pasaadaniiye nimitte citta.m pa.nidahato ^a^T5.0208^ea^ paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedayati {vediyati (sii0)}. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yassa khvaaha.m atthaaya citta.m pa.nidahi.m, so me attho ^a^V3.0233^ea^ abhinipphanno. handa, daani pa.tisa.mharaamii'ti. so pa.tisa.mharati ceva na ca vitakketi na ca vicaareti. `avitakkomhi avicaaro, ajjhatta.m satimaa sukhamasmii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharato dhammaaramma.no vaa uppajjati kaayasmi.m pari.laaho, cetaso vaa liinatta.m, bahiddhaa vaa citta.m vikkhipati. tenaananda, bhikkhunaa kismi~ncideva pasaadaniiye nimitte citta.m pa.nidahitabba.m. tassa kismi~ncideva pasaadaniiye nimitte citta.m pa.nidahato paamojja.m jaayati ^a^M3.0136^ea^. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedayati. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yassa khvaaha.m atthaaya citta.m pa.nidahi.m, so me attho abhinipphanno. handa, daani pa.tisa.mharaamii'ti. so pa.tisa.mharati ceva na ca vitakketi na ca vicaareti. `avitakkomhi avicaaro, ajjhatta.m satimaa sukhamasmii'ti pajaanaati. eva.m kho, aananda, pa.nidhaaya bhaavanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda ^a^T5.0209^ea^, appa.nidhaaya bhaavanaa hoti? bahiddhaa ^a^P5.0157^ea^, aananda, bhikkhu citta.m appa.nidhaaya `appa.nihita.m me bahiddhaa citta'nti pajaanaati. atha pacchaapure `asa.mkhitta.m vimutta.m appa.nihita'nti pajaanaati. atha ca pana `kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa sukhamasmii'ti pajaanaati. bahiddhaa, aananda, bhikkhu citta.m appa.nidhaaya `appa.nihita.m me bahiddhaa citta'nti pajaanaati. atha pacchaapure `asa.mkhitta.m vimutta.m appa.nihita'nti pajaanaati. atha ca pana `vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa sukhamasmii'ti pajaanaati. bahiddhaa, aananda, bhikkhu citta.m appa.nidhaaya `appa.nihita.m me bahiddhaa citta'nti pajaanaati. atha pacchaapure `asa.mkhitta.m vimutta.m appa.nihita'nti pajaanaati. atha ca pana `citte cittaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa sukhamasmii'ti pajaanaati. bahiddhaa, aananda, bhikkhu citta.m appa.nidhaaya `appa.nihita.m me bahiddhaa citta'nti pajaanaati. atha pacchaapure `asa.mkhitta.m vimutta.m appa.nihita'nti pajaanaati. atha ca pana `dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa sukhamasmii'ti pajaanaati. eva.m kho, aananda, appa.nidhaaya bhaavanaa hoti.

[03] ``iti ^a^V3.0234^ea^ kho, aananda, desitaa mayaa pa.nidhaaya bhaavanaa, desitaa appa.nidhaaya bhaavanaa. ya.m, aananda, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa ^a^T5.0210^ea^ anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m vo ta.m mayaa. etaani, aananda, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani! jhaayathaananda, maa pamaadattha; maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha! aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti.
[01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti. dasama.m.
[06] ambapaalivaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] ambapaali ^a^M3.0137^ea^ ^a^P5.0158^ea^ sato bhikkhu, saalaa kusalaraasi ca.
[22] saku.nagdhi makka.to suudo, gilaano bhikkhunupassayoti..

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0211^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```mahaapuriso, mahaapuriso'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, mahaapuriso hotii''ti? ``vimuttacittattaa khvaaha.m, saariputta, `mahaapuriso'ti vadaami. avimuttacittattaa `no mahaapuriso'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``katha~nca, saariputta, vimuttacitto hoti? idha, saariputta, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato citta.m virajjati, vimuccati anupaadaaya aasavehi. vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... ^a^V3.0235^ea^ dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharato citta.m virajjati, vimuccati anupaadaaya aasavehi. eva.m kho, saariputta, vimuttacitto hoti. vimuttacittattaa khvaaha.m, saariputta, `mahaapuriso'ti vadaami. avimuttacittattaa `no mahaapuriso'ti vadaamii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 378^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P5.0159^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa naalandaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. atha ^a^T5.0212^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``eva.mpasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati! na caahu, na ^a^M3.0138^ea^ ca bhavissati, na cetarahi vijjati a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro, yadida.m -- sambodhiya''nti. ``u.laaraa kho tyaaya.m, saariputta, aasabhii vaacaa bhaasitaa, eka.mso gahito, siihanaado nadito -- `eva.mpasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati! na caahu, na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro, yadida.m -- sambodhiya'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m nu te, saariputta, ye te ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasaa ceto paricca viditaa -- `eva.msiilaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' iti vaa, `eva.mdhammaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' iti vaa, `eva.mpa~n~naa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' iti vaa, `eva.mvihaarino te bhagavanto ahesu.m' iti vaa, `eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m' iti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''!

[03] ``ki.m pana te, saariputta, ye te bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasaa ceto paricca viditaa -- `eva.msiilaa te bhagavanto bhavissanti' iti vaa, `eva.mdhammaa te bhagavanto bhavissanti' iti vaa, `eva.mpa~n~naa te bhagavanto bhavissanti' iti vaa, `eva.mvihaarino te bhagavanto bhavissanti' iti ^a^T5.0213^ea^ vaa, `eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto bhavissanti' iti vaa''ti? ``no ^a^P5.0160^ea^ heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ki.m ^a^V3.0236^ea^ pana tyaaha.m {ki.m pana te (sii0)}, saariputta, etarahi, araha.m sammaasambuddho cetasaa ceto paricca vidito -- `eva.msiilo bhagavaa' iti vaa, `eva.mdhammo bhagavaa' iti vaa, `eva.mpa~n~no bhagavaa' iti vaa, `eva.mvihaarii bhagavaa' iti vaa, `eva.mvimutto bhagavaa' iti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ettha ca te, saariputta, atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammaasambuddhesu cetopariya~naa.na.m {cetopariyaaya~naa.na.m (bahuusu)} natthi. atha ki~ncarahi tyaaya.m, saariputta, u.laaraa aasabhii vaacaa bhaasitaa, eka.mso gahito, siihanaado nadito -- `eva.mpasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati! na caahu, na ca bhavissati, na cetarahi vijjati a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa' bhiyyobhi~n~nataro, yadida.m -- sambodhiya''nti?

[03] ``na ^a^M3.0139^ea^ kho me {na kho me ta.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, bhante, atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammaasambuddhesu cetopariya~naa.na.m atthi, api ca me dhammanvayo vidito. seyyathaapi, bhante, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m da.lhuddhaapa.m {da.lhuddaapa.m (sii0 pii0 ka0), da.lhaddhaapa.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} da.lhapaakaaratora.na.m ekadvaara.m. tatrassa dovaariko pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii a~n~naataana.m nivaaretaa ~naataana.m pavesetaa. so tassa nagarassa samantaa anupariyaayapatha.m anukkamamaano na passeyya paakaarasandhi.m ^a^T5.0214^ea^ vaa paakaaravivara.m vaa, antamaso bi.laaranikkhamanamattampi. tassa evamassa -- `ye kho keci o.laarikaa paa.naa ima.m nagara.m pavisanti vaa nikkhamanti vaa, sabbe te iminaava dvaarena pavisanti vaa nikkhamanti vaa'ti. evameva kho me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito -- `yepi te, bhante, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, sabbe te bhagavanto pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya, cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa, satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa, anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhi.msu. yepi te, bhante, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, sabbe te bhagavanto pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya, cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa, satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m ^a^P5.0161^ea^ bhaavetvaa, anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhissanti. bhagavaapi, bhante, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya, cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto, satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa, anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'''ti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^V3.0237^ea^ saadhu, saariputta! tasmaatiha tva.m, saariputta, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m abhikkha.na.m bhaaseyyaasi bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m. yesampi hi, saariputta, moghapurisaana.m bhavissati tathaagate ka"nkhaa ^a^T5.0215^ea^ vaa vimati vaa, tesampima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa yaa tathaagate ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa saa pahiiyissatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto magadhesu ^a^M3.0140^ea^ viharati naalakagaamake aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. cundo ca sama.nuddeso aayasmato saariputtassa upa.t.thaako hoti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto teneva aabaadhena parinibbaayi. atha kho cundo sama.nuddeso aayasmato saariputtassa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena saavatthi jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho cundo sama.nuddeso ^a^P5.0162^ea^ aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, saariputto parinibbuto. idamassa pattaciivara''nti.

[03] ``atthi kho ida.m, aavuso cunda, kathaapaabhata.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. aayaamaavuso cunda, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocessaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo sama.nuddeso aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ca aanando cundo ca sama.nuddeso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m ^a^T5.0216^ea^ etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, cundo sama.nuddeso evamaaha -- `aayasmaa, bhante, saariputto parinibbuto; idamassa pattaciivara'nti. api ca me, bhante, madhurakajaato viya kaayo, disaapi me na pakkhaayanti, dhammaapi ma.m nappa.tibhanti `aayasmaa saariputto parinibbuto'ti sutvaa''.

[03] ``ki.m ^a^V3.0238^ea^ nu kho te, aananda, saariputto siilakkhandha.m vaa aadaaya parinibbuto, samaadhikkhandha.m vaa aadaaya parinibbuto, pa~n~naakkhandha.m vaa aadaaya parinibbuto, vimuttikkhandha.m vaa aadaaya parinibbuto, vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandha.m vaa aadaaya parinibbuto''ti? ``na ca kho me, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto siilakkhandha.m vaa aadaaya parinibbuto, samaadhikkhandha.m vaa...pe0... pa~n~naakkhandha.m vaa... vimuttikkhandha.m vaa... vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandha.m vaa aadaaya parinibbuto. api ca me, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto ovaadako ahosi oti.n.no vi~n~naapako sandassako samaadapako samuttejako sampaha.msako, akilaasu dhammadesanaaya, anuggaahako sabrahmacaariina.m. ta.m maya.m aayasmato saariputtassa dhammoja.m dhammabhoga.m dhammaanuggaha.m anussaraamaa''ti.

[03] ``nanu ^a^M3.0141^ea^ ta.m, aananda, mayaa pa.tikacceva {pa.tigacceva (sii0 pii0)} akkhaata.m -- `sabbehi piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo a~n~nathaabhaavo ^a^P5.0163^ea^. ta.m kutettha, aananda, labbhaa! ya.m ta.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m palokadhamma.m, ta.m vata maa palujjiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, aananda, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato yo ^a^T5.0217^ea^ mahantataro khandho so palujjeyya; evameva kho aananda, mahato bhikkhusa"nghassa ti.t.thato saaravato saariputto parinibbuto. ta.m kutettha, aananda, labbhaa! ya.m ta.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m palokadhamma.m, ta.m vata maa palujjii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. tasmaatihaananda, attadiipaa viharatha attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no? idhaananda, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, aananda, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no. ye hi keci, aananda, etarahi vaa mamaccaye vaa attadiipaa viharissanti attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa; tamatagge mete, aananda, bhikkhuu bhavissanti ye keci sikkhaakaamaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 380^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0239^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vajjiisu viharati ukkacelaaya.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m aciraparinibbutesu saariputtamoggallaanesu. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto ajjhokaase ^a^T5.0218^ea^ nisinno hoti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``api ^a^P5.0164^ea^ myaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa su~n~naa viya khaayati parinibbutesu saariputtamoggallaanesu. asu~n~naa me, bhikkhave, parisaa hoti ^a^M3.0142^ea^, anapekkhaa tassa.m disaaya.m hoti, yassa.m disaaya.m saariputtamoggallaanaa viharanti. ye hi te, bhikkhave, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tesampi bhagavantaana.m etapparama.myeva saavakayuga.m {etaparama.myeva (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ahosi -- seyyathaapi mayha.m saariputtamoggallaanaa. yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tesampi bhagavantaana.m etapparama.myeva saavakayuga.m bhavissati -- seyyathaapi mayha.m saariputtamoggallaanaa. acchariya.m, bhikkhave, saavakaana.m! abbhuta.m, bhikkhave, saavakaana.m! satthu ca naama saasanakaraa bhavissanti ovaadappa.tikaraa, catunna~nca parisaana.m piyaa bhavissanti manaapaa garubhaavaniiyaa ca! acchariya.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa, abbhuta.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa! evaruupepi naama saavakayuge parinibbute natthi tathaagatassa soko vaa paridevo vaa! ta.m kutettha, bhikkhave, labbhaa! ya.m ta.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m palokadhamma.m, ta.m vata maa palujjiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato ye mahantataraa khandhaa te palujjeyyu.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, mahato ^a^T5.0219^ea^ bhikkhusa"nghassa ti.t.thato saaravato saariputtamoggallaanaa parinibbutaa. ta.m kutettha, bhikkhave, labbhaa! ya.m ta.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m palokadhamma.m, ta.m vata maa palujjiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, attadiipaa viharatha attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii ^a^V3.0240^ea^ viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no. ye ^a^P5.0165^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi vaa mamaccaye vaa attadiipaa viharissanti attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa; tamatagge mete, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu bhavissanti ye keci sikkhaakaamaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M3.0143^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa baahiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa baahiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m ^a^T5.0220^ea^ sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``tasmaatiha tva.m, baahiya, aadimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. ko caadi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? siila~nca suvisuddha.m, di.t.thi ca ujukaa. yato ca kho te, baahiya, siila~nca suvisuddha.m bhavissati, di.t.thi ca ujukaa, tato tva.m, baahiya, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaaveyyaasi''.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? idha, tva.m, baahiya, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. yato kho tva.m, baahiya, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaavessasi, tato tuyha.m, baahiya, yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagamissati, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaanii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^P5.0166^ea^ kho aayasmaa baahiyo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa baahiyo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva ^a^V3.0241^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi ^a^T5.0221^ea^. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa baahiyo arahata.m ahosiiti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa uttiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa uttiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato ^a^M3.0144^ea^ dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``tasmaatiha tva.m, uttiya, aadimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. ko caadi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? siila~nca suvisuddha.m, di.t.thi ca ujukaa. yato ca kho te, uttiya, siila~nca suvisuddha.m bhavissati, di.t.thi ca ujukaa, tato tva.m, uttiya, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaaveyyaasi''.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? idha tva.m, uttiya, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. yato kho tva.m, uttiya, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaavessasi, tato tva.m, uttiya, gamissasi maccudheyyassa paara''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa uttiyo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa ^a^T5.0222^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa uttiyo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa uttiyo arahata.m ahosiiti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V3.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyanti takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ime ^a^P5.0167^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyanti takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M3.0145^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ekaayano aya.m maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m ^a^T5.0223^ea^ attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? kaaye vaa bhikkhu kaayaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vaa bhikkhu...pe0... citte vaa bhikkhu...pe0... dhammesu vaa bhikkhu dhammaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ekaayano aya.m maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti.

[03] atha kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa ^a^V3.0243^ea^ puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- brahmaloke antarahito bhagavato purato paaturahosi. atha kho brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata! ekaayano aya.m, bhante, maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa'' ^a^P5.0168^ea^.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? kaaye vaa, bhante, bhikkhu kaayaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa ^a^T5.0224^ea^, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vaa, bhante, bhikkhu...pe0... citte vaa, bhante, bhikkhu...pe0... dhammesu vaa, bhante, bhikkhu dhammaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ekaayano aya.m, bhante, maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ^a^M3.0146^ea^ ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca brahmaa sahampati. ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
[21] ``ekaayana.m jaatikhayantadassii, magga.m pajaanaati hitaanukampii.
[22] etena maggena tari.msu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha''nti.. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sumbhesu viharati sedaka.m naama sumbhaana.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, ca.n.daalava.msiko ca.n.daalava.msa.m ussaapetvaa medakathaalika.m antevaasi.m aamantesi -- `ehi tva.m, samma medakathaalike, ca.n.daalava.msa.m abhiruhitvaa mama uparikhandhe ti.t.thaahii'ti. `eva.m, aacariyaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, medakathaalikaa antevaasii ca.n.daalava.msikassa pa.tissutvaa ca.n.daalava.msa.m abhiruhitvaa aacariyassa uparikhandhe a.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, ca.n.daalava.msiko medakathaalika.m antevaasi.m etadavoca -- `tva.m, samma ^a^V3.0244^ea^ medakathaalike, mama.m rakkha, aha.m ta.m rakkhissaami. eva.m maya.m a~n~nama~n~na.m ^a^P5.0169^ea^ guttaa a~n~nama~n~na.m rakkhitaa ^a^T5.0225^ea^ sippaani ceva dassessaama, laabha~nca {laabhe ca (sii0)} lacchaama, sotthinaa ca ca.n.daalava.msaa orohissaamaa'ti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, medakathaalikaa antevaasii ca.n.daalava.msika.m etadavoca -- `na kho paneta.m, aacariya, eva.m bhavissati. tva.m, aacariya, attaana.m rakkha, aha.m attaana.m rakkhissaami. eva.m maya.m attaguttaa attarakkhitaa sippaani ceva dassessaama, laabha~nca lacchaama, sotthinaa ca ca.n.daalava.msaa orohissaamaa'''ti. ``so tattha ~naayo''ti bhagavaa etadavoca, ``yathaa medakathaalikaa antevaasii aacariya.m avoca. attaana.m, bhikkhave, rakkhissaamiiti satipa.t.thaana.m sevitabba.m; para.m rakkhissaamiiti satipa.t.thaana.m sevitabba.m. attaana.m, bhikkhave, rakkhanto para.m rakkhati, para.m rakkhanto attaana.m rakkhati''.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M3.0147^ea^, bhikkhave, attaana.m rakkhanto para.m rakkhati? aasevanaaya, bhaavanaaya, bahuliikammena -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, attaana.m rakkhanto para.m rakkhati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, para.m rakkhanto attaana.m rakkhati? khantiyaa, avihi.msaaya, mettacittataaya, anudayataaya -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, para.m rakkhanto attaana.m rakkhati. attaana.m, bhikkhave, rakkhissaamiiti satipa.t.thaana.m sevitabba.m; para.m rakkhissaamiiti satipa.t.thaana.m sevitabba.m. attaana.m, bhikkhave, rakkhanto para.m rakkhati, para.m rakkhanto attaana.m rakkhatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0226^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sumbhesu viharati sedaka.m naama sumbhaana.m nigamo. tatra ^a^P5.0170^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, `janapadakalyaa.nii, janapadakalyaa.nii'ti kho, bhikkhave, mahaajanakaayo sannipateyya. `saa kho panassa janapadakalyaa.nii paramapaasaavinii nacce, paramapaasaavinii giite. janapadakalyaa.nii naccati gaayatii'ti kho, bhikkhave, bhiyyosomattaaya mahaajanakaayo ^a^V3.0245^ea^ sannipateyya. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhappa.tikuulo. tamena.m eva.m vadeyya -- `aya.m te, ambho purisa, samatittiko telapatto antarena ca mahaasamajja.m antarena ca janapadakalyaa.niyaa pariharitabbo. puriso ca te ukkhittaasiko pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhissati. yattheva na.m thokampi cha.d.dessati tattheva te siro paatessatii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso amu.m telapatta.m amanasikaritvaa bahiddhaa pamaada.m aahareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``upamaa kho myaaya.m, bhikkhave, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. aya.m cevettha attho -- samatittiko telapattoti kho, bhikkhave, kaayagataaya eta.m satiyaa adhivacana.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kaayagataa sati no bhaavitaa ^a^T5.0227^ea^ bhavissati bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa ^a^M3.0148^ea^ anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa'ti. eva~nhi kho, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dasama.m.
[06] naalandavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] mahaapuriso ^a^P5.0171^ea^ naalanda.m, cundo cela~nca baahiyo.
[22] uttiyo ariyo brahmaa, sedaka.m janapadena caati..

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0228^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca aanando aayasmaa ca bhaddo paa.taliputte viharanti kukku.taaraame. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddo saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa bhaddo ^a^V3.0246^ea^ aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``yaanimaani, aavuso aananda, kusalaani siilaani vuttaani bhagavataa, imaani kusalaani siilaani kimatthiyaani vuttaani bhagavataa''ti?

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, aavuso bhadda! bhaddako kho te, aavuso bhadda, umma"ngo {ummaggo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, aavuso bhadda, pucchasi -- `yaanimaani aavuso aananda, kusalaani siilaani vuttaani bhagavataa, imaani kusalaani siilaani kimatthiyaani vuttaani bhagavataa'''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``yaanimaani, aavuso bhadda, kusalaani siilaani vuttaani bhagavataa, imaani kusalaani siilaani yaavadeva catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaaya vuttaani bhagavataa''.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m ^a^T5.0229^ea^; vedanaasu...pe0... ^a^M3.0149^ea^ citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. yaanimaani ^a^P5.0172^ea^, aavuso bhadda, kusalaani siilaani vuttaani bhagavataa, imaani kusalaani siilaani yaavadeva imesa.m catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaaya vuttaani bhagavataa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ ta.myeva nidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa bhaddo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, aavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti? ko panaavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti?

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, aavuso bhadda! bhaddako kho te, aavuso bhadda, umma"ngo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, aavuso bhadda, pucchasi -- `ko nu kho, aavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti? ko panaavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko ^a^V3.0247^ea^ hotii'''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``catunna.m kho, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti. catunna~nca kho, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hoti''.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaavuso ^a^T5.0230^ea^, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa.m kho, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti. imesa~nca kho, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M3.0150^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa ca aanando aayasmaa ca bhaddo paa.taliputte ^a^P5.0173^ea^ viharanti kukku.taaraame. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddo saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa bhaddo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, aavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaparihaana.m hoti? ko nu kho, aavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaaparihaana.m hotii''ti?

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, aavuso bhadda! bhaddako kho te, aavuso bhadda, umma"ngo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, aavuso bhadda, pucchasi -- `ko nu kho, aavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaparihaana.m ^a^T5.0231^ea^ hoti? ko panaavuso aananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaaparihaana.m hotii'''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``catunna.m kho, aavuso ^a^V3.0248^ea^, satipa.t.thaanaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa saddhammaparihaana.m hoti. catunna~nca kho, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa saddhammaaparihaana.m hoti''.

[01] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa.m kho, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa saddhammaparihaana.m hoti. imesa~nca kho, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa saddhammaaparihaana.m hotii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu ^a^P5.0174^ea^ ...pe0... citte ^a^M3.0151^ea^ ...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho a~n~nataro braahma.no yena ^a^T5.0232^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti? ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti?

[03] ``catunna.m ^a^V3.0249^ea^ kho, braahma.na, satipa.t.thaanaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti. catunna~nca kho, braahma.na, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hoti.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idha, braahma.na, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa.m kho, braahma.na, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m abhaavitattaa abahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti. imesa~nca kho, braahma.na, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m ^a^T5.0233^ea^, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M3.0152^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano aayasmaa ca anuruddho saakete viharanti ka.n.dakiivane {ka.n.takiivane (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. atha kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thitaa yenaayasmaa aniruddho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa anuruddhena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^P5.0175^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ```sekho, sekho'ti {sekkho sekkhoti (syaa0 ka.m0)}, aavuso anuruddha, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, sekho hotii''ti? ``catunna.m kho, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m padesa.m bhaavitattaa sekho hoti''.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... ^a^V3.0250^ea^ citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa.m kho, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m padesa.m bhaavitattaa sekho hotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ ta.myeva nidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ```asekho ^a^T5.0234^ea^, asekho'ti, aavuso anuruddha, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, asekho hotii''ti? ``catunna.m kho, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m samatta.m bhaavitattaa asekho hoti''.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa.m kho ^a^M3.0153^ea^, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m samatta.m bhaavitattaa asekho hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ ta.myeva nidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``katamesa.m, aavuso anuruddha, dhammaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m {mahaabhi~n~naata.m (pii0)} patto''ti? ``catunna.m ^a^P5.0176^ea^, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto''.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaaha.m, aavuso, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa.m khvaaha.m, aavuso ^a^V3.0251^ea^, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto. imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa sahassa.m loka.m ^a^T5.0235^ea^ abhijaanaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena siriva.d.dho {siriiva.d.dho (ka0)} gahapati aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho siriva.d.dho gahapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena aayasmato aanandassa paade sirasaa vanda -- `siriva.d.dho, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato aanandassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa aanando yena siriva.d.dhassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so puriso siriva.d.dhassa gahapatissa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ^a^M3.0154^ea^ so puriso aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``siriva.d.dho, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano, so aayasmato aanandassa paade sirasaa vandati. eva~nca vadeti -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa aanando yena siriva.d.dhassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi ^a^P5.0177^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando tu.nhiibhaavena.

[01] atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^T5.0236^ea^ yena siriva.d.dhassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho aayasmaa aanando siriva.d.dha.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, gahapati, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kaaye kaayaanupassii viharissaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... ^a^V3.0252^ea^ citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharissaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa'nti. eva~nhi te, gahapati, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] ``yeme, bhante, bhagavataa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa desitaa sa.mvijjanti, te dhammaa {sa.mvijjante ratanadhammaa (sii0)} mayi, aha~nca tesu dhammesu sandissaami. aha~nhi, bhante, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. yaani cimaani, bhante, bhagavataa pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ^a^T5.0237^ea^ desitaani, naaha.m, bhante, tesa.m ki~nci attani appahiina.m samanupassaamii''ti. ``laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati! anaagaamiphala.m tayaa, gahapati, byaakata''nti. navama.m.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ ta.myeva ^a^M3.0155^ea^ ^a^P5.0178^ea^ nidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena maanadinno gahapati aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho maanadinno gahapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa...pe0... na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamoti. evaruupaaya caaha.m, bhante, dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. yaani cimaani, bhante, bhagavataa pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani desitaani, naaha.m, bhante, tesa.m ki~nci attani appahiina.m samanupassaamii''ti. ``laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati! anaagaamiphala.m tayaa, gahapati, byaakata''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0239^ea^. ```aya.m kaaye kaayaanupassanaa'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu ^a^P5.0179^ea^ dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. `saa kho panaaya.m kaaye kaayaanupassanaa bhaavetabbaa'ti me, bhikkhave...pe0... bhaavitaa'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi''.

[03] ```aya.m ^a^M3.0156^ea^ vedanaasu vedanaanupassanaa'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. `saa kho panaaya.m vedanaasu vedanaanupassanaa bhaavetabbaa'ti me, bhikkhave...pe0... bhaavitaa'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ ``yesa.m ^a^M3.0157^ea^ kesa~nci, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa viraddhaa, viraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo {ariyo a.t.tha"nkiko maggo (ka0) imasmi.m yeva sutte dissati a.t.tha"ngikotipada.m, na panaa~n~nattha iddhipaada anuruddhaadiisu} sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. yesa.m ^a^P5.0180^ea^ kesa~nci, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa aaraddhaa, aaraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii.
