[03] 401^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajaano. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m ^a^M3.0158^ea^; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.

[01] ``katha~nca ^a^T5.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaano hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viditaa vedanaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti ^a^P5.0181^ea^, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. viditaa vitakkaa uppajjanti ^a^V3.0256^ea^, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. viditaa sa~n~naa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaano hoti. sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajaano. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato yo kaayasmi.m chando so pahiiyati. chandassa pahaanaa amata.m sacchikata.m hoti.

[03] ``vedanaasu ^a^T5.0243^ea^ vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa vedanaasu vedanaanupassino viharato yo vedanaasu chando so pahiiyati. chandassa pahaanaa amata.m sacchikata.m hoti.

[03] ``citte ^a^M3.0159^ea^ ^a^P5.0182^ea^ cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa citte cittaanupassino viharato yo cittamhi chando so pahiiyati. chandassa pahaanaa amata.m sacchikata.m hoti.

[03] ``dhammesu ^a^V3.0257^ea^ dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharato yo dhammesu chando so pahiiyati. chandassa pahaanaa amata.m sacchikata.m hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa kaaye kaayaanupassino viharato kaayo pari~n~naato hoti. kaayassa pari~n~naatattaa amata.m sacchikata.m hoti.

[03] ``vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa vedanaasu vedanaanupassino viharato vedanaa pari~n~naataa honti. vedanaana.m pari~n~naatattaa ^a^T5.0244^ea^ amata.m sacchikata.m hoti.

[03] ``citte cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa citte cittaanupassino viharato citta.m pari~n~naata.m hoti. cittassa pari~n~naatattaa amata.m sacchikata.m hoti.

[03] ``dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tassa dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharato dhammaa pari~n~naataa honti. dhammaana.m pari~n~naatattaa amata.m sacchikata.m hotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ ``catunna.m ^a^M3.0160^ea^, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavana.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha''. ``katamaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii ^a^V3.0258^ea^ viharati aataapii ^a^P5.0183^ea^ sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ ``satipa.t.thaana~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami satipa.t.thaanabhaavana~nca satipa.t.thaanabhaavanaagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m. ta.m su.naatha''. ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaana.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati...pe0... citte cittaanupassii viharati...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii ^a^T5.0245^ea^ sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaana.m''.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanabhaavanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samudayadhammaanupassii kaayasmi.m viharati, vayadhammaanupassii kaayasmi.m viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii kaayasmi.m viharati, aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. samudayadhammaanupassii vedanaasu viharati...pe0... samudayadhammaanupassii citte viharati... samudayadhammaanupassii dhammesu viharati, vayadhammaanupassii dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii dhammesu viharati, aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanabhaavanaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanabhaavanaagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanabhaavanaagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] ananussutavaggo catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] ananussuta.m ^a^M3.0161^ea^ ^a^V3.0259^ea^ ^a^P5.0184^ea^ viraago, viraddho bhaavanaa sati.
[22] a~n~naa chanda.m pari~n~naaya, bhaavanaa vibha"ngena caati..

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0246^ea^. ``catuusu, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa viharatha. maa vo amata.m panassa. katamesu catuusu? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesu, bhikkhave, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa viharatha. maa vo amata.m panassaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ ``catunna.m, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca desessaami. ta.m su.naatha. ko ca, bhikkhave, kaayassa samudayo? aahaarasamudayaa kaayassa samudayo; aahaaranirodhaa kaayassa attha"ngamo. phassasamudayaa vedanaana.m samudayo; phassanirodhaa vedanaana.m attha"ngamo. naamaruupasamudayaa cittassa samudayo; naamaruupanirodhaa cittassa attha"ngamo. manasikaarasamudayaa dhammaana.m samudayo; manasikaaranirodhaa dhammaana.m attha"ngamo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0260^ea^ ^a^P5.0185^ea^. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ekamidaaha.m, bhikkhave, samaya.m uruvelaaya.m viharaami najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `ekaayano ^a^T5.0247^ea^ aya.m maggo sattaana.m ^a^M3.0162^ea^ visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa'''.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? kaaye vaa bhikkhu kaayaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vaa bhikkhu vedanaanupassii vihareyya...pe0... citte vaa bhikkhu cittaanupassii vihareyya...pe0... dhammesu vaa bhikkhu dhammaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ekaayano aya.m maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- brahmaloke antarahito mama purato paaturahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yenaaha.m tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata! ekaayano aya.m, bhante, maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro ^a^P5.0186^ea^ satipa.t.thaanaa'''.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? kaaye ^a^T5.0248^ea^ vaa, bhante, bhikkhu kaayaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vaa...pe0... citte vaa ^a^V3.0261^ea^ ...pe0... dhammesu vaa, bhante, bhikkhu dhammaanupassii vihareyya aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ekaayano aya.m, bhante, maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti.
[03] ``idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati. ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
[21] `ekaayana.m jaatikhayantadassii, magga.m pajaanaati hitaanukampii.
[22] etena maggena tari.msu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha'''nti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ ``sato ^a^M3.0163^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti. sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. catuttha.m.
[03] 411^b^.^eb^ ```kusalaraasii'ti, bhikkhave, vadamaano cattaaro satipa.t.thaane sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, kusalaraasi, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? idha ^a^P5.0187^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T5.0249^ea^ kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... cittaanupassii...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii ^a^V3.0262^ea^ viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. `kusalaraasii'ti, bhikkhave, vadamaano ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, kusalaraasi, yadida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 412^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``tasmaatiha tva.m, bhikkhu, aadimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. ko caadi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? idha tva.m, bhikkhu, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharaahi aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhassu sikkhaapadesu. yato kho tva.m, bhikkhu, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharissasi aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu ^a^M3.0164^ea^ bhayadassaavii samaadaaya sikkhissu sikkhaapadesu; tato tva.m, bhikkhu, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaaveyyaasi''.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? idha tva.m, bhikkhu, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m ^a^T5.0250^ea^. yato kho tva.m, bhikkhu, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaavessasi, tato tuyha.m, bhikkhu, yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagamissati vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaanii''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha ^a^P5.0188^ea^ kho so bhikkhu eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^V3.0263^ea^ pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahata.m ahosiiti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``tasmaatiha tva.m, bhikkhu, aadimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. ko caadi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? idha tva.m, bhikkhu, kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaavessasi. vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m ^a^T5.0251^ea^ bhaavessasi. manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaavessasi. yato kho tva.m, bhikkhu, kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaavessasi, vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaavessasi, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaavessasi, tato tva.m, bhikkhu, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaaveyyaasi''.

[03] ``katame ^a^M3.0165^ea^ cattaaro? idha tva.m, bhikkhu, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaahi aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. yato kho tva.m, bhikkhu, siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaavessasi, tato tuyha.m, bhikkhu, yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagamissati vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu, no parihaanii''ti...pe0... a~n~nataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahata.m ahosiiti. sattama.m.

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^P5.0189^ea^, bhikkhave, anukampeyyaatha, ye ca kho sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m mittaa vaa amaccaa ^a^V3.0264^ea^ vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa, te vo, bhikkhave, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaaya samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa.

[03] ``katamesa.m, catunna.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ye, bhikkhave, anukampeyyaatha, ye ca sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m mittaa vaa ^a^T5.0252^ea^ amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa, te vo, bhikkhave, imesa.m catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavanaaya samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 415^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanaa. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naaya cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavetabbaa.

[01] ``katame cattaaro? idha bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imaasa.m kho, bhikkhave, tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naaya ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^M3.0166^ea^, bhikkhave aasavaa. katame tayo? kaamaasavo, bhavaasavo, avijjaasavo ^a^V3.0265^ea^ -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo aasavaa. imesa.m ^a^P5.0190^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m aasavaana.m pahaanaaya cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavetabbaa.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke ^a^T5.0253^ea^ abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m aasavaana.m pahaanaaya ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaavento cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu ^a^M3.0167^ea^ ...pe0... citte ^a^V3.0266^ea^ ...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaavento cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro''ti vitthaaretabba.m.

[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m assaada~nca {samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) sa.m0 ni0 2.175} aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca ^a^P5.0194^ea^ nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati ^a^V3.0270^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo ^a^T5.0257^ea^ niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa ^a^T5.0258^ea^ braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca panete ^a^P5.0195^ea^ aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti.

[03] ``ye ^a^V3.0271^ea^ ca kho keci {ye ca kho te (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) sa.m0 ni0 2.174}, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa; te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa saddhindriya.m nappajaananti, saddhindriyasamudaya.m nappajaananti, saddhindriyanirodha.m nappajaananti, saddhindriyanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti; viiriyindriya.m nappajaananti...pe0... satindriya.m nappajaananti ^a^M3.0172^ea^ ...pe0... samaadhindriya.m nappajaananti...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m nappajaananti, pa~n~nindriyasamudaya.m nappajaananti, pa~n~nindriyanirodha.m nappajaananti, pa~n~nindriyanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti, na me te, bhikkhave sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca panete aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m ^a^T5.0259^ea^ vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, saddhindriya.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu -- ettha saddhindriya.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, viiriyindriya.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu sammappadhaanesu -- ettha viiriyindriya.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ^a^T5.0260^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, satindriya.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu -- ettha satindriya.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, samaadhindriya.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu jhaanesu -- ettha samaadhindriya.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, pa~n~nindriya.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu ariyasaccesu -- ettha pa~n~nindriya.m da.t.thabba.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhindriya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m ^a^P5.0197^ea^ -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno ^a^M3.0173^ea^ sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhindriya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, viiriyindriya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, viiriyindriya.m.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhindriya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhindriya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, samaadhindriya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako vossaggaaramma.na.m karitvaa labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassa ekaggata.m. so vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ^a^T5.0263^ea^ ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, samaadhindriya.m.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m samattaa paripuurattaa araha.m hoti, tato mudutarehi antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii, tato mudutarehi sakadaagaamii hoti ^a^T5.0267^ea^, tato mudutarehi sotaapanno hoti, tato mudutarehi dhammaanusaarii hoti, tato mudutarehi saddhaanusaarii hoti. iti kho, bhikkhave, indriyavemattataa phalavemattataa hoti, phalavemattataa puggalavemattataa hotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m samattaa paripuurattaa araha.m hoti, tato mudutarehi arahattaphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi anaagaamii hoti, tato mudutarehi anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya ^a^T5.0268^ea^ pa.tipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sakadaagaamii hoti, tato mudutarehi sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sotaapanno hoti, tato mudutarehi sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno hoti. yassa kho, bhikkhave, imaani pa~ncindriyaani sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m natthi, tamaha.m `baahiro puthujjanapakkhe .thito'ti vadaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.
[03] 489^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```indriyasampanno, indriyasampanno'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hotii''ti? ``idha ^a^P5.0203^ea^, bhikkhu, bhikkhu saddhindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m, viiriyindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m, satindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m ^a^V3.0279^ea^, samaadhindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m, pa~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m. ettaavataa kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu indriyasampanno hotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 490^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa ^a^M3.0179^ea^ bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva ^a^T5.0269^ea^ dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^T5.0270^ea^, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m. yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m, neva ^a^P5.0204^ea^ taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m {abhisambuddho pacca~n~naasi.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. yato ca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya ^a^V3.0280^ea^ `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti {cetovimutti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthidaani punabbhavo'''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani tii.ni? ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m ^a^T5.0271^ea^, a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni indriyaanii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m samattaa paripuurattaa araha.m hoti, tato mudutarehi antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi ^a^P5.0205^ea^ sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, tato mudutarehi uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii, tato mudutarehi sakadaagaamii hoti, tato mudutarehi ekabiijii {ekabiiji (ka0)} hoti, tato mudutarehi kola.mkolo hoti, tato mudutarehi sattakkhattuparamo hoti, tato mudutarehi dhammaanusaarii hoti, tato mudutarehi saddhaanusaarii hotii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani cha? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m ^a^V3.0281^ea^, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cha indriyaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani cha? cakkhundriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m. yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m ^a^T5.0272^ea^ pajaanaati -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani ^a^M3.0181^ea^, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani cha? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa anupaadaavimutto hoti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto'''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani cha? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m. yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m ^a^P5.0206^ea^, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassa ma.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca ^a^V3.0282^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti ^a^T5.0273^ea^ pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthidaani punabbhavo'''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani cha? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca panete aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa ^a^M3.0182^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti''. ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa, te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? sukhindriya.m, dukkhindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, domanassindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m. sukhavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhindriya.m. so sukhitova samaano `sukhitosmii'ti pajaanaati. tasseva sukhavedaniyassa ^a^V3.0289^ea^ phassassa nirodhaa `ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m sukhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppanna.m sukhindriya.m ta.m nirujjhati, ta.m vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``dukkhavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhindriya.m. so dukkhitova samaano `dukkhitosmii'ti pajaanaati. tasseva dukkhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa `ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m dukkhavedaniya.m phassa.m ^a^P5.0212^ea^ pa.ticca uppanna.m dukkhindriya.m ta.m nirujjhati, ta.m vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``somanassavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati somanassindriya.m. so sumanova samaano `sumanosmii'ti pajaanaati. tasseva somanassavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa `ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m somanassavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppanna.m somanassindriya.m ta.m nirujjhati, ta.m vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``domanassavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati domanassindriya.m. so dummanova samaano `dummanosmii'ti pajaanaati. tasseva domanassavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa `ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m domanassavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppanna.m domanassindriya.m ta.m nirujjhati, ta.m ^a^T5.0282^ea^ vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``upekkhaavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati upekkhindriya.m. so upekkhakova samaano `upekkhakosmii'ti pajaanaati. tasseva upekkhaavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa `ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m upekkhaavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppanna.m upekkhindriya.m ta.m nirujjhati, ta.m vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dvinna.m ka.t.thaana.m sa"ngha.t.tanasamodhaanaa {sa.mgha.t.tanaasamodhaanaa (pii0 ka0), sa.mgha.tanasamodhaanaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} usmaa jaayati, tejo abhinibbattati; tesa.myeva ka.t.thaana.m naanaabhaavaavinikkhepaa yaa ^a^M3.0188^ea^ {naanaabhaavanikkhepaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} tajjaa usmaa saa nirujjhati saa vuupasammati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, sukhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhindriya.m. so sukhitova samaano `sukhitosmii'ti pajaanaati. tasseva sukhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa `ya.m tajja.m ^a^V3.0290^ea^ vedayita.m sukhavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhindriya.m ta.m nirujjhati ^a^P5.0213^ea^, ta.m vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``dukkhavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca...pe0... somanassavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca...pe0... domanassavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca...pe0... upekkhaavedaniya.m, bhikkhave, phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati upekkhindriya.m. so upekkhakova samaano `upekkhakosmii'ti pajaanaati. tasseva upekkhaavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhaa `ya.m tajja.m vedayita.m upekkhaavedaniya.m phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati upekkhindriya.m ta.m nirujjhati, ta.m vuupasammatii'ti pajaanaati''. navama.m.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? dukkhindriya.m ^a^T5.0283^ea^, domanassindriya.m, sukhindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m. idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati dukkhindriya.m. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppanna.m kho me ida.m dukkhindriya.m, ta~nca kho sanimitta.m sanidaana.m sasa"nkhaara.m sappaccaya.m. ta~nca animitta.m anidaana.m asa"nkhaara.m appaccaya.m dukkhindriya.m uppajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati'. so dukkhindriya~nca pajaanaati, dukkhindriyasamudaya~nca pajaanaati, dukkhindriyanirodha~nca pajaanaati, yattha cuppanna.m dukkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati ta~nca pajaanaati. kattha cuppanna.m dukkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, ettha cuppanna.m dukkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu a~n~naasi dukkhindriyassa nirodha.m, tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharati'''.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati domanassindriya.m. so ^a^P5.0214^ea^ eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppanna.m kho me ida.m domanassindriya.m, ta~nca kho sanimitta.m sanidaana.m sasa"nkhaara.m sappaccaya.m. ta~nca animitta.m anidaana.m asa"nkhaara.m appaccaya.m domanassindriya.m uppajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati' ^a^T5.0284^ea^. so domanassindriya~nca pajaanaati, domanassindriyasamudaya~nca pajaanaati, domanassindriyanirodha~nca pajaanaati, yattha cuppanna.m ^a^V3.0291^ea^ domanassindriya.m aparisesa.m ^a^M3.0189^ea^ nirujjhati ta~nca pajaanaati. kattha cuppanna.m domanassindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, ettha cuppanna.m domanassindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu a~n~naasi domanassindriyassa nirodha.m, tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharati'''.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati sukhindriya.m. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppanna.m kho me ida.m sukhindriya.m, ta~nca kho sanimitta.m sanidaana.m sasa"nkhaara.m sappaccaya.m. ta~nca animitta.m anidaana.m asa"nkhaara.m appaccaya.m sukhindriya.m uppajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati'. so sukhindriya~nca pajaanaati, sukhindriyasamudaya~nca pajaanaati, sukhindriyanirodha~nca pajaanaati, yattha cuppanna.m sukhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati ta~nca pajaanaati. kattha cuppanna.m sukhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, ettha ^a^T5.0285^ea^ cuppanna.m sukhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu a~n~naasi sukhindriyassa nirodha.m, tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharati'''.

[03] ``idha ^a^P5.0215^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati somanassindriya.m. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppanna.m kho me ida.m somanassindriya.m, ta~nca kho sanimitta.m sanidaana.m sasa"nkhaara.m sappaccaya.m. ta~nca animitta.m anidaana.m asa"nkhaara.m appaccaya.m somanassindriya.m uppajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati'. so somanassindriya~nca pajaanaati, somanassindriyasamudaya~nca pajaanaati, somanassindriyanirodha~nca pajaanaati, yattha cuppanna.m somanassindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati ta~nca pajaanaati. kattha cuppanna.m somanassindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, ettha cuppanna.m somanassindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu a~n~naasi somanassindriyassa nirodha.m, tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharati'''.

[03] ``idha ^a^V3.0292^ea^ ^a^M3.0190^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati upekkhindriya.m. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppanna.m kho me ida.m upekkhindriya.m, ta~nca kho sanimitta.m sanidaana.m sasa"nkhaara.m ^a^T5.0286^ea^ sappaccaya.m. ta~nca animitta.m anidaana.m asa"nkhaara.m appaccaya.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati'. so upekkhindriya~nca pajaanaati, upekkhindriyasamudaya~nca pajaanaati, upekkhindriyanirodha~nca pajaanaati, yattha cuppanna.m upekkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati ta~nca pajaanaati. kattha cuppanna.m upekkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, ettha cuppanna.m upekkhindriya.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu a~n~naasi ^a^P5.0216^ea^ upekkhindriyassa nirodha.m, tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharatii'''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 511^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0287^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito pacchaatape nisinno hoti pi.t.thi.m otaapayamaano.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa bhagavato gattaani paa.ninaa anomajjanto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante ^a^V3.0293^ea^, abbhuta.m, bhante! na ceva.m daani, bhante, bhagavato taava parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato, sithilaani ca gattaani sabbaani valiyajaataani, purato pabbhaaro ^a^M3.0191^ea^ ca kaayo, dissati ca indriyaana.m a~n~nathatta.m -- cakkhundriyassa sotindriyassa ghaanindriyassa jivhindriyassa kaayindriyassaa''ti.

[03] ``eva~nheta.m ^a^P5.0217^ea^, aananda, hoti -- jaraadhammo yobba~n~ne, byaadhidhammo aarogye, mara.nadhammo jiivite. na ceva taava parisuddho hoti chaviva.n.no pariyodaato, sithilaani ca honti gattaani sabbaani valiyajaataani, purato pabbhaaro ca kaayo, dissati ca indriyaana.m a~n~nathatta.m -- cakkhundriyassa sotindriyassa ghaanindriyassa jivhindriyassa kaayindriyassaa''ti.
[03] ``idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaa ca sugato ^a^T5.0288^ea^ athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``dhii ta.m jammi jare atthu, dubba.n.nakara.nii jare.
[22] taava manorama.m bimba.m, jaraaya abhimaddita.m..
[21] ``yopi vassasata.m jiive, sopi maccuparaaya.no {sabbe maccuparaayanaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}.
[22] na ki~nci parivajjeti, sabbamevaabhimaddatii''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 512^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho u.n.naabho braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho u.n.naabho braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, bho gotama, indriyaani naanaavisayaani naanaagocaraani, na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhonti. katamaani pa~nca? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m ^a^P5.0218^ea^. imesa.m nu kho, bho gotama, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m naanaavisayaana.m ^a^V3.0294^ea^ naanaagocaraana.m na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhontaana.m ki.m pa.tisara.na.m, ko ca nesa.m gocaravisaya.m paccanubhotii''ti?

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, braahma.na, indriyaani naanaavisayaani naanaagocaraani na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhonti. katamaani pa~nca? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m ^a^M3.0192^ea^, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m. imesa.m kho, braahma.na, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m naanaavisayaana.m naanaagocaraana.m ^a^T5.0289^ea^ na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhontaana.m mano pa.tisara.na.m, manova nesa.m gocaravisaya.m paccanubhotii''ti.

[03] ``manassa pana, bho gotama, ki.m pa.tisara.na''nti? ``manassa kho, braahma.na, sati pa.tisara.na''nti. ``satiyaa pana, bho gotama, ki.m pa.tisara.na''nti? ``satiyaa kho, braahma.na, vimutti pa.tisara.na''nti. ``vimuttiyaa pana, bho gotama, ki.m pa.tisara.na''nti? ``vimuttiyaa kho, braahma.na, nibbaana.m pa.tisara.na''nti. ``nibbaanassa pana, bho gotama, ki.m pa.tisara.na''nti? ``accayaasi {accasaraa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), ajjhapara.m (pii0 ka0)}, braahma.na, pa~nha.m, naasakkhi pa~nhassa pariyanta.m gahetu.m. nibbaanogadha~nhi, braahma.na, brahmacariya.m vussati nibbaanaparaaya.na.m nibbaanapariyosaana''nti.
[03] atha kho u.n.naabho braahma.no bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkante u.n.naabhe braahma.ne bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaare vaa kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m vaa {rasmiyo (syaa0 ka0)} paaciinavaatapaanaa suuriye uggacchante vaatapaanena rasmi {kuu.taagaara.m vaa kuu.taagaarasaala.m vaa uttaraaya (ka0 sii0)} pavisitvaa kvaassa {kaaya (syaa0 ka0)} pati.t.thitaa''ti? ``pacchimaaya.m, bhante, bhittiya''nti. ``evameva ^a^P5.0219^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, u.n.naabhassa braahma.nassa tathaagate saddhaa ^a^T5.0290^ea^ nivi.t.thaa muulajaataa pati.t.thitaa da.lhaa asa.mhaariyaa sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. imamhi ce, bhikkhave, samaye u.n.naabho braahma.no kaala"nkareyya, natthi sa.myojana.m yena sa.myojanena sa.myutto u.n.naabho braahma.no puna ima.m loka.m aagaccheyyaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 513^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V3.0295^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saakete viharati a~njanavane migadaaye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``atthi nu kho, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0193^ea^, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma yaani pa~ncindriyaani taani pa~nca balaani honti, yaani pa~nca balaani taani pa~ncindriyaani hontii''ti?

[03] ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``atthi, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma yaani pa~ncindriyaani taani pa~nca balaani honti, yaani pa~nca balaani taani pa~ncindriyaani honti''.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma yaani pa~ncindriyaani taani pa~nca balaani honti, yaani pa~nca balaani taani pa~ncindriyaani honti? ya.m, bhikkhave, saddhindriya.m ta.m saddhaabala.m, ya.m saddhaabala.m ta.m saddhindriya.m; ya.m viiriyindriya.m ta.m viiriyabala.m, ya.m viiriyabala.m ta.m viiriyindriya.m; ya.m satindriya.m ta.m satibala.m, ya.m satibala.m ta.m satindriya.m; ya.m samaadhindriya.m ta.m ^a^T5.0291^ea^ samaadhibala.m, ya.m samaadhibala.m ta.m samaadhindriya.m; ya.m pa~n~nindriya.m ta.m pa~n~naabala.m, ya.m pa~n~naabala.m ta.m pa~n~nindriya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa, tassa majjhe diipo. atthi, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma tassaa nadiyaa eko soto tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati {sa"nkha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. atthi pana, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma tassaa nadiyaa dve sotaani tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchanti.

[03] ``katamo ^a^P5.0220^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma tassaa nadiyaa eko soto tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati? ya~nca, bhikkhave, tassa diipassa purimante {puratthimante (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} udaka.m, ya~nca pacchimante udaka.m -- aya.m kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma tassaa nadiyaa eko soto tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma tassaa nadiyaa dve sotaani tveva ^a^V3.0296^ea^ sa"nkhya.m gacchanti? ya~nca, bhikkhave, tassa diipassa uttarante udaka.m, ya~nca dakkhi.nante udaka.m -- aya.m kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma tassaa nadiyaa dve sotaani tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchanti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ya.m saddhindriya.m ta.m saddhaabala.m, ya.m saddhaabala.m ta.m saddhindriya.m; ya.m viiriyindriya.m ta.m viiriyabala.m, ya.m viiriyabala.m ta.m viiriyindriya.m; ya.m satindriya.m ta.m satibala.m ^a^M3.0194^ea^, ya.m satibala.m ta.m satindriya.m; ya.m ^a^T5.0292^ea^ samaadhindriya.m ta.m samaadhibala.m, ya.m samaadhibala.m ta.m samaadhindriya.m; ya.m pa~n~nindriya.m ta.m pa~n~naabala.m, ya.m pa~n~naabala.m ta.m pa~n~nindriya.m. pa~ncanna.m, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 514^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbako.t.thake. tatra kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``saddahasi {saddahaasi (sii0 pii0)} tva.m, saariputta -- saddhindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana''nti?

[03] ``na ^a^P5.0221^ea^ khvaaha.m ettha, bhante, bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami -- saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m. yesa~nheta.m, bhante, a~n~naata.m assa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m {apassita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), aphusita.m (pii0)} pa~n~naaya, te tattha paresa.m saddhaaya gaccheyyu.m -- saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m. yesa~nca kho eta.m, bhante, ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya, nikka"nkhaa te tattha nibbicikicchaa -- saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m. mayha~nca kho eta.m, bhante, ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya. nikka"nkhavaaha.m ^a^T5.0293^ea^ tattha nibbicikiccho saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yesa~nheta.m, saariputta, a~n~naata.m assa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m ^a^V3.0297^ea^ aphassita.m pa~n~naaya, te tattha paresa.m saddhaaya gaccheyyu.m -- saddhindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m. yesa~nca kho eta.m, saariputta, ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya, nikka"nkhaa te tattha nibbicikicchaa ^a^M3.0195^ea^ -- saddhindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m ^a^P5.0222^ea^ amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``katina.m nu kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti?

[03] bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``ekassa kho, bhikkhave, indriyassa bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamiiti. katamassa ekassa pa~n~nindriyassa pa~n~navato ^a^T5.0294^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa tadanvayaa saddhaa sa.n.thaati, tadanvaya.m viiriya.m sa.n.thaati, tadanvayaa sati sa.n.thaati, tadanvayo samaadhi sa.n.thaati. imassa kho, bhikkhave, ekassa indriyassa bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 516^b^.^eb^ ta.myeva nidaana.m. ``katina.m nu kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``dvinna.m ^a^P5.0223^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti ^a^V3.0298^ea^ -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamiiti. katamesa.m dvinna.m? ariyaaya ca pa~n~naaya, ariyaaya ca vimuttiyaa. yaa hissa, bhikkhave, ariyaa pa~n~naa tadassa pa~n~nindriya.m. yaa hissa, bhikkhave, ariyaa vimutti tadassa samaadhindriya.m. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, dvinna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m ^a^M3.0196^ea^ brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ ta.myeva nidaana.m. ``katina.m nu kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa ^a^T5.0295^ea^ bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``catunna.m kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamiiti. katamesa.m catunna.m? viiriyindriyassa, satindriyassa, samaadhindriyassa, pa~n~nindriyassa -- imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 518^b^.^eb^ ta.myeva nidaana.m. ``katina.m nu kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``pa~ncanna.m kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamiiti. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? saddhindriyassa ^a^P5.0224^ea^, viiriyindriyassa, satindriyassa, samaadhindriyassa, pa~n~nindriyassa -- imesa.m ^a^T5.0296^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa ^a^V3.0299^ea^ khii.naasavo bhikkhu a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmataa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena a~n~naa byaakataa hoti -- ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m ^a^M3.0197^ea^, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii''ti. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``aayasmataa, bhante, pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena a~n~naa byaakataa -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamiiti. ki.m nu kho, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaanena aayasmataa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena a~n~naa byaakataa -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti?

[01] ``ti.n.nanna.m kho, bhikkhave, indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena bhikkhunaa a~n~naa byaakataa -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamiiti. katamesa.m ti.n.nanna.m? satindriyassa, samaadhindriyassa, pa~n~nindriyassa -- imesa.m ^a^T5.0297^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.nanna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena bhikkhunaa a~n~naa byaakataa -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamiiti. imaani ca, bhikkhave, tii.nindriyaani kimantaani? khayantaani. kissa khayantaani? jaatijaraamara.nassa. `jaatijaraamara.na.m khaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, sampassamaanena pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena ^a^P5.0225^ea^ bhikkhunaa a~n~naa byaakataa -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 520^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V3.0300^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"ngesu viharati aapa.na.m naama a"ngaana.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``yo so, saariputta, ariyasaavako tathaagate ekantagato {ekantigato (sii0)} abhippasanno, na so tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa ka"nkheyya vaa vicikiccheyya vaa''ti?

[03] ``yo so, bhante, ariyasaavako tathaagate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa ka"nkheyya vaa vicikiccheyya vaa. saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasaavakassa eva.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m ^a^M3.0198^ea^ aaraddhaviiriyo viharissati -- akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. ya.m hissa, bhante, viiriya.m tadassa viiriyindriya.m.

[03] ``saddhassa hi ^a^T5.0298^ea^, bhante, ariyasaavakassa aaraddhaviiriyassa eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m satimaa bhavissati, paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. yaa hissa, bhante, sati tadassa satindriya.m.

[03] ``saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasaavakassa aaraddhaviiriyassa upa.t.thitassatino eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m vossaggaaramma.na.m karitvaa labhissati samaadhi.m, labhissati cittassa ekaggata.m. yo hissa, bhante, samaadhi tadassa samaadhindriya.m.

[03] ``saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasaavakassa aaraddhaviiriyassa upa.t.thitassatino ^a^P5.0226^ea^ samaahitacittassa eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m eva.m pajaanissati -- anamataggo kho sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. avijjaaya tveva tamokaayassa asesaviraaganirodho santameta.m pada.m pa.niitameta.m pada.m, yadida.m -- sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m {nibbaananti (?)}. yaa hissa, bhante, pa~n~naa tadassa pa~n~nindriya.m.

[03] ``saddho ^a^V3.0301^ea^ so {sa kho so (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhante, ariyasaavako eva.m padahitvaa padahitvaa eva.m saritvaa saritvaa eva.m samaadahitvaa samaadahitvaa eva.m pajaanitvaa pajaanitvaa eva.m abhisaddahati -- `ime kho te dhammaa ye me pubbe sutavaa ahesu.m. tenaaha.m ^a^T5.0299^ea^ etarahi kaayena ca phusitvaa viharaami, pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha {pa.tivijjha (sii0 ka0) tada.t.thakathaasu pana ativijjhitvaati va.n.nita.m} passaamii'ti. yaa hissa, bhante, saddhaa tadassa saddhindriya''nti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yo so, saariputta, ariyasaavako tathaagate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa ka"nkheyya vaa vicikiccheyya vaa. saddhassa hi, saariputta, ariyasaavakassa eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m aaraddhaviiriyo viharissati -- akusalaana.m ^a^M3.0199^ea^ dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. ya.m hissa, saariputta, viiriya.m tadassa viiriyindriya.m.

[03] ``saddhassa hi, saariputta, ariyasaavakassa aaraddhaviiriyassa eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m satimaa bhavissati, paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. yaa hissa, saariputta, sati tadassa satindriya.m.

[03] ``saddhassa hi, saariputta, ariyasaavakassa aaraddhaviiriyassa upa.t.thitassatino eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m vossaggaaramma.na.m karitvaa labhissati samaadhi.m, labhissati cittassa ekaggata.m. yo hissa, saariputta, samaadhi tadassa samaadhindriya.m.

[03] ``saddhassa hi, saariputta, ariyasaavakassa aaraddhaviiriyassa upa.t.thitassatino samaahitacittassa ^a^T5.0300^ea^ eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ya.m eva.m pajaanissati -- anamataggo kho sa.msaaro. pubbaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m sandhaavata.m sa.msarata.m. avijjaaya tveva tamokaayassa asesaviraaganirodho santameta.m pada.m pa.niitameta.m pada.m, yadida.m -- sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. yaa hissa, saariputta, pa~n~naa tadassa pa~n~nindriya.m.

[01] ``saddho so {sa kho so (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, saariputta, ariyasaavako eva.m padahitvaa padahitvaa eva.m saritvaa saritvaa eva.m samaadahitvaa samaadahitvaa eva.m pajaanitvaa pajaanitvaa eva.m abhisaddahati -- `ime kho te ^a^V3.0302^ea^ dhammaa ye me pubbe sutavaa ahesu.m. tenaaha.m etarahi ^a^P5.0227^ea^ kaayena ca phusitvaa viharaami, pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha {pa.tivijjha (ka0 sii0 ka0)} passaamii'ti. yaa hissa, saariputta, saddhaa tadassa saddhindriya''nti. dasama.m.
[06] jaraavaggo pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] jaraa u.n.naabho braahma.no, saaketo pubbako.t.thako.
[22] pubbaaraame ca cattaari, pi.n.dolo aapa.nena caati {saddhena te dasaati (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}..

[03] 521^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0301^ea^ ^a^M3.0200^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati saalaaya braahma.nagaame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchaanagataa paa.naa, siiho migaraajaa tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- thaamena javena suurena {suuriyena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaaya''.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa? saddhindriya.m, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; viiriyindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; satindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; samaadhindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; pa~n~nindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0228^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchaanagataa paa.naa, siiho migaraajaa tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- thaamena javena suurena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaayaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V3.0303^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa mallesu {mallakesu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), mallikesu (ka0)} viharati uruvelakappa.m ^a^T5.0302^ea^ naama mallaana.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa ariya~naa.na.m na uppanna.m hoti neva taava catunna.m indriyaana.m sa.n.thiti hoti, neva taava catunna.m indriyaana.m ava.t.thiti hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa ariya~naa.na.m uppanna.m hoti, atha catunna.m indriyaana.m sa.n.thiti hoti, atha catunna.m indriyaana.m ava.t.thiti hoti''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaavakiiva~nca kuu.taagaarassa kuu.ta.m na ussita.m hoti, neva taava gopaanasiina.m sa.n.thiti hoti, neva taava gopaanasiina.m ava.t.thiti hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa kuu.ta.m ussita.m ^a^M3.0201^ea^ hoti, atha gopaanasiina.m sa.n.thiti hoti, atha gopaanasiina.m ava.t.thiti hoti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaavakiiva~nca ariyasaavakassa ariya~naa.na.m na uppanna.m hoti, neva taava catunna.m indriyaana.m sa.n.thiti hoti, neva taava catunna.m indriyaana.m ava.t.thiti hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa ariya~naa.na.m uppanna.m hoti, atha catunna.m indriyaana.m...pe0... ava.t.thiti hoti.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? saddhindriyassa ^a^P5.0229^ea^, viiriyindriyassa, satindriyassa, samaadhindriyassa. pa~n~navato, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa tadanvayaa saddhaa sa.n.thaati, tadanvaya.m viiriya.m sa.n.thaati, tadanvayaa sati sa.n.thaati, tadanvayo samaadhi sa.n.thaatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0303^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``atthi nu kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhuumiya.m .thito `sekhosmii'ti pajaaneyya, asekho bhikkhu asekhabhuumiya.m .thito `asekhosmii'ti pajaaneyyaa''ti?

[03] bhagava.mmuulakaa ^a^V3.0304^ea^ no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... ``atthi, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhuumiya.m .thito `sekhosmii'ti pajaaneyya, asekho bhikkhu asekhabhuumiya.m .thito `asekhosmii'ti pajaaneyya''.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhuumiya.m .thito `sekhosmii'ti pajaanaati? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhuumiya.m .thito `sekhosmii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `atthi nu kho ito bahiddhaa a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yo eva.m bhuuta.m taccha.m tatha.m dhamma.m ^a^M3.0202^ea^ deseti ^a^P5.0230^ea^ yathaa bhagavaa'ti? so eva.m pajaanaati -- `natthi kho ito bahiddhaa a~n~no sama.no vaa ^a^T5.0304^ea^ braahma.no vaa yo eva.m bhuuta.m taccha.m tatha.m dhamma.m deseti yathaa bhagavaa'ti. ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhuumiya.m .thito `sekhosmii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu pa~ncindriyaani pajaanaati -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m -- ya.mgatikaani ya.mparamaani ya.mphalaani ya.mpariyosaanaani. na heva kho kaayena phusitvaa viharati; pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha passati. ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma sekho bhikkhu sekhabhuumiya.m .thito `sekhosmii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma asekho bhikkhu asekhabhuumiya.m .thito `asekhosmii'ti pajaanaati? idha, bhikkhave, asekho bhikkhu pa~ncindriyaani pajaanaati -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m -- ya.mgatikaani ya.mparamaani ya.mphalaani ya.mpariyosaanaani. kaayena ca phusitvaa viharati; pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha ^a^V3.0305^ea^ passati. ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma asekho bhikkhu asekhabhuumiya.m .thito `asekhosmii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, asekho bhikkhu cha indriyaani pajaanaati. `cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m -- imaani kho cha indriyaani sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m ^a^T5.0305^ea^ aparisesa.m nirujjhissanti, a~n~naani ca cha indriyaani na kuhi~nci kismi~nci uppajjissantii'ti pajaanaati. ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma asekho bhikkhu asekhabhuumiya.m .thito `asekhosmii'ti pajaanaatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 524^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0231^ea^, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici ja"ngalaana.m {ja"ngamaana.m (sii0 pii0)} paa.naana.m padajaataani sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti, hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- mahantattena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici padaani bodhaaya sa.mvattanti ^a^M3.0203^ea^, pa~n~nindriya.m pada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaaya. katamaani ca, bhikkhave, padaani bodhaaya sa.mvattanti? saddhindriya.m, bhikkhave, pada.m, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; viiriyindriya.m pada.m, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; satindriya.m pada.m, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; samaadhindriya.m pada.m, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati; pa~n~nindriya.m pada.m, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici ja"ngalaana.m paa.naana.m padajaataani sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti, hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- mahantattena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici padaani bodhaaya sa.mvattanti, pa~n~nindriya.m pada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaayaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci saaragandhaa, lohitacandana.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa ^a^T5.0306^ea^, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaaya. katame ca, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa? saddhindriya.m, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. viiriyindriya.m...pe0... satindriya.m ^a^V3.0306^ea^ ...pe0... samaadhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci saaragandhaa, lohitacandana.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaayaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ ``ekadhamme ^a^P5.0232^ea^ pati.t.thitassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani honti subhaavitaani. katamasmi.m ekadhamme? appamaade. katamo ca bhikkhave, appamaado? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu citta.m rakkhati aasavesu ca saasavesu ca dhammesu. tassa citta.m rakkhato aasavesu ca saasavesu ca dhammesu saddhindriyampi bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. viiriyindriyampi bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. satindriyampi bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. samaadhindriyampi bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. pa~n~nindriyampi bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme pati.t.thitassa bhikkhuno pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani honti subhaavitaanii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M3.0204^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha kho ^a^T5.0307^ea^ bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani amatogadhaani honti amataparaaya.naani amatapariyosaanaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m. viiriyindriya.m...pe0... satindriya.m...pe0... samaadhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m. imaani pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani amatogadhaani honti amataparaaya.naani amatapariyosaanaanii''ti.

[03] atha kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa ^a^V3.0307^ea^ puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya; evameva brahmaloke antarahito bhagavato purato paaturahosi. atha ^a^P5.0233^ea^ kho brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m sugata! pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani amatogadhaani honti amataparaaya.naani amatapariyosaanaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaavita.m bahuliikata.m amatogadha.m hoti amataparaaya.na.m amatapariyosaana.m. imaani pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani amatogadhaani honti amataparaaya.naani amatapariyosaanaani''.

[03] ``bhuutapubbaaha.m ^a^T5.0308^ea^, bhante, kassape sammaasambuddhe brahmacariya.m acari.m. tatrapi ma.m eva.m jaananti -- `sahako bhikkhu, sahako bhikkhuu'ti. so khvaaha.m, bhante, imesa.myeva pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa kaamesu kaamacchanda.m viraajetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m brahmaloka.m upapanno. tatrapi ma.m eva.m jaananti -- `brahmaa sahampati, brahmaa sahampatii'''ti. ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m sugata! ahameta.m jaanaami, ahameta.m passaami yathaa imaani pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani amatogadhaani honti amataparaaya.naani amatapariyosaanaanii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M3.0205^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate suukarakhataaya.m. tatra kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, saariputta, atthavasa.m sampassamaano khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti {pavattetiiti (sii0)}? ``anuttara~nhi ^a^P5.0234^ea^, bhante, yogakkhema.m sampassamaano khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! anuttara~nhi, saariputta, yogakkhema.m sampassamaano khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, saariputta, anuttaro yogakkhemo ya.m sampassamaano ^a^T5.0309^ea^ khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate ^a^V3.0308^ea^ vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti? ``idha, bhante, khii.naasavo bhikkhu saddhindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m, viiriyindriya.m bhaaveti...pe0... satindriya.m bhaaveti...pe0... samaadhindriya.m bhaaveti...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m. aya.m kho, bhante, anuttaro yogakkhemo ya.m sampassamaano khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! eso hi, saariputta, anuttaro yogakkhemo ya.m sampassamaano khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, saariputta, paramanipaccakaaro ya.m khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti? ``idha, bhante, khii.naasavo bhikkhu satthari sagaaravo viharati sappatisso {sappa.tisso (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, dhamme sagaaravo viharati sappatisso, sa"nghe sagaaravo viharati sappatisso, sikkhaaya sagaaravo viharati sappatisso, samaadhismi.m sagaaravo viharati sappatisso. aya.m kho, bhante, paramanipaccakaaro ya.m khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti. ``saadhu ^a^T5.0310^ea^ ^a^P5.0235^ea^ saadhu, saariputta! eso hi ^a^M3.0206^ea^, saariputta, paramanipaccakaaro ya.m khii.naasavo bhikkhu tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaasane vaa paramanipaccakaara.m pavattamaano pavattatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 529^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani anuppannaani uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani anuppannaani uppajjanti, naa~n~natra tathaagatassa paatubhaavaa arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V3.0309^ea^, bhikkhave, indriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani anuppannaani uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani anuppannaani uppajjanti, naa~n~natra sugatavinayaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0311^ea^ ^a^P5.0236^ea^. ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani sa.myojanappahaanaaya {sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya (syaa0 ka0)} sa.mvattanti. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani sa.myojanappahaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^M3.0207^ea^, bhikkhave, indriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani anusayasamugghaataaya sa.mvattanti. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho ^a^V3.0310^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani anusayasamugghaataaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani addhaanapari~n~naaya sa.mvattanti. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani addhaanapari~n~naaya sa.mvattantii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 534^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattanti. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattantii''ti.

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani sa.myojanappahaanaaya sa.mvattanti, anusayasamugghaataaya sa.mvattanti, addhaanapari~n~naaya ^a^T5.0312^ea^ sa.mvattanti, aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattanti. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani bhaavitaani bahuliikataani sa.myojanappahaanaaya sa.mvattanti, anusayasamugghaataaya sa.mvattanti, addhaanapari~n~naaya sa.mvattanti, aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 535^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 536^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V3.0311^ea^ ^a^M3.0208^ea^ ^a^P5.0237^ea^, bhikkhave, indriyaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncindriyaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa? di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, atha mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, atha pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii ^a^T5.0313^ea^ hoti, uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa ime satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi bhikkhave, ye keci jambudiipakaa rukkhaa, jambuu tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaaya. katame ca, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa? saddhindriya.m, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. viiriyindriya.m...pe0... satindriya.m...pe0... samaadhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci jambudiipakaa rukkhaa, jambuu tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaayaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0238^ea^, bhikkhave, ye keci devaana.m taavati.msaana.m rukkhaa, paarichattako tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaaya. katame ca, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa? saddhindriya.m ^a^V3.0312^ea^, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. viiriyindriya.m...pe0... satindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T5.0314^ea^ samaadhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0209^ea^, ye keci devaana.m taavati.msaana.m rukkhaa, paarichattako tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaayaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 539^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci asuraana.m rukkhaa, cittapaa.tali tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaaya. katame ca, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa? saddhindriya.m, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. seyyathaapi bhikkhave, ye keci asuraana.m rukkhaa, cittapaa.tali tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 540^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci supa.n.naana.m rukkhaa, kuu.tasimbalii {ko.tasimbali (syaa0 ka.m0)} tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaaya. katame ^a^P5.0239^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa? saddhindriya.m, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m bodhipakkhiyo ^a^T5.0315^ea^ dhammo, ta.m bodhaaya sa.mvattati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ye keci supa.n.naana.m rukkhaa, kuu.tasimbalii tesa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyaa dhammaa, pa~n~nindriya.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- bodhaayaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 541-552^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T5.0316^ea^ ^a^M3.0210^ea^, bhikkhave, ga"ngaa nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncindriyaani bhaavento pa~ncindriyaani bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncindriyaani bhaavento pa~ncindriyaani bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriya.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m, viiriyindriya.m...pe0... satindriya.m... samaadhindriya.m... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncindriyaani bhaavento pa~ncindriyaani bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro''ti. dvaadasama.m.
