[03] 651-662^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0319^ea^ ^a^V3.0318^ea^ ^a^M3.0214^ea^ ^a^P5.0244^ea^. tatra kho bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, sammappadhaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m ^a^T5.0320^ea^ dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro sammappadhaanaati''.

[03] 813^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^T5.0326^ea^ ^a^V3.0328^ea^ ^a^M3.0222^ea^ ^a^P5.0254^ea^ bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, cittasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 814^b^.^eb^ ``yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa viraddhaa, viraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa aaraddhaa, aaraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. yesa.m ^a^P5.0255^ea^ kesa~nci, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro iddhipaadaa viraddhaa, viraddho tesa.m ariyo maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii. yesa.m kesa~nci, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro iddhipaadaa aaraddhaa, aaraddho tesa.m ariyo ^a^T5.0327^ea^ maggo sammaa dukkhakkhayagaamii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 817^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa iddhipadesa.m abhinipphaadesu.m sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci ^a^P5.0256^ea^, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa iddhipadesa.m abhinipphaadessanti sabbe te ^a^T5.0328^ea^ catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa iddhipadesa.m abhinipphaadenti sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa.

[01] ``katamesa.m ^a^V3.0330^ea^ catunna.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa iddhipadesa.m abhinipphaadesu.m, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa iddhipadesa.m abhinipphaadessanti, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa iddhipadesa.m abhinipphaadenti, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 822^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha ^a^P5.0259^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ga.nhaahi, aananda, nisiidana.m. yena caapaala.m cetiya.m {paavaalacetiya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} tenupasa"nkamissaama divaavihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa nisiidana.m aadaaya bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi. atha kho bhagavaa yena caapaala.m cetiya.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T5.0333^ea^ ^a^M3.0227^ea^ pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho aanando bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``rama.niiyaa, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m gotamaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m sattamba.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m bahuputta.m cetiya.m {bahuputtakacetiya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}, rama.niiya.m saarandada.m cetiya.m {aanandacetiya.m (ka0), saanandara.m (ka0)}, rama.niiya.m caapaala.m cetiya.m. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa''ti.

[03] evampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavataa o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m; na bhagavanta.m yaaci -- ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m {sugato kappaavasesa.m (pii0 ka0) dii0 ni0 2.167} bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti yathaa ta.m maarena pariyu.t.thitacitto.

[03] dutiyampi ^a^V3.0334^ea^ kho bhagavaa...pe0... tatiyampi ^a^P5.0260^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``rama.niiyaa, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m gotamaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m sattamba.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m ^a^T5.0334^ea^ bahuputta.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m saarandada.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m caapaala.m cetiya.m. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa''ti.

[03] evampi ^a^M3.0228^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavataa o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m; na bhagavanta.m yaaci -- ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti yathaa ta.m maarena pariyu.t.thitacitto.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``gaccha kho tva.m, aananda, yassa daani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa, acirapakkante aayasmante aanande, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``parinibbaatu ^a^T5.0335^ea^ daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu daani sugato {parinibbaatu sugato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) evamuparipi}! parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato. bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima ^a^P5.0261^ea^, parinibbaayissaami yaava me bhikkhuu na saavakaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti {uttaani.m karissanti (ka0), uttaanikarissanti (pii0)}, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'''ti.

[03] santi kho pana, bhante, etarahi bhikkhuu bhagavato saavakaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa ^a^V3.0335^ea^ aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu daani, sugato! parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me bhikkhuniyo na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa ^a^M3.0229^ea^ visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti ^a^T5.0336^ea^ uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'''ti.

[03] ``santi kho pana, bhante, etarahi bhikkhuniyo bhagavato saavikaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu daani, sugato! parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me upaasakaa...pe0... yaava me upaasikaa na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'''ti.

[03] ``santi kho pana, bhante, etarahi upaasakaa...pe0... upaasikaa bhagavato saavikaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa ^a^P5.0262^ea^ saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo ^a^V3.0336^ea^, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti ^a^T5.0337^ea^ uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu daani, sugato! parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me ida.m brahmacariya.m na iddha~nceva bhavissati phiita~nca vitthaarita.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita'nti. tayida.m, bhante, bhagavato brahmacariya.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarita.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m ^a^M3.0230^ea^ yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu daani sugato. parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte bhagavaa maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca -- ``appossukko tva.m, paapima, hohi. na cira.m {nacirasseva (ka0)} tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m bhavissati. ito ti.n.na.m maasaana.m accayena tathaagato parinibbaayissatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa caapaale cetiye sato sampajaano aayusa"nkhaara.m ossaji. ossa.t.the ca {osajje pana (ka0)} bhagavataa aayusa"nkhaare mahaabhuumicaalo ahosi bhi.msanako lomaha.mso, devadundubhiyo {devadudrabhiyo (ka0)} ca phali.msu. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``tulamatula~nca ^a^T5.0338^ea^ ^a^P5.0263^ea^ sambhava.m, bhavasa"nkhaaramavassaji muni.
[22] ajjhattarato samaahito, abhindi kavacamivattasambhava''nti.. dasama.m.

[03] 823^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0339^ea^ ^a^V3.0337^ea^. ``pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo iddhipaadabhaavanaayaa'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `idha bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- iti me chando na ca atiliino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhitto bhavissati. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa ^a^M3.0231^ea^ adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti'''.

[03] ``viiriyasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m ^a^P5.0264^ea^ iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- iti me viiriya.m na ca atiliina.m bhavissati, na ca atippaggahita.m bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m bhavissati. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``cittasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m ^a^T5.0340^ea^ iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- iti me citta.m na ca atiliina.m bhavissati, na ca atippaggahita.m bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m bhavissati. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- iti me viima.msaa na ca atiliinaa bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitaa bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhittaa bhavissati ^a^V3.0338^ea^, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhittaa bhavissati. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhu, catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane ^a^M3.0232^ea^ {abhijjamaano (sii0 pii0 ka0)} gacchati, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena ^a^P5.0265^ea^ kamati, seyyathaapi ^a^T5.0341^ea^ pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasati {paraamasati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} parimajjati; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhu, catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati -- dibbe ca maanuse ca, duure santike caati.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhu, catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati. saraaga.m vaa citta.m `saraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati; viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m `viitaraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati; sadosa.m vaa citta.m `sadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati; viitadosa.m vaa citta.m `viitadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati; samoha.m vaa citta.m `samoha.m citta'nti pajaanaati; viitamoha.m vaa citta.m `viitamoha.m citta'nti pajaanaati; sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m `sa.mkhitta.m citta'nti pajaanaati; vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m `vikkhitta.m citta'nti pajaanaati; mahaggata.m vaa citta.m `mahaggata.m citta'nti pajaanaati; amahaggata.m vaa citta.m `amahaggata.m citta'nti pajaanaati; sauttara.m vaa citta.m `sauttara.m citta'nti pajaanaati; anuttara.m vaa citta.m `anuttara.m citta'nti pajaanaati; samaahita.m vaa citta.m `samaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati; asamaahita.m vaa citta.m `asamaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati; vimutta.m vaa citta.m `vimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati; avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^T5.0342^ea^ ^a^V3.0339^ea^ bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhu, catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi ^a^P5.0266^ea^ jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m {uppaadi.m (sii0)}; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo ^a^M3.0233^ea^ eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho bhikkhu, catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata, bhonto, sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana, bhonto, sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m ^a^T5.0343^ea^ anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[01] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhu, catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 824^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^P5.0267^ea^, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa. katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti ^a^V3.0340^ea^ mahaanisa.msaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- `iti me chando na ca atiliino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhitto bhavissati'. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa ^a^M3.0234^ea^ divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- `iti me viima.msaa na ca atiliinaa bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitaa ^a^T5.0344^ea^ bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhittaa bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhittaa bhavissati'. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa eva.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti...pe0....

[03] ``eva.m ^a^P5.0268^ea^ bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 825^b^.^eb^ ``chanda.m ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaaya labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassa ekaggata.m -- aya.m vuccati chandasamaadhi. so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. uppannaana.m paapakaana.m ^a^V3.0341^ea^ akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. uppannaana.m ^a^T5.0345^ea^ kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime vuccanti `padhaanasa"nkhaaraa'ti. iti aya~nca chando, aya~nca chandasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato iddhipaado'''.

[03] ``viiriya.m ^a^M3.0235^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaaya labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassa ekaggata.m -- aya.m vuccati `viiriyasamaadhi'. so anuppannaana.m...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime vuccanti `padhaanasa"nkhaaraa'ti. iti ida~nca viiriya.m, aya~nca viiriyasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `viiriyasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato iddhipaado'''.

[03] ``citta.m ^a^P5.0269^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaaya labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassa ekaggata.m -- aya.m vuccati `cittasamaadhi'. so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime vuccanti `padhaanasa"nkhaaraa'ti. iti ida~nca citta.m, aya~nca cittasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `cittasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato ^a^T5.0346^ea^ iddhipaado'''.

[03] ``viima.msa.m ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissaaya labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassa ekaggata.m -- aya.m vuccati `viima.msaasamaadhi'. so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime vuccanti `padhaanasa"nkhaaraa'ti ^a^V3.0342^ea^. iti aya~nca viima.msaa, aya~nca viima.msaasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato iddhipaado'''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 826^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu he.t.thaamigaaramaatupaasaade viharanti uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa bhantacittaa {vibbhantacittaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} paakatindriyaa.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0236^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m aamantesi -- ``ete kho, moggallaana, sabrahmacaarino he.t.thaamigaaramaatupaasaade ^a^P5.0270^ea^ viharanti uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa bhantacittaa paakatindriyaa. gaccha, moggallaana, te bhikkhuu sa.mvejehii''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ^a^T5.0347^ea^ bhagavato pa.tissutvaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaaresi {abhisa"nkharesi (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} yathaa paada"ngu.t.thakena migaaramaatupaasaada.m sa"nkampesi sampakampesi sampacaalesi. atha kho te bhikkhuu sa.mviggaa lomaha.t.thajaataa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! nivaata~nca vata aya~nca migaaramaatupaasaado gambhiiranemo sunikhaato acalo asampakampii, atha ca pana sa"nkampito sampakampito sampacaalito''ti!

[03] atha kho bhagavaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu tumhe, bhikkhave, sa.mviggaa lomaha.t.thajaataa ekamanta.m .thitaa''ti? ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m bhante! nivaata~nca vata aya~nca migaaramaatupaasaado gambhiiranemo sunikhaato acalo asampakampii, atha ca pana sa"nkampito sampakampito sampacaalito''ti! ``tumheva kho, bhikkhave, sa.mvejetukaamena moggallaanena bhikkhunaa paada"ngu.t.thakena migaaramaatupaasaado, sa"nkampito sampakampito sampacaalito. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katamesa.m dhammaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa moggallaano bhikkhu eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo''ti ^a^V3.0343^ea^? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa, bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.

[03] ``tena ^a^P5.0271^ea^ hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha. catunna.m kho, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaana.m ^a^T5.0348^ea^ bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa moggallaano bhikkhu eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo. katamesa.m catunna.m? idha, bhikkhave, moggallaano bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- `iti me viima.msaa na ca ^a^M3.0237^ea^ atiliinaa bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitaa bhavissati; na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhittaa bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhittaa bhavissati'. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa moggallaano bhikkhu eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo. imesa~nca pana, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa moggallaano bhikkhu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti...pe0... imesa~nca pana, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa moggallaano bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 827^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0349^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha ^a^P5.0272^ea^ kho u.n.naabho braahma.no yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho u.n.naabho braahma.no aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``kimatthiya.m nu kho, bho aananda, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti? ``chandappahaanattha.m kho, braahma.na, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti.
[03] ``atthi ^a^V3.0344^ea^ pana, bho aananda, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa chandassa pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, braahma.na, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa chandassa pahaanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana, bho aananda, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etassa chandassa pahaanaayaa''ti? ``idha, braahma.na, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- aya.m kho, braahma.na, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa etassa chandassa pahaanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^M3.0238^ea^ sante, bho aananda, santaka.m hoti no asantaka.m. chandeneva chanda.m pajahissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati''. ``tena hi, braahma.na, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa ta.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ^a^T5.0350^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, ahosi te pubbe chando `aaraama.m gamissaamii'ti? tassa te aaraamagatassa yo tajjo chando so pa.tippassaddho''ti? ``eva.m ^a^P5.0273^ea^, bho''. ``ahosi te pubbe viiriya.m `aaraama.m gamissaamii'ti? tassa te aaraamagatassa ya.m tajja.m viiriya.m ta.m pa.tippassaddha''nti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``ahosi te pubbe citta.m `aaraama.m gamissaamii'ti? tassa te aaraamagatassa ya.m tajja.m citta.m ta.m pa.tippassaddha''nti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``ahosi te pubbe viima.msaa `aaraama.m gamissaamii'ti? tassa te aaraamagatassa yaa tajjaa viima.msaa saa pa.tippassaddhaa''ti? ``eva.m, bho''.

[03] ``evameva kho, braahma.na, yo so bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, tassa yo pubbe chando ahosi arahattappattiyaa, arahattappatte {arahatte patte (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} yo tajjo chando so pa.tippassaddho; ya.m pubbe viiriya.m ahosi arahattappattiyaa, arahattappatte ya.m tajja.m viiriya.m ta.m pa.tippassaddha.m; ya.m pubbe citta.m ahosi arahattappattiyaa, arahattappatte ya.m tajja.m citta.m ta.m pa.tippassaddha.m; yaa pubbe viima.msaa ahosi arahattappattiyaa, arahattappatte yaa tajjaa viima.msaa saa pa.tippassaddhaa. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, iti eva.m sante, santaka.m vaa hoti no asantaka.m vaa''ti?

[03] ``addhaa, bho aananda, eva.m sante, santaka.m hoti ^a^T5.0351^ea^ no asantaka.m. abhikkanta.m, bho aananda, abhikkanta.m, bho aananda! seyyathaapi, bho aananda, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m ^a^V3.0345^ea^ vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa aanandena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bho aananda, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m aanando dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 828^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^M3.0239^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa mahiddhikaa ahesu.m mahaanubhaavaa, sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa mahiddhikaa bhavissanti mahaanubhaavaa, sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa mahiddhikaa mahaanubhaavaa, sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa.

[01] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idha ^a^P5.0274^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ^a^T5.0352^ea^ mahiddhikaa ahesu.m mahaanubhaavaa, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa mahiddhikaa bhavissanti mahaanubhaavaa, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa mahiddhikaa mahaanubhaavaa, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 829^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhosu.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa ahesu.m, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko ahesu.m; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaanaa agama.msu, seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0346^ea^ aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m aka.msu, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane {abhijjamaanaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} agama.msu, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kami.msu, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasi.msu {paraamasi.msu (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} parimajji.msu; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattesu.m, sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa.

[03] ``ye ^a^M3.0240^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhossanti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa bhavissanti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko bhavissanti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaanaa gamissanti ^a^T5.0353^ea^, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karissanti, seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0275^ea^ udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gamissanti, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamissanti, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasissanti parimajjissanti; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattissanti, sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhonti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa honti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko honti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaanaa gacchanti, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karonti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchanti, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamanti, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasanti {paraamasanti (syaa0 ka.m0)} parimajjanti; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattenti, sabbe te catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaati.

[01] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhosu.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa ahesu.m...pe0... ^a^T5.0354^ea^ yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattesu.m, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa.

[03] ``ye ^a^V3.0347^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhossanti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa bhavissanti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattissanti, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa.

[03] ``ye ^a^M3.0241^ea^ hi keci bhikkhave etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhonti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa honti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattenti, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 830^b^.^eb^ ``catunna.m, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati.

[01] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa ^a^P5.0276^ea^ anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.
[03] 831^b^.^eb^ ``iddhi.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami iddhipaada~nca iddhipaadabhaavana~nca ^a^T5.0355^ea^ iddhipaadabhaavanaagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m. ta.m su.naatha.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, iddhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhi.
[03] ``katamo ^a^V3.0348^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, iddhipaado? yo so, bhikkhave, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa iddhilaabhaaya iddhipa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhipaado.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, iddhipaadabhaavanaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi ...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhipaadabhaavanaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^M3.0242^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, iddhipaadabhaavanaagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhipaadabhaavanaagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti. navama.m.
[03] 832^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa''.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0356^ea^, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- `iti me chando na ^a^P5.0277^ea^ ca atiliino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhitto bhavissati'. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- `yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa ^a^V3.0349^ea^ tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa'. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti. viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- `iti me viima.msaa na ca atiliinaa bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitaa bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhittaa bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhittaa bhavissati'. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- `yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa'. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, atiliino chando? yo, bhikkhave, chando kosajjasahagato kosajjasampayutto -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atiliino chando.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, atippaggahito chando? yo, bhikkhave, chando uddhaccasahagato uddhaccasampayutto -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atippaggahito chando.

[03] ``katamo ^a^T5.0357^ea^ ^a^M3.0243^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitto chando? yo, bhikkhave, chando thinamiddhasahagato thinamiddhasampayutto -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitto chando.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa vikkhitto chando? yo, bhikkhave, chando bahiddhaa pa~nca kaamagu.ne aarabbha anuvikkhitto anuvisa.to -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa vikkhitto chando.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure? idha ^a^P5.0278^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pacchaapuresa~n~naa suggahitaa hoti sumanasikataa suupadhaaritaa suppa.tividdhaa pa~n~naaya. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta'nti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho viharati.

[01] ``katha~nca ^a^V3.0350^ea^ ^a^T5.0358^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yehi aakaarehi yehi li"ngehi yehi nimittehi divaa chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, so tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi ratti.m chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti; yehi vaa pana aakaarehi yehi li"ngehi yehi nimittehi ratti.m chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, so tehi aakaarehi tehi li"ngehi tehi nimittehi divaa chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa viharati.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M3.0244^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aalokasa~n~naa suggahitaa hoti divaasa~n~naa svaadhi.t.thitaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.
[03] ``katama~nca ^a^P5.0279^ea^, bhikkhave, atiliina.m viiriya.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, viiriya.m kosajjasahagata.m kosajjasampayutta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atiliina.m viiriya.m.
[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, atippaggahita.m viiriya.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, viiriya.m uddhaccasahagata.m uddhaccasampayutta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atippaggahita.m viiriya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m viiriya.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, viiriya.m ^a^T5.0359^ea^ thinamiddhasahagata.m thinamiddhasampayutta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m viiriya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m viiriya.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, viiriya.m bahiddhaa pa~nca kaamagu.ne aarabbha anuvikkhitta.m anuvisa.ta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m viiriya.m...pe0....

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti ^a^V3.0351^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aalokasa~n~naa suggahitaa hoti divaasa~n~naa svaadhi.t.thitaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.
[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, atiliina.m citta.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, citta.m kosajjasahagata.m kosajjasampayutta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atiliina.m citta.m.
[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, atippaggahita.m citta.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, citta.m uddhaccasahagata.m uddhaccasampayutta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atippaggahita.m citta.m.
[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m citta.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, citta.m thinamiddhasahagata.m thinamiddhasampayutta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitta.m citta.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^P5.0280^ea^, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m citta.m? ya.m, bhikkhave, citta.m bahiddhaa pa~nca kaamagu.ne aarabbha anuvikkhitta.m anuvisa.ta.m -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa vikkhitta.m citta.m...pe0... eva.m ^a^T5.0360^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.
[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, atiliinaa viima.msaa? yaa, bhikkhave, viima.msaa kosajjasahagataa kosajjasampayuttaa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atiliinaa viima.msaa.
[03] ``katamaa ^a^M3.0245^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, atippaggahitaa viima.msaa? yaa, bhikkhave, viima.msaa uddhaccasahagataa uddhaccasampayuttaa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, atippaggahitaa viima.msaa.
[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhittaa viima.msaa? yaa, bhikkhave, viima.msaa thinamiddhasahagataa thinamiddhasampayuttaa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhatta.m sa.mkhittaa viima.msaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa vikkhittaa viima.msaa? yaa, bhikkhave, viima.msaa bahiddhaa pa~nca kaamagu.ne aarabbha anuvikkhittaa anuvisa.taa -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhaa ^a^V3.0352^ea^ vikkhittaa viima.msaa...pe0... eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa eva.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi ^a^T5.0361^ea^ kaayena vasa.m vatteti. eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m ^a^P5.0281^ea^ pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] paasaadakampanavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] pubba.m mahapphala.m chanda.m, moggallaana~nca u.n.naabha.m.
[22] dve sama.nabraahma.naa bhikkhu, desanaa vibha"ngena caati..

[03] 833^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0362^ea^. ``pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `ko nu kho maggo, kaa pa.tipadaa iddhipaadabhaavanaayaa'ti ^a^M3.0246^ea^? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `idha bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- iti me chando na ca atiliino bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhitto bhavissati. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti ^a^V3.0353^ea^. viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- iti me viima.msaa na ca atiliinaa bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitaa bhavissati, na ca ajjhatta.m sa.mkhittaa bhavissati, na ca bahiddhaa vikkhittaa bhavissati. pacchaapuresa~n~nii ca viharati -- yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa, yathaa pacchaa tathaa pure; yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho; yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa' -- iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^P5.0282^ea^ bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m ^a^T5.0363^ea^ bahuliikatesu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti. eva.m bhaavitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catuusu iddhipaadesu eva.m bahuliikatesu, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. pa.thama.m.
[03] (chapi abhi~n~naayo vitthaaretabbaa).

[03] 834^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhijaanaati nu kho, bhante, bhagavaa iddhiyaa manomayena kaayena brahmaloka.m upasa"nkamitaa''ti? ``abhijaanaami khvaaha.m, aananda, iddhiyaa manomayena kaayena brahmaloka.m upasa"nkamitaa''ti. ``abhijaanaati pana, bhante, bhagavaa iminaa caatumahaabhuutikena kaayena iddhiyaa brahmaloka.m upasa"nkamitaa''ti ^a^M3.0247^ea^? ``abhijaanaami khvaaha.m, aananda, iminaa caatumahaabhuutikena {caatummahaabhuutikena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} kaayena iddhiyaa brahmaloka.m upasa"nkamitaa''ti.

[03] ``ya~nca kho, omaati, bhante, bhagavaa iddhiyaa manomayena kaayena brahmaloka.m upasa"nkamitu.m, ya~nca ^a^P5.0283^ea^ kho abhijaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa iminaa caatumahaabhuutikena kaayena iddhiyaa brahmaloka.m upasa"nkamitaa ^a^T5.0364^ea^, tayida.m, bhante, bhagavato acchariya~nceva abbhuta~ncaa''ti. ``acchariyaa ^a^V3.0354^ea^ ceva, aananda, tathaagataa acchariyadhammasamannaagataa ca, abbhutaa ceva, aananda, tathaagataa abbhutadhammasamannaagataa ca''.

[03] ``yasmi.m, aananda, samaye tathaagato kaayampi citte samodahati {samaadahati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} cittampi kaaye samodahati, sukhasa~n~na~nca lahusa~n~na~nca kaaye okkamitvaa viharati; tasmi.m, aananda, samaye tathaagatassa kaayo lahutaro ceva hoti mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca pabhassarataro ca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aananda, ayogu.lo divasa.m santatto lahutaro ceva hoti mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca pabhassarataro ca; evameva kho, aananda, yasmi.m samaye tathaagato kaayampi citte samodahati, cittampi kaaye samodahati, sukhasa~n~na~nca lahusa~n~na~nca kaaye okkamitvaa viharati; tasmi.m, aananda, samaye tathaagatassa kaayo lahutaro ceva hoti mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca pabhassarataro ca.

[03] ``yasmi.m, aananda, samaye tathaagato kaayampi citte samodahati, cittampi kaaye samodahati, sukhasa~n~na~nca lahusa~n~na~nca kaaye okkamitvaa viharati; tasmi.m, aananda, samaye tathaagatassa kaayo appakasireneva pathaviyaa vehaasa.m abbhuggacchati, so anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0284^ea^ ^a^T5.0365^ea^, aananda, tuulapicu vaa kappaasapicu vaa lahuko vaatuupaadaano appakasireneva pathaviyaa vehaasa.m abbhuggacchati; evameva kho, aananda, yasmi.m samaye tathaagato kaayampi citte samodahati, cittampi ^a^M3.0248^ea^ kaaye samodahati, sukhasa~n~na~nca lahusa~n~na~nca kaaye okkamitvaa viharati; tasmi.m, aananda, samaye tathaagatassa kaayo appakasireneva pathaviyaa vehaasa.m abbhuggacchati, so anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattetii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 835^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V3.0355^ea^, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi ...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 836^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m ^a^T5.0366^ea^ iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 837^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^P5.0285^ea^, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi ...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa bhikkhunaa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 838^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^M3.0249^ea^, bhikkhave, iddhipaadaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m ^a^V3.0356^ea^ iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi ...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro iddhipaadaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa.

[03] ``katame satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa? di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca {pa.tigacca (sii0), pa.tihacca (pii0)} a~n~na.m aaraadheti no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti; atha mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, no ce mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti; atha pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa antaraaparinibbaayii hoti, upahaccaparinibbaayii hoti, asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii hoti, uddha.msoto hoti akani.t.thagaamii. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa ime satta phalaa sattaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 839^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa ^a^T5.0367^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``katamaa nu kho, bhante ^a^P5.0286^ea^, iddhi, katamo iddhipaado, katamaa iddhipaadabhaavanaa, katamaa iddhipaadabhaavanaagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti? ``idhaananda, bhikkhu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti -- aya.m vuccataananda, iddhi''.
[03] ``katamo caananda, iddhipaado? yo, aananda, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa iddhilaabhaaya iddhipa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati -- aya.m vuccataananda, iddhipaado.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmato anuruddhassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama ^a^P5.0297^ea^ balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya ^a^T5.0380^ea^, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- aayasmato anuruddhassa sammukhe paaturahosi.
[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso anuruddha, bhikkhuno cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa aaraddhaa hontii''ti?

[03] ``idhaavuso ^a^V3.0368^ea^, bhikkhu ajjhatta.m kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. bahiddhaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. bahiddhaa vedanaasu vedanaanupassii ^a^M3.0260^ea^ viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ajjhattabahiddhaa vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.
[03] ``ajjhatta.m citte...pe0... bahiddhaa citte...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa citte cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m dhammesu...pe0... bahiddhaa dhammesu...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno ^a^T5.0381^ea^ cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa aaraddhaa hontii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 901^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa anuruddho saavatthiya.m viharati sutanutiire. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa anuruddhena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^P5.0298^ea^ nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavocu.m -- ``katamesa.m aayasmaa anuruddho dhammaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto''ti?

[03] ``catunna.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto. katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaaha.m, aavuso, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... ^a^V3.0369^ea^ citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- imesa.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto. imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa hiina.m dhamma.m hiinato abbha~n~naasi.m, majjhima.m dhamma.m majjhimato abbha~n~naasi.m, pa.niita.m dhamma.m pa.niitato abbha~n~naasi''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 902^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano saakete viharanti ka.n.dakiivane ^a^T5.0382^ea^. atha ^a^M3.0261^ea^ kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thitaa yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa anuruddhena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``sekhenaavuso anuruddha, bhikkhunaa katame dhammaa upasampajja vihaatabbaa''ti?

[03] ``sekhenaavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa upasampajja vihaatabbaa. katame cattaaro? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu ^a^P5.0299^ea^ ...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- sekhenaavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa upasampajja vihaatabbaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 903^b^.^eb^ saaketanidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m ^a^V3.0370^ea^ etadavoca -- ``asekhenaavuso anuruddha, bhikkhunaa katame dhammaa upasampajja vihaatabbaa''ti? ``asekhenaavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa upasampajja vihaatabbaa. katame cattaaro? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m ^a^T5.0383^ea^; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- asekhenaavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa upasampajja vihaatabbaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 904^b^.^eb^ saaketanidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``katamesa.m aayasmaa anuruddho dhammaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto''ti? ``catunna.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto ^a^M3.0262^ea^. katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaaha.m, aavuso, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- imesa.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto. imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa sahassa.m loka.m abhijaanaamii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 905^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P5.0300^ea^. tatra kho aayasmaa anuruddho bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhavo''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato anuruddhassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa anuruddho etadavoca --

[03] ``cattaarome ^a^V3.0371^ea^, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ta.nhakkhayaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati...pe0... ^a^T5.0384^ea^ vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- ime kho, aavuso, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ta.nhakkhayaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 906^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa anuruddho saavatthiya.m viharati sala.laagaare. tatra kho aayasmaa anuruddho bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, ga"ngaa nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa. atha mahaajanakaayo aagaccheyya kuddaalapi.taka.m {kuddaalapi.taka.m (bahuusu)} aadaaya -- `maya.m ima.m ga"ngaanadi.m pacchaaninna.m karissaama pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara'nti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso, api nu so mahaajanakaayo ga"ngaanadi.m pacchaaninna.m kareyya pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara''nti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``ga"ngaa, aavuso, nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa. saa na sukaraa pacchaaninna.m kaatu.m pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara.m. yaavadeva ca pana so mahaajanakaayo kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti.

[03] ``evameva ^a^M3.0263^ea^ kho, aavuso, bhikkhu.m cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaaventa.m cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bahuliikaronta.m raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa ^a^P5.0301^ea^ bhogehi abhiha.t.thu.m pavaareyyu.m -- `ehambho purisa, ki.m te ime kaasaavaa anudahanti? ki.m mu.n.do kapaalamanusa~ncarasi? ehi hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu pu~n~naani ca karohii'''ti.

[03] ``so vata, aavuso, bhikkhu cattaaro satipa.t.thaane ^a^T5.0385^ea^ bhaavento cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bahuliikaronto sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? ya~nhi ta.m, aavuso, citta.m diigharatta.m vivekaninna.m vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara.m ta.m vata hiinaayaavattissatiiti ^a^V3.0372^ea^ -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. katha~ncaavuso, bhikkhu cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaaveti, cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bahuliikarotiiti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati...pe0... vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bhaaveti, cattaaro satipa.t.thaane bahuliikarotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 907^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca saariputto vesaaliya.m viharanti ambapaalivane. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca --

[03] ``vippasannaani kho te, aavuso anuruddha, indriyaani, parisuddho mukhava.n.no pariyodaato. katamenaayasmaa anuruddho vihaarena etarahi bahula.m viharatii''ti? ``catuusu khvaaha.m, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto etarahi bahula.m viharaami. katamesu catuusu? idhaaha.m, aavuso, kaaye kaayaanupassii ^a^T5.0386^ea^ viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii ^a^M3.0264^ea^ sampajaano ^a^P5.0302^ea^ satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- imesu khvaaha.m, aavuso, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto etarahi bahula.m viharaami. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, so imesu catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto bahula.m viharatii''ti.
[03] ``laabhaa vata no, aavuso, suladdha.m vata no, aavuso! ye maya.m aayasmato anuruddhassa sammukhaava assumha aasabhi.m vaaca.m bhaasamaanassaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 908^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0373^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa anuruddho saavatthiya.m viharati andhavanasmi.m aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``katamenaayasmato anuruddhassa vihaarena viharato uppannaa saariirikaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thantii''ti? ``catuusu kho me, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittassa viharato uppannaa saariirikaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. katamesu catuusu? idhaaha.m, aavuso, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami...pe0... vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- imesu ^a^T5.0387^ea^ kho me, aavuso, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittassa viharato uppannaa saariirikaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thantii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] rahogatavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] rahogatena ^a^P5.0303^ea^ dve vuttaa, sutanu ka.n.dakii tayo.
[22] ta.nhakkhayasala.laagaara.m, ambapaali ca gilaananti..

[03] 909^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0388^ea^ ^a^M3.0265^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa anuruddho saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa ^a^V3.0374^ea^ anuruddhena saddhi.m...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``katamesa.m aayasmaa anuruddho dhammaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto''ti? ``catunna.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto. katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaaha.m, aavuso, kaaye kaayaanupassii viharaami...pe0... vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharaami aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m -- imesa.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto. imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa kappasahassa.m anussaraamii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 910^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhomi -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa homi...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattemii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 911^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca ^a^T5.0389^ea^ ^a^P5.0304^ea^ panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naami dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 912^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami ^a^M3.0266^ea^ -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m `saraaga.m ^a^V3.0375^ea^ citta'nti pajaanaami...pe0... avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaamii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 913^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 914^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 915^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa sabbatthagaaminippa.tipada.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti. sattama.m.
[03] 916^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa anekadhaatunaanaadhaatuloka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 917^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca ^a^T5.0390^ea^ ^a^P5.0305^ea^ panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa sattaana.m naanaadhimuttikata.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 918^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca ^a^V3.0376^ea^ panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m indriyaparopariyatta.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 919^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca ^a^M3.0267^ea^ panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 920^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraamii''ti. dvaadasama.m.

[03] 921^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane...pe0... iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaamii''ti. terasama.m.

[03] 922^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca panaaha.m, aavuso, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.the ^a^P5.0306^ea^ dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii''ti. cuddasama.m.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] mahaabhi~n~na.m ^a^T5.0391^ea^ ^a^V3.0377^ea^ iddhi dibba.m, cetopariya.m .thaana.m kamma.m.
[22] sabbatthadhaatudhimutti, indriya.m jhaana.m tisso vijjaati..
[06] anuruddhasa.myutta.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 923-934^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0392^ea^ ^a^V3.0378^ea^ ^a^M3.0268^ea^ ^a^P5.0307^ea^ ``cattaaro me, bhikkhave, jhaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro jhaanaa''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ga"ngaa nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaaro ^a^P5.0308^ea^ jhaane bhaavento cattaaro jhaane bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaaro jhaane bhaavento cattaaro jhaane bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T5.0393^ea^ viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... ^a^V3.0379^ea^ tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaaro jhaane bhaavento cattaaro jhaane bahuliikaronto nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro''ti. dvaadasama.m.
[06] ga"ngaapeyyaalavaggo pa.thamo.
