[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^T5.0404^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi aaka"nkheyya -- `sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti, ayameva aanaapaanassatisamaadhi saadhuka.m manasi kaatabbo.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi aaka"nkheyya -- `sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja vihareyya'nti, ayameva aanaapaanassatisamaadhi saadhuka.m manasi kaatabbo.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavite kho, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassatisamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate, sukha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, saa `aniccaa'ti pajaanaati, `anajjhositaa'ti pajaanaati, `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati; dukkha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, `saa aniccaa'ti pajaanaati, `anajjhositaa'ti pajaanaati, `anabhinanditaa'ti ^a^V3.0390^ea^ ^a^M3.0278^ea^ pajaanaati; adukkhamasukha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, `saa aniccaa'ti pajaanaati, `anajjhositaa'ti pajaanaati, `anabhinanditaa'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``sukha.m {so sukha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) ma0 ni0 3.364 a.t.thakathaa.tiikaa oloketabbaa} ce vedana.m vedayati, visa.myutto na.m vedayati; dukkha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, visa.myutto na.m vedayati; adukkhamasukha.m ce vedana.m vedayati, visa.myutto na.m vedayati. so kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, `kaayassa bhedaa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti pajaanaati''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, tela~nca pa.ticca, va.t.ti~nca pa.ticca telappadiipo ^a^T5.0405^ea^ jhaayeyya, tasseva telassa ca va.t.tiyaa ca pariyaadaanaa anaahaaro nibbaayeyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayapariyantika.m ^a^P5.0320^ea^ vedana.m vedayamaano `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, `kaayassa bhedaa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti pajaanaatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 985^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m anekapariyaayena asubhakatha.m katheti, asubhaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati, asubhabhaavanaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhikkhave, a.d.dhamaasa.m pa.tisalliiyitu.m. naamhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakenaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa naassudha koci bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamati, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakena.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0279^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu -- ``bhagavaa anekapariyaayena asubhakatha.m katheti, asubhaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati ^a^V3.0391^ea^, asubhabhaavanaaya va.n.na.m bhaasatii''ti anekaakaaravokaara.m asubhabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti. te iminaa kaayena a.t.tiiyamaanaa {a.t.tiyamaanaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} haraayamaanaa jigucchamaanaa satthahaaraka.m pariyesanti. dasapi bhikkhuu ekaahena sattha.m aaharanti, viisampi...pe0... ti.msampi bhikkhuu ekaahena sattha.m aaharanti.

[03] atha ^a^T5.0406^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassa a.d.dhamaasassa accayena pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, aananda, tanubhuuto viya bhikkhusa"ngho''ti? ``tathaa hi pana, bhante, `bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m anekapariyaayena asubhakatha.m katheti, asubhaaya va.n.na.m bhaasati ^a^P5.0321^ea^, asubhabhaavanaaya va.n.na.m bhaasatii'ti anekaakaaravokaara.m asubhabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti. te iminaa kaayena a.t.tiiyamaanaa haraayamaanaa jigucchamaanaa satthahaaraka.m pariyesanti. dasapi bhikkhuu ekaahena sattha.m aaharanti, viisampi bhikkhuu... ti.msampi bhikkhuu ekaahena sattha.m aaharanti. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa a~n~na.m pariyaaya.m aacikkhatu yathaaya.m bhikkhusa"ngho a~n~naaya sa.n.thaheyyaa''ti.

[03] ``tenahaananda, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu vesaali.m upanissaaya viharanti te sabbe upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannipaatehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yaavatikaa bhikkhuu vesaali.m upanissaaya viharanti te sabbe upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannipaatetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sannipatito {sannipaatito (sii0)}, bhante, bhikkhusa"ngho. yassa daani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa yena upa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T5.0407^ea^ pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ayampi kho, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi bhaavito bahuliikato santo ceva pa.niito ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihaaro uppannuppanne ca paapake akusale dhamme .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasameti''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0280^ea^, bhikkhave, gimhaana.m pacchime maase uuhata.m rajojalla.m, tamena.m mahaaakaalamegho .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasameti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi bhaavito bahuliikato santo ceva pa.niito ca ^a^P5.0322^ea^ asecanako ca sukho ca ^a^V3.0392^ea^ vihaaro uppannuppanne ca paapake akusale dhamme .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasameti. katha.m bhaavito ca, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi katha.m bahuliikato santo ceva pa.niito ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihaaro uppannuppanne ca paapake akusale dhamme .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasameti?

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati, satova passasati...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. eva.m bhaavito kho, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi eva.m bahuliikato santo ceva pa.niito ca asecanako ca ^a^T5.0408^ea^ sukho ca vihaaro uppannuppanne ca paapake akusale dhamme .thaanaso antaradhaapeti vuupasametii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 986^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kimilaaya.m {kimbilaaya.m (sii0 pii0)} viharati ve.luvane. tatra kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m kimila.m aamantesi -- ``katha.m bhaavito nu kho, kimila, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi katha.m bahuliikato mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa kimilo tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa...pe0... tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m kimila.m aamantesi -- ``katha.m bhaavito nu kho, kimila, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi katha.m bahuliikato mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso''ti? tatiyampi kho aayasmaa kimilo tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] eva.m ^a^P5.0323^ea^ vutte aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo; etassa, sugata, kaalo! ya.m bhagavaa aanaapaanassatisamaadhi.m bhaaseyya ^a^M3.0281^ea^. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.

[03] ``tenahaananda, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho ^a^V3.0393^ea^ aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``katha.m bhaavito ca, aananda, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi katha.m bahuliikato mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati, satova passasati...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii ^a^T5.0409^ea^ passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. eva.m bhaavito kho, aananda, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi eva.m bahuliikato mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso''.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; `sabbakaayappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `sabbakaayappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- kaaye kaayaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? kaaya~n~nataraaha.m, aananda, eta.m vadaami yadida.m -- assaasapassaasa.m. tasmaatihaananda, kaaye kaayaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu `piitippa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `piitippa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `sukhappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `sukhappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `cittasa"nkhaarappa.tisa.mvedii ^a^P5.0324^ea^ assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `cittasa"nkhaarappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m ^a^T5.0410^ea^ cittasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- vedanaasu vedanaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano ^a^M3.0282^ea^ satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? vedanaa~n~nataraaha.m, aananda, eta.m vadaami, yadida.m -- assaasapassaasaana.m {assaasapassaasa.m (pii0 ka0) ma0 ni0 3.145} saadhuka.m manasikaara.m. tasmaatihaananda, vedanaasu vedanaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^V3.0394^ea^ samaye, aananda, bhikkhu `cittappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `cittappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; abhippamodaya.m citta.m...pe0... samaadaha.m citta.m...pe0... `vimocaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `vimocaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- citte cittaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? naaha.m, aananda, mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa aanaapaanassatisamaadhibhaavana.m vadaami. tasmaatihaananda, citte cittaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu `aniccaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati...pe0... viraagaanupassii...pe0... nirodhaanupassii...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- dhammesu ^a^T5.0411^ea^ dhammaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. so ya.m ta.m hoti abhijjhaadomanassaana.m pahaana.m ta.m pa~n~naaya disvaa saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti. tasmaatihaananda, dhammesu dhammaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0325^ea^, aananda, catumahaapathe {caatummahaapathe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} mahaapa.msupu~njo. puratthimaaya cepi disaaya.m aagaccheyya saka.ta.m vaa ratho vaa, upahanateva ta.m pa.msupu~nja.m; pacchimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya...pe0... uttaraaya cepi disaaya...pe0... dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya saka.ta.m vaa ratho vaa, upahanateva ta.m pa.msupu~nja.m. evameva kho, aananda, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharantopi upahanateva ^a^M3.0283^ea^ paapake akusale dhamme; vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharantopi upahanateva paapake akusale dhamme''ti. dasama.m.
[06] ekadhammavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] ekadhammo ^a^V3.0395^ea^ ca bojjha"ngo, suddhika~nca duve phalaa.
[22] ari.t.tho kappino diipo, vesaalii kimilena caati..

[03] 987^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0412^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhikkhave, temaasa.m pa.tisalliiyitu.m. naamhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakenaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa naassudha koci bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamati, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakena.

[03] atha ^a^P5.0326^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassa temaasassa accayena pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``sace kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katamenaavuso, vihaarena sama.no gotamo vassaavaasa.m bahula.m vihaasii'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `aanaapaanassatisamaadhinaa kho, aavuso, bhagavaa vassaavaasa.m bahula.m vihaasii'ti. idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, sato assasaami, sato passasaami. diigha.m assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaami, diigha.m passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaami; rassa.m assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaami, rassa.m passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaami; `sabbakaayappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti pajaanaami...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti pajaanaami, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti ^a^T5.0413^ea^ pajaanaami''.

[03] ``ya~nhi ^a^M3.0284^ea^ ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ariyavihaaro' itipi, `brahmavihaaro' ^a^V3.0396^ea^ itipi, `tathaagatavihaaro' itipi. aanaapaanassatisamaadhi.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ariyavihaaro' itipi, `brahmavihaaro' itipi, `tathaagatavihaaro' itipi. ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sekhaa appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti tesa.m aanaapaanassatisamaadhi bhaavito bahuliikato aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattati. ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa tesa.m aanaapaanassatisamaadhi bhaavito bahuliikato di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraaya ceva sa.mvattati satisampaja~n~naaya ca.

[03] ``ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ariyavihaaro' itipi, `brahmavihaaro' itipi, `tathaagatavihaaro' itipi. aanaapaanassatisamaadhi.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ariyavihaaro' itipi, `brahmavihaaro' itipi, `tathaagatavihaaro' itipii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 988^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P5.0327^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa lomasaka.mbhiyo {lomasava"ngiso (sii0 pii0)} sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yenaayasmaa lomasaka.mbhiyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m lomasaka.mbhiya.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko aayasmanta.m lomasaka.mbhiya.m etadavoca -- ``so eva nu kho, bhante, sekho ^a^T5.0414^ea^ vihaaro so tathaagatavihaaro, udaahu a~n~nova {a~n~no (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} sekho vihaaro a~n~no tathaagatavihaaro''ti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso mahaanaama, sveva sekho vihaaro, so tathaagatavihaaro. a~n~no kho, aavuso mahaanaama, sekho vihaaro, a~n~no tathaagatavihaaro. ye te, aavuso mahaanaama, bhikkhuu sekhaa appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, te pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya viharanti. katame pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m pahaaya viharanti, byaapaadaniivara.na.m...pe0... thinamiddhaniivara.na.m...pe0... uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m...pe0... vicikicchaaniivara.na.m pahaaya viharanti.
[03] ``yepi ^a^M3.0285^ea^ ^a^V3.0397^ea^ te, aavuso mahaanaama, bhikkhuu sekhaa appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, te ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya viharanti.

[03] ``ye ca kho te, aavuso mahaanaama, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, tesa.m pa~nca niivara.naa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa {anabhaavakataa (sii0 pii0)} aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m; byaapaadaniivara.na.m pahiina.m...pe0... thinamiddhaniivara.na.m...pe0... uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m...pe0... vicikicchaaniivara.na.m pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m ^a^P5.0328^ea^ anuppaadadhamma.m.

[03] ``ye te, aavuso mahaanaama, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto ^a^T5.0415^ea^ katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, tesa.m ime pa~nca niivara.naa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tadaminaapeta.m, aavuso mahaanaama, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa -- a~n~nova sekho vihaaro, a~n~no tathaagatavihaaro.

[03] ``ekamida.m, aavuso mahaanaama, samaya.m bhagavaa icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. tatra kho, aavuso mahaanaama, bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `icchaamaha.m, bhikkhave, temaasa.m pa.tisalliiyitu.m. naamhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakenaa'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho, aavuso mahaanaama, te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa naassudha koci bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamati, a~n~natra ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakena.

[03] ``atha kho, aavuso, bhagavaa tassa temaasassa accayena pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `sace kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- katamenaavuso, vihaarena sama.no gotamo vassaavaasa.m bahula.m vihaasiiti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m ^a^M3.0286^ea^ a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- aanaapaanassatisamaadhinaa kho, aavuso, bhagavaa vassaavaasa.m bahula.m vihaasiiti. idhaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0398^ea^, sato assasaami, sato passasaami. diigha.m assasanto diigha.m assasaamiiti pajaanaami, diigha.m passasanto diigha.m passasaamiiti pajaanaami...pe0... pa.tinissaggaanupassii ^a^T5.0416^ea^ assasissaamiiti pajaanaami, pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti pajaanaami''.

[03] ``ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- ariyavihaaro itipi, brahmavihaaro itipi, tathaagatavihaaro itipi. aanaapaanassatisamaadhi.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- ariyavihaaro itipi, brahmavihaaro itipi, tathaagatavihaaro itipi.
[03] ``ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sekhaa appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, tesa.m aanaapaanassatisamaadhi bhaavito bahuliikato aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, tesa.m aanaapaanassatisamaadhi bhaavito bahuliikato di.t.theva dhamme sukhavihaaraaya ceva sa.mvattati satisampaja~n~naaya ca.

[03] ``ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- ariyavihaaro itipi, brahmavihaaro itipi, tathaagatavihaaro itipi. aanaapaanassatisamaadhi.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- ariyavihaaro itipi, brahmavihaaro itipi, tathaagatavihaaro itipii''ti. ``iminaa kho eta.m, aavuso mahaanaama, pariyaayena veditabba.m, yathaa -- a~n~nova sekho vihaaro, a~n~no tathaagatavihaaro''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 989^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T5.0417^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi ^a^P5.0329^ea^ nu kho, bhante ^a^M3.0287^ea^, ekadhammo {eko dhammo (sii0)} bhaavito bahuliikato cattaaro ^a^V3.0399^ea^ dhamme paripuureti, cattaaro dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta dhamme paripuurenti, satta dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa dve dhamme paripuurentii''ti?

[03] ``atthi kho, aananda, ekadhammo bhaavito bahuliikato cattaaro dhamme paripuureti, cattaaro dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta dhamme paripuurenti, satta dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa dve dhamme paripuurentii''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana, bhante, ekadhammo {eko dhammo (sii0)} bhaavito bahuliikato cattaaro dhamme paripuureti, cattaaro dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta dhamme paripuurenti, satta dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa dve dhamme paripuurentii''ti? ``aanaapaanassatisamaadhi kho, aananda, ekadhammo bhaavito bahuliikato cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuureti, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurenti''.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavito, aananda, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi katha.m bahuliikato cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuureti? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati, satova passasati. diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti ^a^T5.0418^ea^ pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati''. ``yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; rassa.m vaa...pe0... `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- kaaye kaayaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? kaaya~n~nataraaha.m, aananda, eta.m vadaami, yadida.m -- assaasapassaasa.m ^a^P5.0330^ea^. tasmaatihaananda, kaaye kaayaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m''.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^M3.0288^ea^ samaye, aananda, bhikkhu `piitippa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati ^a^V3.0400^ea^ ...pe0... sukhappa.tisa.mvedii...pe0... cittasa"nkhaarappa.tisa.mvedii...pe0... `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- vedanaasu vedanaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? vedanaa~n~nataraaha.m, aananda, eta.m vadaami, yadida.m -- assaasapassaasaana.m saadhuka.m manasikaara.m. tasmaatihaananda, vedanaasu vedanaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano ^a^T5.0419^ea^ satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu `cittappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `cittappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; abhippamodaya.m citta.m...pe0... samaadaha.m citta.m...pe0... `vimocaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `vimocaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- citte cittaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? naaha.m, aananda, mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa aanaapaanassatisamaadhibhaavana.m vadaami. tasmaatihaananda, citte cittaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu aniccaanupassii...pe0... viraagaanupassii...pe0... nirodhaanupassii...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- dhammesu dhammaanupassii, aananda, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. so ya.m ta.m hoti abhijjhaadomanassaana.m pahaana.m ta.m pa~n~naaya disvaa saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa ^a^P5.0331^ea^ hoti. tasmaatihaananda, dhammesu dhammaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.
[03] ``eva.m bhaavito kho, aananda, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi eva.m bahuliikato cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuureti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^T5.0420^ea^ ^a^V3.0401^ea^ bhaavitaa caananda, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa katha.m bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti? yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii ^a^M3.0289^ea^ viharati -- upa.t.thitaassa {upa.t.thitassati (pii0 ka0)} tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno {tasmi.m samaye aananda bhikkhuno (pii0 ka0), tasmi.m samaye (ma0 ni0 3.149)} sati hoti asammu.t.thaa. yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhuno upa.t.thitaa sati hoti asammu.t.thaa -- satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, satisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``so tathaa sato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati. yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhu tathaa sato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati -- dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``tassa ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicarato pariviima.msamaapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m. yasmi.m samaye, aananda, bhikkhuno ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicarato pariviima.msamaapajjato aaraddha.m ^a^P5.0332^ea^ hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m -- viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, viiriyasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye ^a^T5.0421^ea^ bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^P5.0336^ea^ bhaavito ca, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi katha.m bahuliikato cattaaro satipa.t.thaane ^a^V3.0405^ea^ paripuureti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati, satova passasati...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati''.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati...pe0... sabbakaayappa.tisa.mvedii...pe0... `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- kaaye kaayaanupassii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? kaaya~n~nataraaha.m, bhikkhave, eta.m vadaami, yadida.m -- assaasapassaasa.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, kaaye kaayaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitippa.tisa.mvedii...pe0... sukhappa.tisa.mvedii...pe0... cittasa"nkhaarappa.tisa.mvedii...pe0... `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- vedanaasu vedanaanupassii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? vedanaa~n~nataraaha.m, bhikkhave, eta.m vadaami, yadida.m -- assaasapassaasaana.m saadhuka.m manasikaara.m. tasmaatiha ^a^P5.0337^ea^, bhikkhave, vedanaasu vedanaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cittappa.tisa.mvedii...pe0... abhippamodaya.m citta.m...pe0... `samaadaha.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `samaadaha.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti ^a^M3.0294^ea^ sikkhati; `vimocaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `vimocaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- citte cittaanupassii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? naaha.m, bhikkhave, mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa aanaapaanassatisamaadhibhaavana.m vadaami. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0406^ea^, citte cittaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aniccaanupassii...pe0... viraagaanupassii...pe0... nirodhaanupassii...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati -- dhammesu dhammaanupassii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. so ya.m ta.m hoti abhijjhaadomanassaana.m pahaana.m ta.m pa~n~naaya disvaa saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, dhammesu dhammaanupassii bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.
[03] ``eva.m bhaavito kho, bhikkhave, aanaapaanassatisamaadhi eva.m bahuliikato cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuureti.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa katha.m bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti? yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati -- upa.t.thitaassa tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno sati hoti asammu.t.thaa. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno upa.t.thitaa ^a^P5.0338^ea^ sati hoti asammu.t.thaa -- satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, satisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``so tathaa sato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaa sato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati -- dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``tassa ^a^M3.0295^ea^ ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicarato pariviima.msamaapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m ^a^V3.0407^ea^ asalliina.m. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicarato pariviima.msamaapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m -- viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, viiriyasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, viiriyasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti niraamisaa. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti niraamisaa -- piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, piitisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, piitisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati -- passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, passaddhisambojjha"nga.m ^a^P5.0339^ea^ tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, passaddhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``passaddhakaayassa sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno passaddhakaayassa sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati -- samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, samaadhisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, samaadhisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``so tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti -- upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati.

[03] ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati -- upa.t.thitaassa tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno sati hoti ^a^M3.0296^ea^ asammu.t.thaa. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno upa.t.thitaa sati hoti asammu.t.thaa -- satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno ^a^V3.0408^ea^ aaraddho hoti, satisambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti -- satisambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati...pe0....

[03] so tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaasamaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti -- upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno aaraddho hoti, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhu bhaaveti, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuno bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa eva.m bahuliikataa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^P5.0340^ea^ bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa katha.m bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurenti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m; dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa eva.m bahuliikataa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurentii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 993^b^.^eb^ aanaapaanassatisamaadhi, bhikkhave, bhaavito bahuliikato sa.myojanappahaanaaya ^a^T5.0426^ea^ sa.mvattati...pe0.... sattama.m.
[03] 994^b^.^eb^ ...anusayasamugghaataaya sa.mvattati.... a.t.thama.m.

[03] 997^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0428^ea^ ^a^M3.0298^ea^ ^a^V3.0410^ea^ ^a^P5.0342^ea^. tatra kho bhagavaa...pe0... etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii {cakkavatti (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} catunna.m diipaana.m issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaaretvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m, so tattha nandane vane accharaasa"nghaparivuto dibbehi ca pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti, so catuuhi dhammehi asamannaagato, atha kho so aparimuttova {aparimutto ca (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} nirayaa aparimutto tiracchaanayoniyaa aparimutto pettivisayaa aparimutto apaayaduggativinipaataa. ki~ncaapi, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako pi.n.diyaalopena yaapeti, nantakaani ca dhaareti, so catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato, atha kho so parimutto {parimutto ca (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} nirayaa parimutto tiracchaanayoniyaa parimutto pettivisayaa parimutto apaayaduggativinipaataa''.

[03] ``katamehi catuuhi? idha ^a^P5.0343^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti ^a^T5.0429^ea^. dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m -- cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha ^a^V3.0411^ea^ purisapuggalaa, esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. ariyakantehi siilehi ^a^M3.0299^ea^ samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammaasehi bhujissehi vi~n~nuppasatthehi aparaama.t.thehi samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato hoti. yo ca, bhikkhave, catunna.m diipaana.m pa.tilaabho, yo catunna.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabho catunna.m diipaana.m pa.tilaabho catunna.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhassa kala.m naagghati so.lasi''nti. pa.thama.m.
[03] 998^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no.

[03] ``katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi ^a^T5.0430^ea^ samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi ^a^P5.0344^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana {vatvaa (sii0 pii0) evamiidisesu .thaanesu} sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``yesa.m saddhaa ca siila~nca, pasaado dhammadassana.m.
[22] te ve kaalena paccenti, brahmacariyogadha.m sukha''nti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 999^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena diighaavu upaasako aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho diighaavu upaasako ^a^V3.0412^ea^ pitara.m jotika.m gahapati.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, gahapati, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vanda -- `diighaavu, bhante ^a^M3.0300^ea^, upaasako aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira, bhante, bhagavaa yena diighaavussa upaasakassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. ``eva.m, taataa''ti kho jotiko gahapati diighaavussa upaasakassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jotiko gahapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``diighaavu, bhante, upaasako aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano ^a^T5.0431^ea^. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati. eva~nca vadeti -- `saadhu kira, bhante, bhagavaa yena diighaavussa upaasakassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena diighaavussa upaasakassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P5.0345^ea^ pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa diighaavu.m upaasaka.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, diighaavu, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti. ``tasmaatiha te, diighaavu, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato bhavissaami -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato bhavissaami akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi'. eva~nhi te, diighaavu, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] ``yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa cattaari sotaapattiya"ngaani desitaani, sa.mvijjante te dhammaa mayi, aha~nca tesu dhammesu sandissaami. aha~nhi, bhante, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato -- itipi ^a^T5.0432^ea^ so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehii''ti ^a^V3.0413^ea^. ``tasmaatiha tva.m, diighaavu, imesu catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu pati.t.thaaya cha vijjaabhaagiye dhamme uttari bhaaveyyaasi. idha tva.m, diighaavu, sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii ^a^M3.0301^ea^ viharaahi, anicce dukkhasa~n~nii, dukkhe anattasa~n~nii pahaanasa~n~nii viraagasa~n~nii nirodhasa~n~niiti. eva~nhi te, diighaavu, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] ``yeme, bhante, bhagavataa cha vijjaabhaagiyaa dhammaa desitaa, sa.mvijjante te dhammaa mayi, aha~nca tesu dhammesu sandissaami. aha~nhi, bhante, sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii viharaami, anicce dukkhasa~n~nii, dukkhe anattasa~n~nii pahaanasa~n~nii viraagasa~n~nii nirodhasa~n~nii. api ca me, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `maa hevaaya.m jotiko gahapati mamaccayena vighaata.m aapajjii'''ti {aapajjati (ka0)}. ``maa ^a^P5.0346^ea^ tva.m, taata diighaavu, eva.m manasaakaasi. i"ngha tva.m, taata diighaavu, yadeva te bhagavaa aaha, tadeva tva.m saadhuka.m manasi karohii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa diighaavu.m upaasaka.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho diighaavu upaasako acirapakkantassa bhagavato kaalamakaasi. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa ^a^T5.0433^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, bhante, diighaavu naama upaasako bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadito so kaala"nkato. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, diighaavu upaasako, paccapaadi {ahosi saccavaadii (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m {na ca dhammaadhikara.na.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} vihesesi {vihe.thesi (itipi a~n~nattha)}. diighaavu, bhikkhave, upaasako pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 1000^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca aanando saavatthiya.m viharanti jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``katina.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, dhammaana.m samannaagamanahetu evamaya.m pajaa ^a^V3.0414^ea^ bhagavataa byaakataa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti ^a^M3.0302^ea^? ``catunna.m ^a^P5.0347^ea^ kho, aavuso, dhammaana.m samannaagamanahetu evamaya.m pajaa bhagavataa byaakataa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? idhaavuso, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi ^a^T5.0434^ea^ siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imesa.m kho, aavuso, catunna.m dhammaana.m samannaagamanahetu evamaya.m pajaa bhagavataa byaakataa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 1001^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ```sotaapattiya"nga.m, sotaapattiya"nga'nti hida.m, saariputta, vuccati. katama.m nu kho saariputta, sotaapattiya"nga''nti? ``sappurisasa.msevo hi, bhante, sotaapattiya"nga.m, saddhammassavana.m sotaapattiya"nga.m, yonisomanasikaaro sotaapattiya"nga.m, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti sotaapattiya"nga''nti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! sappurisasa.msevo hi, saariputta, sotaapattiya"nga.m, saddhammassavana.m sotaapattiya"nga.m, yonisomanasikaaro sotaapattiya"nga.m, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti sotaapattiya"nga.m''.

[03] ```soto, soto'ti hida.m, saariputta, vuccati. katamo nu kho, saariputta, soto''ti? ``ayameva hi, bhante, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo soto, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhii''ti. ``saadhu ^a^T5.0435^ea^ saadhu, saariputta! ayameva hi, saariputta, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo soto, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi''.

[03] ```sotaapanno ^a^P5.0348^ea^, sotaapanno'ti hida.m, saariputta, vuccati. katamo nu kho, saariputta, sotaapanno''ti ^a^V3.0415^ea^? ``yo hi, bhante, iminaa ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena maggena samannaagato aya.m vuccati sotaapanno, svaaya.m aayasmaa ^a^M3.0303^ea^ eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yo hi, saariputta, iminaa ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena maggena samannaagato aya.m vuccati sotaapanno, svaaya.m aayasmaa eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 1002^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu bhagavato ciivarakamma.m karonti -- ``ni.t.thitaciivaro bhagavaa temaasaccayena caarika.m pakkamissatii''ti. tena kho pana samayena isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo saadhuke pa.tivasanti kenacideva kara.niiyena. assosu.m kho isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo -- ``sambahulaa kira bhikkhuu bhagavato ciivarakamma.m karonti -- `ni.t.thitaciivaro bhagavaa temaasaccayena caarika.m pakkamissatii'''ti.

[03] atha kho isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo magge purisa.m .thapesu.m -- ``yadaa tva.m, ambho purisa, passeyyaasi bhagavanta.m aagacchanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m, atha amhaaka.m aaroceyyaasii''ti. dviihatiiha.m .thito kho so ^a^T5.0436^ea^ puriso addasa bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana yena isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa isidattapuraa.ne thapatayo etadavoca -- ``aya.m so, bhante, bhagavaa aagacchati araha.m sammaasambuddho. yassa daani kaala.m ma~n~nathaa''ti.

[03] atha kho isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi.msu. atha kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma yena a~n~natara.m rukkhamuula.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane ^a^P5.0349^ea^ nisiidi. isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``yadaa maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `saavatthiyaa kosalesu caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `saavatthiyaa kosalesu caarika.m pakkanto'ti ^a^V3.0416^ea^, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa ^a^M3.0304^ea^ pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `kosalehi mallesu caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante ^a^T5.0437^ea^, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `kosalehi mallesu caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `mallehi vajjiisu caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `mallehi vajjiisu caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `vajjiihi kaasiisu caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `vajjiihi kaasiisu caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `kaasiihi maagadhe caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa ^a^P5.0350^ea^ hoti domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `kaasiihi maagadhe caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti anappakaa no tasmi.m samaye anattamanataa hoti anappaka.m domanassa.m -- `duure no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa ^a^T5.0438^ea^ pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `maagadhehi kaasiisu caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti ^a^V3.0417^ea^, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `maagadhehi kaasiisu caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `kaasiihi vajjiisu caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m ^a^M3.0305^ea^ -- `aasanne no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `kaasiihi vajjiisu caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `vajjiihi mallesu caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `vajjiihi mallesu caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `mallehi kosale caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa ^a^T5.0439^ea^ hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `mallehi kosale caarika.m pakkanto'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `kosalehi saavatthi.m caarika.m pakkamissatii'ti, hoti no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa bhavissatii'ti. yadaa pana maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m su.naama -- `saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame'ti, hoti anappakaa no tasmi.m samaye attamanataa hoti anappaka.m somanassa.m -- `aasanne no bhagavaa'''ti.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, thapatayo, sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. ala~nca pana ^a^V3.0418^ea^ vo, thapatayo, appamaadaayaa''ti. ``atthi kho no, bhante, etamhaa sambaadhaa a~n~no sambaadho sambaadhataro ceva sambaadhasa"nkhaatataro caa''ti. ``katamo ^a^P5.0351^ea^ pana vo, thapatayo, etamhaa sambaadhaa a~n~no sambaadho sambaadhataro ceva sambaadhasa"nkhaatataro caa''ti?

[03] ``idha maya.m, bhante, yadaa raajaa pasenadi kosalo uyyaanabhuumi.m niyyaatukaamo hoti, ye te ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa naagaa opavayhaa te kappetvaa, yaa taa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pajaapatiyo piyaa manaapaa taa eka.m purato eka.m ^a^M3.0306^ea^ pacchato ^a^T5.0440^ea^ nisiidaapema. taasa.m kho pana, bhante, bhaginiina.m evaruupo gandho hoti, seyyathaapi naama gandhakara.n.dakassa taavadeva vivariyamaanassa, yathaa ta.m raajaka~n~naana.m gandhena vibhuusitaana.m. taasa.m kho pana, bhante, bhaginiina.m evaruupo kaayasamphasso hoti, seyyathaapi naama tuulapicuno vaa kappaasapicuno vaa, yathaa ta.m raajaka~n~naana.m sukhedhitaana.m. tasmi.m kho pana, bhante, samaye naagopi rakkhitabbo hoti, taapi bhaginiyo rakkhitabbaa honti, attaapi rakkhitabbo hoti. na kho pana maya.m, bhante, abhijaanaama taasu bhaginiisu paapaka.m citta.m uppaadetaa. aya.m kho no, bhante, etamhaa sambaadhaa a~n~no sambaadho sambaadhataro ceva sambaadhasa"nkhaatataro caa''ti.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, thapatayo, sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. ala~nca pana vo, thapatayo, appamaadaaya. catuuhi kho, thapatayo, dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no.

[03] ``katamehi catuuhi? idha, thapatayo, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... vigatamalamaccherena cetasaa ajjhaagaara.m vasati muttacaago payatapaa.ni vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. imehi kho, thapatayo, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^P5.0352^ea^ ariyasaavako ^a^T5.0441^ea^ sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no.

[03] ``tumhe kho, thapatayo, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ya.m kho pana ki~nci kule deyyadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m appa.tivibhatta.m siilavantehi kalyaa.nadhammehi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, thapatayo, katividhaa ^a^V3.0419^ea^ te kosalesu manussaa ye tumhaaka.m samasamaa, yadida.m -- daanasa.mvibhaage''ti? ``laabhaa no, bhante, suladdha.m no, bhante! yesa.m no bhagavaa eva.m pajaanaatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 1003^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena ve.ludvaara.m naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo ^a^M3.0307^ea^ tadavasari. assosu.m kho te ve.ludvaareyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m ve.ludvaara.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa {bhagavaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so ^a^T5.0442^ea^ dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti'. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^P5.0353^ea^ kho te ve.ludvaareyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. appekacce bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te ve.ludvaareyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``maya.m, bho gotama, eva.mkaamaa eva.mchandaa eva.madhippaayaa -- puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavaseyyaama, kaasikacandana.m paccanubhaveyyaama, maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaareyyaama, jaataruuparajata.m saadiyeyyaama, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyaama. tesa.m no bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m eva.mkaamaana.m eva.mchandaana.m eva.madhippaayaana.m tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa maya.m puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavaseyyaama...pe0... sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyaamaa''ti.

[03] ``attuupanaayika.m ^a^V3.0420^ea^ vo, gahapatayo, dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho te ^a^T5.0443^ea^ ve.ludvaareyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ^a^M3.0308^ea^ ca, gahapatayo, attupanaayiko dhammapariyaayo? idha, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khosmi jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhappa.tikuulo. yo kho ma.m jiivitukaama.m amaritukaama.m sukhakaama.m dukkhappa.tikuula.m jiivitaa voropeyya, na meta.m assa piya.m manaapa.m. aha~nceva kho pana para.m jiivitukaama.m amaritukaama.m sukhakaama.m dukkhappa.tikuula.m jiivitaa voropeyya.m, parassapi ta.m assa appiya.m amanaapa.m. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, parassa peso dhammo ^a^P5.0354^ea^ appiyo amanaapo. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, kathaaha.m para.m tena sa.myojeyya'nti! so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya attanaa ca paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca paa.naatipaataa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, paa.naatipaataa verama.niyaa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati. evamassaaya.m kaayasamaacaaro tiko.tiparisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yo kho me adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyeyya, na meta.m assa piya.m manaapa.m. aha~nceva kho pana parassa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyeyya.m, parassapi ta.m assa appiya.m amanaapa.m. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, parassa peso dhammo appiyo amanaapo. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, kathaaha.m para.m tena sa.myojeyya'nti ^a^T5.0444^ea^! so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya attanaa ca adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca adinnaadaanaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, adinnaadaanaa verama.niyaa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati. evamassaaya.m kaayasamaacaaro tiko.tiparisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yo kho me daaresu caaritta.m aapajjeyya, na meta.m assa piya.m manaapa.m. aha~nceva kho pana parassa daaresu caaritta.m aapajjeyya.m, parassapi ta.m assa appiya.m amanaapa.m. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, parassa peso dhammo appiyo amanaapo. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, kathaaha.m para.m tena sa.myojeyya'nti! so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya attanaa ca kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato ^a^V3.0421^ea^ hoti, para~nca kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niyaa ca va.n.na.m ^a^M3.0309^ea^ bhaasati. evamassaaya.m kaayasamaacaaro tiko.tiparisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yo kho me musaavaadena attha.m bha~njeyya, na meta.m assa piya.m manaapa.m. aha~nceva kho pana parassa musaavaadena attha.m bha~njeyya.m, parassapi ta.m assa appiya.m amanaapa.m. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, parassa peso dhammo appiyo amanaapo. yo ^a^P5.0355^ea^ kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, kathaaha.m para.m tena sa.myojeyya'nti! so ^a^T5.0445^ea^ iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya attanaa ca musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca musaavaadaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, musaavaadaa verama.niyaa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati. evamassaaya.m vaciisamaacaaro tiko.tiparisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- yo kho ma.m pisu.naaya vaacaaya mitte bhindeyya {mittehi bhedeyya (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}, na meta.m assa piya.m manaapa.m. aha~nceva kho pana para.m pisu.naaya vaacaaya mitte bhindeyya.m, parassapi ta.m assa appiya.m amanaapa.m...pe0... evamassaaya.m vaciisamaacaaro tiko.tiparisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- yo kho ma.m pharusaaya vaacaaya samudaacareyya, na meta.m assa piya.m manaapa.m. aha~nceva kho pana para.m pharusaaya vaacaaya samudaacareyya.m, parassapi ta.m assa appiya.m amanaapa.m. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo...pe0... evamassaaya.m vaciisamaacaaro tiko.tiparisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yo kho ma.m samphabhaasena samphappalaapabhaasena samudaacareyya, na meta.m assa piya.m manaapa.m. aha~nceva kho pana para.m samphabhaasena samphappalaapabhaasena samudaacareyya.m, parassapi ta.m assa appiya.m amanaapa.m. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, parassa peso dhammo appiyo amanaapo. yo kho myaaya.m dhammo appiyo amanaapo, kathaaha.m para.m tena sa.myojeyya'nti! so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya attanaa ca samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti ^a^M3.0310^ea^, para~nca samphappalaapaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, samphappalaapaa ^a^V3.0422^ea^ verama.niyaa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati. evamassaaya.m vaciisamaacaaro tiko.tiparisuddho hoti.

[03] ``so buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati; dhamme ^a^P5.0356^ea^ ...pe0... sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati. ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. yato kho, gahapatayo, ariyasaavako imehi sattahi saddhammehi {dhammehi (sii0)} samannaagato hoti imehi catuuhi aaka"nkhiyehi .thaanehi, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni {khii.natiracchaanayoniyo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), khii.natiracchaanayoniko (ka0)} khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte ve.ludvaareyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete {paa.nupeta.m (ka0)} sara.na.m gate''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 1004^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa ~naatike viharati gi~njakaavasathe. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T5.0447^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``saa.lho naama, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato; tassa kaa gati ko abhisamparaayo? nandaa naama, bhante, bhikkhunii kaala"nkataa; tassaa kaa gati ko abhisamparaayo? sudatto naama, bhante, upaasako kaala"nkato; tassa kaa gati ko abhisamparaayo? sujaataa naama, bhante, upaasikaa kaala"nkataa; tassaa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti?

[03] ``saa.lho ^a^M3.0311^ea^, aananda, bhikkhu kaala"nkato aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^V3.0423^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. nandaa, aananda, bhikkhunii kaala"nkataa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m ^a^P5.0357^ea^ parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayinii anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. sudatto, aananda, upaasako kaala"nkato ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii; sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissati. sujaataa, aananda, upaasikaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa.

[03] ``anacchariya.m kho paneta.m, aananda, ya.m manussabhuuto kaala.m kareyya; tasmi.m tasmi.m ce ma.m kaala"nkate upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipucchissatha. vihesaa pesaa, aananda, assa tathaagatassa. tasmaatihaananda ^a^T5.0448^ea^, dhammaadaasa.m naama dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami; yena samannaagato ariyasaavako aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''.

[03] ``katamo ca so, aananda, dhammaadaaso dhammapariyaayo; yena samannaagato ariyasaavako aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''?

[03] ``idha, aananda, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. aya.m kho so, aananda, dhammaadaaso dhammapariyaayo; yena samannaagato ariyasaavako aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 1005^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m ^a^M3.0312^ea^ ^a^V3.0424^ea^ ^a^P5.0358^ea^ nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``asoko naama, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato; tassa kaa gati, ko ^a^T5.0449^ea^ abhisamparaayo? asokaa naama, bhante, bhikkhunii kaala"nkataa...pe0... asoko naama, bhante, upaasako kaala"nkato...pe0... asokaa naama, bhante, upaasikaa kaala"nkataa; tassaa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti?

[03] ``katamo ca so, aananda, dhammaadaaso dhammapariyaayo; yena samannaagato ariyasaavako aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''.

[03] ``idhaananda ^a^P5.0360^ea^, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. aya.m kho so, aananda, dhammaadaaso dhammapariyaayo; yena samannaagato ariyasaavako aaka"nkhamaano attanaava ^a^V3.0426^ea^ attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo ^a^M3.0314^ea^ khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''ti. dasama.m.

[21] raajaa ogadhadiighaavu, saariputtaapare duve.
[22] thapatii ve.ludvaareyyaa, gi~njakaavasathe tayoti..

[03] 1007^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0452^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati raajakaaraame. atha kho sahassabhikkhunisa"ngho {sahasso bhikkhunisa.mgho (sii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``catuuhi kho, bhikkhuniyo, dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhuniyo, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme ^a^P5.0361^ea^ ...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti, akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi kho, bhikkhuniyo, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 1008^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0427^ea^. ``braahma.naa, bhikkhave, udayagaamini.m naama pa.tipada.m pa~n~napenti. te saavaka.m eva.m samaadapenti -- `ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, kaalasseva u.t.thaaya paaciinamukho yaahi. so tva.m maa sobbha.m parivajjehi, maa ^a^M3.0315^ea^ papaata.m, maa khaa.nu.m, maa ka.n.daka.thaana.m {ka.n.daka.m .thaana.m (pii0 ka0)}, maa candaniya.m, maa o.ligalla.m. yattha {yattheva (syaa0 ka.m0), yaani vaa (sii0)} papateyyaasi tattheva mara.na.m aagameyyaasi. eva.m tva.m, ambho purisa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissasii'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^T5.0453^ea^ kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naana.m baalagamanameta.m {baalaana.m gamanameta.m (sii0)} muu.lhagamanameta.m na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. aha~nca kho, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye udayagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pa~n~napemi; yaa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, udayagaaminii pa.tipadaa; yaa ekantanibbidaaya...pe0... nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati? idha ^a^P5.0362^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati; dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. aya.m kho saa, bhikkhave, udayagaaminii pa.tipadaa ekantanibbidaaya...pe0... nibbaanaaya sa.mvattatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 1009^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca aanando aayasmaa ca saariputto saavatthiya.m viharanti jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m ^a^T5.0454^ea^ aananda.m etadavoca -- ``katina.m kho, aavuso aananda ^a^V3.0428^ea^, dhammaana.m pahaanaa, katina.m dhammaana.m samannaagamanahetu, evamaya.m pajaa bhagavataa byaakataa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti? ``catunna.m kho, aavuso, dhammaana.m pahaanaa, catunna.m dhammaana.m samannaagamanahetu, evamaya.m pajaa bhagavataa byaakataa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti.

[03] ``katamesa.m ^a^M3.0316^ea^ catunna.m? yathaaruupena kho, aavuso, buddhe appasaadena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati tathaaruupassa ^a^P5.0363^ea^ buddhe appasaado na hoti. yathaaruupena ca kho, aavuso, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato sutavaa ariyasaavako kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati tathaaruupassa buddhe aveccappasaado hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa''ti.

[03] ``yathaaruupena ca kho, aavuso, dhamme appasaadena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati tathaaruupassa dhamme appasaado na hoti. yathaaruupena ca kho, aavuso, dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagato sutavaa ariyasaavako kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati tathaaruupassa dhamme aveccappasaado ^a^T5.0455^ea^ hoti -- svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo...pe0... vi~n~nuuhiiti.

[03] ``yathaaruupena ca kho, aavuso, sa"nghe appasaadena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati tathaaruupassa sa"nghe appasaado na hoti. yathaaruupena ca kho, aavuso, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato sutavaa ariyasaavako kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati tathaaruupassa sa"nghe aveccappasaado hoti -- suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati.

[03] ``yathaaruupena ca kho, aavuso, dussiilyena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati tathaaruupassa dussiilya.m na hoti. yathaaruupehi ca kho, aavuso, ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato sutavaa ariyasaavako ^a^V3.0429^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati tathaaruupaani ariyakantaani siilaani honti akha.n.daani...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. imesa.m ^a^P5.0364^ea^ kho, aavuso, catunna.m dhammaana.m pahaanaa imesa.m catunna.m ^a^M3.0317^ea^ dhammaana.m samannaagamanahetu evamaya.m pajaa bhagavataa byaakataa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 1010^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sabbaduggatibhaya.m samatikkanto hoti. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ^a^T5.0456^ea^ buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sabbaduggatibhaya.m samatikkanto hotii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 1011^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sabbaduggativinipaatabhaya.m samatikkanto hoti. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako sabbaduggativinipaatabhaya.m samatikkanto hotii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 1012^b^.^eb^ ``ye te, bhikkhave, anukampeyyaatha, ye ca sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m -- mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa -- te, bhikkhave, catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu samaadapetabbaa ^a^V3.0430^ea^, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa. katamesu catuusu? buddhe ^a^P5.0365^ea^ aveccappasaade samaadapetabbaa, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantesu siilesu samaadapetabbaa, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa akha.n.desu...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikesu. ye te, bhikkhave, anukampeyyaatha ^a^T5.0457^ea^, ye ca sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m -- mittaa vaa amaccaa ^a^M3.0318^ea^ vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa -- te, bhikkhave, imesu catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu samaadapetabbaa, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 1013^b^.^eb^ ``ye te, bhikkhave, anukampeyyaatha, ye ca sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m -- mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa -- te, bhikkhave, catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu samaadapetabbaa, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa. katamesu catuusu? buddhe aveccappasaade samaadapetabbaa, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m a~n~nathatta.m -- pathaviidhaatuyaa, aapodhaatuyaa, tejodhaatuyaa, vaayodhaatuyaa -- na tveva buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagatassa ariyasaavakassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m. tatrida.m a~n~nathatta.m -- so vata buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato ariyasaavako niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa pettivisaya.m vaa upapajjissatii''ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ``dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantesu siilesu samaadapetabbaa, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa akha.n.desu...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikesu. siyaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m a~n~nathatta.m -- pathaviidhaatuyaa, aapodhaatuyaa, tejodhaatuyaa, vaayodhaatuyaa -- na tveva ariyakantehi ^a^P5.0366^ea^ siilehi samannaagatassa ariyasaavakassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m. tatrida.m a~n~nathatta.m -- so vata ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato ariyasaavako ^a^T5.0458^ea^ niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa pettivisaya.m vaa upapajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye te, bhikkhave, anukampeyyaatha, ye ca sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m -- mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa -- te, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0431^ea^, imesu catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu samaadapetabbaa, nivesetabbaa, pati.t.thaapetabbaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 1014^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa ^a^M3.0319^ea^ baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- jetavane antarahito devesu taavati.msesu paaturahosi. atha kho sambahulaa taavati.msakaayikaa devataayo yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho taa devataayo aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca --

[03] ``saadhu kho, aavuso, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamana.m hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamanahetu kho, aavuso, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. saadhu kho, aavuso, dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... saadhu kho, aavuso, ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamana.m hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... ^a^T5.0459^ea^ samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. ariyakantehi ^a^P5.0367^ea^ siilehi samannaagamanahetu kho, aavuso, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu kho, maarisa moggallaana, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamana.m hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamanahetu kho, maarisa moggallaana, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. saadhu kho, maarisa moggallaana, dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamana.m hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamanahetu kho, maarisa moggallaana, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 1015^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0432^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- jetavane antarahito devesu taavati.msesu paaturahosi. atha kho sambahulaa taavati.msakaayikaa devataayo yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^M3.0320^ea^ .thitaa kho taa devataayo aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca --

[03] ``saadhu kho, maarisa moggallaana, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamana.m hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamanahetu kho, maarisa moggallaana, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa. saadhu kho, maarisa moggallaana, dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamana.m hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamanahetu kho, maarisa moggallaana, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] ``saadhu kho, aavuso, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamana.m hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamanahetu kho, aavuso, evamidhekacce sattaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa. saadhu kho, aavuso ^a^M3.0321^ea^, dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamana.m hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamanahetu kho, aavuso, evamidhekacce sattaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti.

[03] ``saadhu kho, maarisa, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamana.m hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagamanahetu kho, maarisa, evamaya.m pajaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa. saadhu kho, maarisa, dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamana.m hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagamanahetu kho, maarisa, evamaya.m pajaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti. dasama.m.
