[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sahassabraahma.naananda ^a^T5.0462^ea^, duggati apare duve.
[22] mittaamaccaa duve vuttaa, tayo ca devacaarikaati..

[03] 1017^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0463^ea^ ^a^V3.0434^ea^ ^a^P5.0369^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, bhante, kapilavatthu iddha~nceva phiita~nca baahuja~n~na.m aaki.n.namanussa.m sambaadhabyuuha.m. so khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m vaa payirupaasitvaa manobhaavaniiye vaa bhikkhuu saayanhasamaya.m kapilavatthu.m pavisanto; bhantenapi {vibbhantenapi (sii0), bhamantenapi (ka0)} hatthinaa samaagacchaami ^a^M3.0322^ea^; bhantenapi assena samaagacchaami; bhantenapi rathena samaagacchaami; bhantenapi saka.tena samaagacchaami; bhantenapi purisena samaagacchaami. tassa mayha.m, bhante, tasmi.m samaye mussateva {musateva (?)} bhagavanta.m aarabbha sati, mussati {musati (?)} dhamma.m aarabbha sati, mussati sa"ngha.m aarabbha sati. tassa mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `imamhi caaha.m samaye kaala.m kareyya.m, kaa mayha.m gati, ko abhisamparaayo'''ti?

[03] ``maa bhaayi, mahaanaama, maa bhaayi, mahaanaama! apaapaka.m te mara.na.m bhavissati apaapikaa kaala.mkiriyaa {kaalakiriyaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. yassa kassaci, mahaanaama, diigharatta.m saddhaaparibhaavita.m citta.m siilaparibhaavita.m citta.m sutaparibhaavita.m citta.m caagaparibhaavita.m citta.m pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m citta.m, tassa yo hi khvaaya.m kaayo ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko {caatummahaabhuutiko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} maataapettikasambhavo ^a^P5.0370^ea^ odanakummaasuupacayo ^a^T5.0464^ea^ aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammo. ta.m idheva kaakaa vaa khaadanti gijjhaa vaa khaadanti kulalaa vaa khaadanti sunakhaa vaa khaadanti si"ngaalaa {sigaalaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa khaadanti vividhaa vaa paa.nakajaataa khaadanti; ya~nca khvassa citta.m diigharatta.m saddhaaparibhaavita.m...pe0... pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m ta.m uddhagaami hoti visesagaami.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaanaama, puriso sappikumbha.m vaa telakumbha.m vaa gambhiira.m udakarahada.m ogaahitvaa bhindeyya. tatra yaa assa sakkharaa vaa ka.thalaa {kathalaa (pii0 ka0)} vaa saa adhogaamii assa, ya~nca khvassa tatra sappi vaa tela.m vaa ta.m uddhagaami assa visesagaami. evameva kho, mahaanaama, yassa ^a^V3.0435^ea^ kassaci diigharatta.m saddhaaparibhaavita.m citta.m...pe0... pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m citta.m tassa yo hi khvaaya.m kaayo ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko maataapettikasambhavo odanakummaasuupacayo aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammo ta.m idheva kaakaa vaa khaadanti gijjhaa vaa khaadanti kulalaa vaa khaadanti sunakhaa vaa khaadanti si"ngaalaa vaa khaadanti vividhaa vaa paa.nakajaataa khaadanti; ya~nca khvassa citta.m diigharatta.m saddhaaparibhaavita.m...pe0... pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m ta.m uddhagaami hoti visesagaami. tuyha.m kho pana, mahaanaama, diigharatta.m saddhaaparibhaavita.m citta.m...pe0... pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m citta.m ^a^P5.0371^ea^. maa bhaayi, mahaanaama ^a^M3.0323^ea^, maa bhaayi, mahaanaama! apaapaka.m te mara.na.m bhavissati, apaapikaa kaala.mkiriyaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 1018^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0465^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m, bhante, kapilavatthu iddha~nceva phiita~nca baahuja~n~na.m aaki.n.namanussa.m sambaadhabyuuha.m. so khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m vaa payirupaasitvaa manobhaavaniiye vaa bhikkhuu saayanhasamaya.m kapilavatthu.m pavisanto; bhantenapi hatthinaa samaagacchaami; bhantenapi assena samaagacchaami; bhantenapi rathena samaagacchaami; bhante, napi saka.tena samaagacchaami; bhante, napi purisena samaagacchaami. tassa mayha.m, bhante, tasmi.m samaye mussateva bhagavanta.m aarabbha sati, mussati dhamma.m aarabbha sati, mussati sa"ngha.m aarabbha sati. tassa mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `imamhi caaha.m samaye kaala.m kareyya.m, kaa mayha.m gati, ko abhisamparaayo'''ti?

[03] ``maa bhaayi, mahaanaama, maa bhaayi, mahaanaama! apaapaka.m te mara.na.m bhavissati apaapikaa kaala.mkiriyaa. catuuhi kho, mahaanaama, dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro. katamehi catuuhi? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe ^a^T5.0466^ea^ ...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0436^ea^, mahaanaama, rukkho paaciinaninno paaciinapo.no paaciinapabbhaaro, so muulacchinno katamena papateyyaa''ti? ``yena, bhante, ninno yena po.no yena pabbhaaro''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaanaama, imehi catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato ariyasaavako nibbaananinno hoti nibbaanapo.no nibbaanapabbhaaro''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 1019^b^.^eb^ kapilavatthunidaana.m ^a^M3.0324^ea^. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena godhaa sakko tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa godha.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``katihi ^a^P5.0372^ea^ {katiihi (pii0 ka0) ruupasiddhi oloketabbaa} tva.m, godhe, dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaasi avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na''nti?

[03] ``tiihi khvaaha.m, mahaanaama, dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na.m. katamehi tiihi? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati. imehi khvaaha.m, mahaanaama, tiihi dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na.m.

[03] ``tva.m pana, mahaanaama, katihi dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m ^a^T5.0467^ea^ aajaanaasi avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na''nti? ``catuuhi khvaaha.m, godhe, dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na.m. katamehi catuuhi? idha, godhe, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi khvaaha.m, godhe, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na''nti.

[03] ``aagamehi tva.m, mahaanaama, aagamehi tva.m, mahaanaama! bhagavaava eta.m jaaneyya etehi dhammehi samannaagata.m vaa asamannaagata.m vaa''ti. ``aayaama, godhe, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V3.0437^ea^ bhagavato etamattha.m aarocessaamaa''ti. atha ^a^P5.0373^ea^ kho mahaanaamo sakko godhaa ca sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m ^a^M3.0325^ea^, bhante, yena godhaa sakko tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa godha.m sakka.m etadavoca.m -- `katihi tva.m, godhe, dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaasi avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na.m'? eva.m ^a^T5.0468^ea^ vutte, bhante, godhaa sakko ma.m etadavoca --

[03] ``tiihi khvaaha.m, mahaanaama, dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na.m. katamehi tiihi? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati. imehi khvaaha.m, mahaanaama, tiihi dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na.m. tva.m pana, mahaanaama, katamehi dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaasi avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na''nti?

[03] ``eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante, godha.m sakka.m etadavoca.m -- `catuuhi khvaaha.m, godhe, dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na.m. katamehi catuuhi? idha, godhe, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi khvaaha.m, godhe, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagata.m sotaapannapuggala.m aajaanaami avinipaatadhamma.m niyata.m sambodhiparaaya.na'''nti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^T5.0469^ea^ vutte, bhante, godhaa sakko ma.m etadavoca -- `aagamehi tva.m, mahaanaama, aagamehi tva.m, mahaanaama! bhagavaava eta.m jaaneyya etehi dhammehi samannaagata.m vaa asamannaagata.m vaa'''ti. ``idha ^a^P5.0374^ea^, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppaado uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavaa ekato bhikkhusa"ngho ^a^V3.0438^ea^ ca. yeneva bhagavaa tenevaaha.m assa.m. eva.m pasanna.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu. idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppaado uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavaa ekato bhikkhusa"ngho bhikkhunisa"ngho ca. yeneva bhagavaa tenevaaha.m assa.m. eva.m pasanna.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu. idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppaado uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavaa ekato bhikkhusa"ngho ^a^M3.0326^ea^ bhikkhunisa"ngho ca upaasakaa ca. yeneva bhagavaa tenevaaha.m assa.m. eva.m pasanna.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu. idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppaado uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavaa ekato bhikkhusa"ngho bhikkhunisa"ngho upaasakaa upaasikaayo ca. yeneva bhagavaa tenevaaha.m assa.m. eva.m pasanna.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu. idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppaado uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavaa ekato bhikkhusa"ngho bhikkhunisa"ngho upaasakaa upaasikaayo sadevako ca loko samaarako sabrahmako sassama.nabraahma.nii ^a^T5.0470^ea^ pajaa sadevamanussaa. yeneva bhagavaa tenevaaha.m assa.m. eva.m pasanna.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretuu''ti. ``eva.mvaadii tva.m, godhe, mahaanaama.m sakka.m ki.m vadesii''ti? ``eva.mvaadaaha.m, bhante, mahaanaama.m sakka.m na ki~nci vadaami, a~n~natra kalyaa.naa a~n~natra kusalaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 1020^b^.^eb^ kapilavatthunidaana.m ^a^P5.0375^ea^. tena kho pana samayena sara.naani {sarakaani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sakko kaala"nkato hoti. so bhagavataa byaakato -- ``sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti. tatra suda.m sambahulaa sakkaa sa"ngamma samaagamma ujjhaayanti khiiyanti vipaacenti -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! ettha daani ko na sotaapanno bhavissati! yatra hi naama sara.naani sakko kaala"nkato; so bhagavataa byaakato -- `sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'ti. sara.naani sakko sikkhaadubbalyamaapaadi, majjapaana.m apaayii''ti.

[03] atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante, sara.naani sakko kaala"nkato. so bhagavataa byaakato -- `sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'ti. tatra suda.m, bhante, sambahulaa sakkaa sa"ngamma samaagamma ujjhaayanti khiiyanti vipaacenti -- ``acchariya.m ^a^T5.0471^ea^ vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! ettha daani ^a^V3.0439^ea^ ko na sotapanno bhavissati! yatra hi naama sara.naani sakko kaala"nkato; so bhagavataa byaakato ^a^M3.0327^ea^ -- `sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'ti. sara.naani sakko sikkhaadubbalyamaapaadi, majjapaana.m apaayii''ti.

[03] 1022^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V3.0444^ea^ ^a^M3.0332^ea^. tena kho pana samayena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vanda -- `anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^P5.0381^ea^, bhante''ti kho so ^a^T5.0479^ea^ puriso anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandati. eva~nca vadati -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa saariputto tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aayasmataa aanandena pacchaasama.nena yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho aayasmaa saariputto anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, gahapati, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] ``yathaaruupena kho, gahapati, buddhe appasaadena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa ^a^V3.0445^ea^ para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ^a^M3.0333^ea^ tathaaruupo te buddhe appasaado natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, buddhe aveccappasaado -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. ta~nca pana te buddhe aveccappasaada.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena kho, gahapati, dhamme appasaadena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa ^a^P5.0382^ea^ apaaya.m duggati.m ^a^T5.0480^ea^ vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupo te dhamme appasaado natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, dhamme aveccappasaado -- svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo...pe0... paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhiiti. ta~nca pana te dhamme aveccappasaada.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena kho, gahapati, sa"nghe appasaadena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupo te sa"nghe appasaado natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sa"nghe aveccappasaado -- suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati. ta~nca pana te sa"nghe aveccappasaada.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena kho, gahapati, dussiilyena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupa.m te dussiilya.m natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, ariyakantaani siilaani...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. taani ca pana te ariyakantaani siilaani attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupaaya kho, gahapati, micchaadi.t.thiyaa samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano ^a^T5.0481^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupaa te micchaadi.t.thi natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaadi.t.thi. ta~nca pana te sammaadi.t.thi.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena kho, gahapati, micchaasa"nkappena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa ^a^V3.0446^ea^ para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ^a^M3.0334^ea^, tathaaruupo te micchaasa"nkappo natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaasa"nkappo. ta~nca pana te sammaasa"nkappa.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupaaya ^a^P5.0383^ea^ kho, gahapati, micchaavaacaaya samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupaa te micchaavaacaa natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaavaacaa. ta~nca pana te sammaavaaca.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena kho, gahapati, micchaakammantena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupo te micchaakammanto natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaakammanto. ta~nca pana te sammaakammanta.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena ^a^T5.0482^ea^ kho, gahapati, micchaaaajiivena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupo te micchaaaajiivo natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaaaajiivo. ta~nca pana te sammaaaajiiva.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena kho, gahapati, micchaavaayaamena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupo te micchaavaayaamo natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaavaayaamo. ta~nca pana te sammaavaayaama.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupaaya kho, gahapati, micchaasatiyaa samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupaa te micchaasati natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaasati. ta~nca pana te sammaasati.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena ^a^V3.0447^ea^ kho, gahapati, micchaasamaadhinaa samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ^a^M3.0335^ea^, tathaaruupo te micchaasamaadhi natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaasamaadhi. ta~nca pana te sammaasamaadhi.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupena ^a^T5.0483^ea^ ^a^P5.0384^ea^ kho, gahapati, micchaa~naa.nena samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupa.m te micchaa~naa.na.m natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaa~naa.na.m. ta~nca pana te sammaa~naa.na.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``yathaaruupaaya kho, gahapati, micchaavimuttiyaa samannaagato assutavaa puthujjano kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, tathaaruupaa te micchaavimutti natthi. atthi ca kho te, gahapati, sammaavimutti. ta~nca pana te sammaavimutti.m attani samanupassato .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambheyyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa .thaanaso vedanaa pa.tippassambhi.msu. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati aayasmanta~nca saariputta.m aayasmanta~nca aananda.m sakeneva thaalipaakena parivisi. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati aayasmanta.m saariputta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niicaasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T5.0484^ea^ nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m aayasmaa saariputto imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``yassa saddhaa tathaagate, acalaa suppati.t.thitaa.
[22] siila~nca yassa kalyaa.na.m, ariyakanta.m pasa.msita.m..
[21] ``sa"nghe pasaado yassatthi, ujubhuuta~nca dassana.m.
[22] adaliddoti {ada.liddoti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} ta.m aahu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^V3.0448^ea^ saddha~nca siila~nca, pasaada.m dhammadassana.m.
[22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaanasaasana''nti..
[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m imaahi gaathaahi anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0336^ea^ ^a^P5.0385^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``handa! kuto nu tva.m, aananda, aagacchasi divaadivassaa''ti? ``aayasmataa, bhante, saariputtena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati iminaa ca iminaa ca ovaadena ovadito''ti. ``pa.n.dito, aananda, saariputto; mahaapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto, yatra hi naama cattaari sotaapattiya"ngaani dasahaakaarehi vibhajissatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 1023^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko ^a^T5.0485^ea^ gahapati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena aayasmato aanandassa paade sirasaa vanda -- `anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato aanandassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa aanando yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so puriso anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``anaathapi.n.diko, bhante, gahapati aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato aanandassa paade sirasaa vandati. eva~nca vadati -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa aanando yena anaathapi.n.dikassa ^a^V3.0449^ea^ gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa aanando tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho aayasmaa aanando anaathapi.n.dika.m ^a^M3.0337^ea^ gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, gahapati, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci dukkhaa ^a^T5.0486^ea^ vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] ``catuuhi ^a^P5.0386^ea^ kho, gahapati, dhammehi samannaagatassa assutavato puthujjanassa hoti uttaaso, hoti chambhitatta.m, hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m. katamehi catuuhi? idha, gahapati, assutavaa puthujjano buddhe appasaadena samannaagato hoti. ta~nca panassa buddhe appasaada.m attani samanupassato hoti uttaaso, hoti chambhitatta.m, hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, assutavaa puthujjano dhamme appasaadena samannaagato hoti. ta~nca panassa dhamme appasaada.m attani samanupassato hoti uttaaso, hoti chambhitatta.m, hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, assutavaa puthujjano sa"nghe appasaadena samannaagato hoti. ta~nca panassa sa"nghe appasaada.m attani samanupassato hoti uttaaso, hoti chambhitatta.m, hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, assutavaa puthujjano dussiilyena samannaagato hoti. ta~nca panassa dussiilya.m attani samanupassato hoti uttaaso, hoti chambhitatta.m, hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m. imehi kho, gahapati, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagatassa assutavato ^a^T5.0487^ea^ puthujjanassa hoti uttaaso, hoti chambhitatta.m, hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m.

[03] ``catuuhi ^a^V3.0450^ea^ kho, gahapati, dhammehi samannaagatassa sutavato ariyasaavakassa na hoti uttaaso, na hoti chambhitatta.m, na hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m. katamehi catuuhi? idha, gahapati, sutavaa ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. ta~nca panassa buddhe aveccappasaada.m attani samanupassato na hoti uttaaso, na hoti chambhitatta.m, na hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, sutavaa ariyasaavako dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo...pe0... paccatta.m veditabbo ^a^M3.0338^ea^ vi~n~nuuhiiti. ta~nca panassa dhamme aveccappasaada.m attani samanupassato na hoti uttaaso, na hoti chambhitatta.m, na hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, sutavaa ariyasaavako sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati. ta~nca panassa sa"nghe aveccappasaada.m attani samanupassato na hoti uttaaso, na hoti chambhitatta.m, na hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, sutavaa ariyasaavako ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. taani ca panassa ariyakantaani siilaani ^a^T5.0488^ea^ attani samanupassato na ^a^P5.0387^ea^ hoti uttaaso, na hoti chambhitatta.m, na hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya.m. imehi kho, gahapati, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagatassa sutavato ariyasaavakassa na hoti uttaaso, na hoti chambhitatta.m, na hoti samparaayika.m mara.nabhaya''nti.

[03] ``naaha.m, bhante aananda, bhaayaami. kyaaha.m bhaayissaami! aha~nhi, bhante, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato homi -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato homi -- suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati. yaani cimaani, bhante, bhagavataa gihisaamiicikaani sikkhaapadaani desitaani, naaha.m tesa.m ki~nci attani kha.n.da.m samanupassaamii''ti ^a^V3.0451^ea^. ``laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati! sotaapattiphala.m tayaa, gahapati, byaakata''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 1024^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``yato kho, gahapati, ariyasaavakassa pa~nca bhayaani veraani vuupasantaani ca honti, catuuhi ca sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato hoti, ariyo cassa ~naayo pa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti suppa.tividdho, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni ^a^M3.0339^ea^ {khii.natiracchaanayoniyo (sabbattha)} khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato; sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''.

[03] ``katamaani ^a^T5.0489^ea^ pa~nca bhayaani veraani vuupasantaani honti? ya.m, gahapati, paa.naatipaatii paa.naatipaatappaccayaa di.t.thadhammikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, samparaayikampi bhaya.m ^a^P5.0388^ea^ vera.m pasavati, cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvediyati. paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratassa eva.m ta.m bhaya.m vera.m vuupasanta.m hoti. ya.m, gahapati, adinnaadaayii...pe0... ya.m, gahapati, kaamesumicchaacaarii...pe0... ya.m, gahapati, musaavaadii...pe0... ya.m, gahapati, suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaayii suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanappaccayaa di.t.thadhammikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, samparaayikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvediyati. suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tiviratassa eva.m ta.m bhaya.m vera.m vuupasanta.m hoti. imaani pa~nca bhayaani veraani vuupasantaani honti.

[03] ``katamehi catuuhi sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato hoti? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. imehi catuuhi sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``katamo cassa ariyo ~naayo pa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti suppa.tividdho? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako ^a^V3.0452^ea^ pa.ticcasamuppaada~n~neva saadhuka.m yoniso manasi karoti -- iti imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ^a^T5.0490^ea^ ida.m uppajjati; iti imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati; yadida.m avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho...pe0... phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. ayamassa ^a^P5.0389^ea^ ariyo ~naayo pa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti suppa.tividdho.

[03] atha kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- ``kacci, bhante, bhagavaa arogo ceva balavaa caa''ti? ``arogo caavuso, bhagavaa balavaa caa''ti. ``kacci ^a^P5.0406^ea^ pana, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanaa arogaa ceva balavanto caa''ti? ``saariputtamoggallaanaapi kho, aavuso, arogaa ceva balavanto caa''ti. ``kacci pana, bhante, bhikkhusa"ngho arogo ca balavaa caa''ti. ``bhikkhusa"nghopi kho, aavuso, arogo ca balavaa caa''ti. ``atthi pana te, bhante, ki~nci iminaa antaravassena bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita''nti? ``sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `appakaa te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ye aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. atha kho eteva bahutaraa bhikkhuu ye pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa'''ti.

[03] 1049^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. atha ^a^P5.0407^ea^ kho dhammadinno upaasako pa~ncahi upaasakasatehi saddhi.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho dhammadinno upaasako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ovadatu no, bhante, bhagavaa; anusaasatu no, bhante, bhagavaa ya.m amhaaka.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``tasmaatiha vo, dhammadinna.m, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ye te suttantaa tathaagatabhaasitaa gambhiiraa gambhiiratthaa lokuttaraa su~n~natapa.tisa.myuttaa te kaalena kaala.m upasampajja viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, dhammadinna, sikkhitabba''nti. ``na kho neta.m, bhante, sukara.m amhehi puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasantehi kaasikacandana.m paccanubhontehi maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayantehi jaataruuparajata.m saadiyantehi -- ye te suttantaa tathaagatabhaasitaa gambhiiraa ^a^T5.0513^ea^ gambhiiratthaa lokuttaraa su~n~natapa.tisa.myuttaa te kaalena kaala.m upasampajja viharitu.m. tesa.m no, bhante, bhagavaa amhaaka.m pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu .thitaana.m uttaridhamma.m desetuu''ti.

[03] ``sappa~n~nena mahaanaama, upaasakena sappa~n~no upaasako aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano catuuhi assaasaniiyehi dhammehi assaasetabbo -- `assaasataayasmaa -- atthaayasmato buddhe aveccappasaado itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati ^a^V3.0472^ea^. assaasataayasmaa -- atthaayasmato dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe...pe0... ariyakantaani siilaani akha.n.daani...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikaanii'''ti.

[03] ``sappa~n~nena ^a^P5.0409^ea^, mahaanaama, upaasakena sappa~n~no upaasako aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano imehi catuuhi assaasaniiyehi dhammehi assaasetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `atthaayasmato maataapituusu apekkhaa'ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `atthi me maataapituusu apekkhaa'ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmaa kho maariso mara.nadhammo. sace paayasmaa maataapituusu apekkha.m karissati, marissateva; no ce ^a^T5.0515^ea^ paayasmaa ^a^M3.0358^ea^ maataapituusu apekkha.m karissati, marissateva. saadhaayasmaa, yaa te maataapituusu apekkhaa ta.m pajahaa'''ti.

[03] ``so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `yaa me maataapituusu apekkhaa saa pahiinaa'ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `atthi panaayasmato puttadaaresu apekkhaa'ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `atthi me puttadaaresu apekkhaa'ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmaa kho maariso mara.nadhammo. sace paayasmaa puttadaaresu apekkha.m karissati, marissateva; no ce paayasmaa puttadaaresu apekkha.m karissati, marissateva. saadhaayasmaa, yaa te puttadaaresu apekkhaa ta.m pajahaa'''ti.

[03] ``so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `yaa me puttadaaresu apekkhaa saa pahiinaa'ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `atthi panaayasmato maanusakesu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu apekkhaa'ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `atthi me maanusakesu pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu apekkhaa'ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `maanusakehi kho, aavuso, kaamehi dibbaa kaamaa abhikkantataraa ca pa.niitataraa ca. saadhaayasmaa, maanusakehi kaamehi citta.m vu.t.thaapetvaa caatumahaaraajikesu {caatummahaaraajikesu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} devesu citta.m adhimocehii'''ti.

[03] ``so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `maanusakehi me kaamehi citta.m vu.t.thita.m, caatumahaaraajikesu devesu citta.m adhimocita'nti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `caatumahaaraajikehi kho, aavuso ^a^P5.0410^ea^, devehi taavati.msaa devaa abhikkantataraa ca pa.niitataraa ca. saadhaayasmaa, caatumahaaraajikehi ^a^T5.0516^ea^ devehi citta.m vu.t.thaapetvaa taavati.msesu devesu citta.m adhimocehii'''ti.

[03] ``so ^a^V3.0473^ea^ ce eva.m vadeyya -- `caatumahaaraajikehi me devehi citta.m vu.t.thita.m, taavati.msesu devesu citta.m adhimocita'nti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `taavati.msehi kho, aavuso, devehi yaamaa devaa...pe0... tusitaa devaa...pe0... nimmaanaratii devaa...pe0... paranimmitavasavattii devaa...pe0... paranimmitavasavattiihi kho, aavuso, devehi brahmaloko abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. saadhaayasmaa, paranimmitavasavattiihi devehi citta.m vu.t.thaapetvaa brahmaloke citta.m adhimocehii'ti. so ^a^M3.0359^ea^ ce eva.m vadeyya -- `paranimmitavasavattiihi me devehi citta.m vu.t.thita.m, brahmaloke citta.m adhimocita'nti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `brahmalokopi kho, aavuso, anicco addhuvo sakkaayapariyaapanno. saadhaayasmaa, brahmalokaa citta.m vu.t.thaapetvaa sakkaayanirodhe citta.m upasa.mharaahii'''ti.

[03] ``so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `brahmalokaa me citta.m vu.t.thita.m, sakkaayanirodhe citta.m upasa.mharaamii'ti; eva.m vimuttacittassa kho, mahaanaama, upaasakassa aasavaa {vassasata (sii0 syaa0)} vimuttacittena bhikkhunaa na ki~nci naanaakara.na.m vadaami, yadida.m -- vimuttiyaa vimutta''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 1051^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? sappurisasa.msevo ^a^P5.0411^ea^, saddhammassavana.m ^a^T5.0517^ea^, yonisomanasikaaro, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 1052^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? ...pe0... sa.mvattantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 1053^b^.^eb^ ...pe0... ^a^V3.0474^ea^ anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya...pe0... sa.mvattantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 1071^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T5.0520^ea^ ^a^V3.0478^ea^ ^a^M3.0363^ea^ ^a^P5.0414^ea^. ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha. samaahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati? `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha. samaahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati''.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 1072^b^.^eb^ ``pa.tisallaane, bhikkhave, yogamaapajjatha. pa.tisalliino, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati? `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. pa.tisallaane ^a^P5.0415^ea^, bhikkhave, yogamaapajjatha. pa.tisalliino, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V3.0479^ea^, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yogo ^a^T5.0521^ea^ kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 1073^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^M3.0364^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji.msu, sabbe te catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamayaaya. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissanti, sabbe te catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamayaaya. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, sabbe te catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamayaaya.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa dukkhasamudayassa ariyasaccassa dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji.msu...pe0... pabbajissanti...pe0... pabbajanti, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamayaaya.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yogo kara.niiyo, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 1074^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisamesu.m, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisamesu.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa ^a^V3.0480^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m ^a^T5.0522^ea^ ^a^P5.0416^ea^ abhisamessanti, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisamessanti. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisamenti, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisamenti.

[03] ``katamaani cattaari? dukkha.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m kulaputtaa sammaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisamesu.m ^a^M3.0365^ea^ ...pe0... abhisamessanti...pe0... abhisamenti, sabbe te imaani cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisamenti.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 1075^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhi.msu, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhi.msu. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhissanti, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhissanti. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhanti, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhanti.

[03] ``katamaani cattaari? dukkha.m ariyasacca.m...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa ^a^T5.0523^ea^ vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhi.msu...pe0... abhisambojjhissanti...pe0... abhisambojjhanti, sabbe te imaani cattaari ariyasaccaani ^a^P5.0417^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m abhisambojjhanti.
[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V3.0481^ea^, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 1076^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasesu.m, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasesu.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasessanti, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasessanti. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasenti, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasenti.

[03] ``katamaani ^a^M3.0366^ea^ cattaari? dukkha.m ariyasacca.m...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasesu.m...pe0... pakaasessanti...pe0... pakaasenti, sabbe te imaani cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambuddha.m pakaasenti.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 1077^b^.^eb^ ``maa, bhikkhave, paapake akusale vitakke vitakkeyyaatha {vitakketha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, seyyathida.m ^a^T5.0524^ea^ -- kaamavitakka.m, byaapaadavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m. ta.m kissa hetu? nete, bhikkhave, vitakkaa atthasa.mhitaa naadibrahmacariyakaa ^a^P5.0418^ea^ na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``vitakkentaa ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti vitakkeyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti ^a^V3.0482^ea^ vitakkeyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti vitakkeyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti vitakkeyyaatha. ta.m kissa hetu? ete, bhikkhave, vitakkaa atthasa.mhitaa ete aadibrahmacariyakaa ete nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 1078^b^.^eb^ ``maa, bhikkhave, paapaka.m akusala.m citta.m cinteyyaatha {cintetha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato loko'ti vaa, `antavaa loko'ti vaa `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti ^a^M3.0367^ea^ tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa. ta.m kissa hetu? nesaa, bhikkhave, cintaa atthasa.mhitaa naadibrahmacariyakaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya ^a^T5.0525^ea^ na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``cintentaa ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti cinteyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti cinteyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti cinteyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti cinteyyaatha. ta.m kissa hetu? esaa, bhikkhave, cintaa atthasa.mhitaa, esaa aadibrahmacariyakaa, esaa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya ^a^P5.0419^ea^ sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 1079^b^.^eb^ ``maa ^a^V3.0483^ea^, bhikkhave, viggaahikakatha.m katheyyaatha {kathetha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} -- `na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi, aha.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaami. ki.m tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanissasi! micchaapa.tipanno tvamasi, ahamasmi sammaapa.tipanno. sahita.m me, asahita.m te. purevacaniiya.m pacchaa avaca, pacchaavacaniiya.m pure avaca. adhici.n.na.m {aci.n.na.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} te viparaavatta.m. aaropito te vaado, cara vaadappamokkhaaya. niggahitosi, nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? nesaa, bhikkhave, kathaa atthasa.mhitaa naadibrahmacariyakaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``kathentaa ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti katheyyaatha ^a^T5.0526^ea^, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti katheyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti katheyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti katheyyaatha...pe0... yogo kara.niiyo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 1080^b^.^eb^ ``maa ^a^M3.0368^ea^, bhikkhave, anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m katheyyaatha, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m, bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m, annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m gandhakatha.m, ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m itthikatha.m {itthikatha.m purisakatha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m ^a^P5.0420^ea^ kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m, pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m, lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa. ta.m kissa hetu? nesaa, bhikkhave, kathaa atthasa.mhitaa naadibrahmacariyakaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``kathentaa ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti katheyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti katheyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti katheyyaatha, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti katheyyaatha. ta.m kissa hetu? esaa, bhikkhave, kathaa atthasa.mhitaa, esaa aadibrahmacariyakaa, esaa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] 1081^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0528^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tatra ^a^P5.0421^ea^ kho bhagavaa pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``dveme, bhikkhave, antaa pabbajitena ^a^M3.0369^ea^ na sevitabbaa. katame dve? yo caaya.m kaamesu kaamasukhallikaanuyogo hiino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasa.mhito, yo caaya.m attakilamathaanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasa.mhito. ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati''.

[03] ``katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho saa, bhikkhave, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``ida.m ^a^V3.0485^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m -- jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi ^a^T5.0529^ea^ dukkhaa, byaadhipi dukkho, mara.nampi dukkha.m, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m -- sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa {pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaapi (pii0 ka0)} dukkhaa. ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m -- yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (sii0 pii0)} nandiraagasahagataa tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m {seyyathiida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa. ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m -- yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo. ida.m kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ^a^P5.0422^ea^ ariyasacca.m -- ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ```ida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. `ta.m kho panida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pari~n~neyya'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe...pe0... udapaadi. `ta.m kho panida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pari~n~naata'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ```ida.m ^a^M3.0370^ea^ dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. `ta.m kho panida.m dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m pahaatabba'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe...pe0... ^a^T5.0530^ea^ udapaadi. `ta.m kho panida.m dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m pahiina'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ```ida.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. `ta.m kho panida.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m sacchikaatabba'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe...pe0... udapaadi. `ta.m kho panida.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m sacchikata'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ```ida.m ^a^V3.0486^ea^ dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. ta.m kho panida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m bhaavetabba'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe...pe0... udapaadi. `ta.m kho panida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m bhaavita'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca me, bhikkhave, imesu catuusu ariyasaccesu eva.m tipariva.t.ta.m dvaadasaakaara.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nadassana.m na suvisuddha.m ahosi, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0423^ea^, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa ^a^T5.0531^ea^ pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m {abhisambuddho pacca~n~naasi.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}.

[03] ``yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catuusu ariyasaccesu eva.m tipariva.t.ta.m dvaadasaakaara.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nadassana.m suvisuddha.m ahosi, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti ^a^M3.0371^ea^ {cetovimutti (sii0 pii0)}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthidaani punabbhavo'''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! saadhu kho tva.m, bhikkhu, dhaaresi mayaa cattaari ^a^T5.0538^ea^ ariyasaccaani desitaaniiti. dukkha.m kho, bhikkhu, mayaa pa.thama.m ariyasacca.m desita.m, tathaa na.m dhaarehi. yo hi koci, bhikkhu, sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.m vadeyya -- `neta.m dukkha.m pa.thama.m ariyasacca.m ya.m sama.nena gotamena desita.m. ahameta.m dukkha.m pa.thama.m ariyasacca.m paccakkhaaya a~n~na.m dukkha.m pa.thama.m ariyasacca.m pa~n~napessaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. dukkhasamudaya.m kho, bhikkhu...pe0... dukkhanirodha.m kho, bhikkhu...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa kho, bhikkhu, mayaa catuttha.m ariyasacca.m desita.m, tathaa na.m dhaarehi. yo hi koci, bhikkhu, sama.no vaa ^a^V3.0492^ea^ braahma.no vaa eva.m vadeyya ^a^P5.0429^ea^ -- `neta.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa catuttha.m ariyasacca.m ya.m sama.nena gotamena desita.m ^a^M3.0376^ea^. ahameta.m dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m catuttha.m ariyasacca.m paccakkhaaya a~n~na.m dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m catuttha.m ariyasacca.m pa~n~napessaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. eva.m kho tva.m, bhikkhu, dhaarehi mayaa cattaari ariyasaccaani desitaaniiti.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhu, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 1087^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```avijjaa, avijjaa'ti bhante, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, bhante, avijjaa; kittaavataa ca avijjaagato hotii''ti? ``ya.m kho, bhikkhu, dukkhe a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya a~n~naa.na.m -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, avijjaa; ettaavataa ca ^a^T5.0539^ea^ avijjaagato hotii''ti.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhu, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V3.0493^ea^, bhikkhu, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 1089^b^.^eb^ ```ida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca'nti bhikkhave, mayaa pa~n~natta.m. tattha aparimaa.naa va.n.naa aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa aparimaa.naa sa"nkaasanaa -- `itipida.m dukkha.m ariyasacca'nti ^a^M3.0377^ea^; ida.m dukkhasamudaya.m...pe0... ida.m dukkhanirodha.m...pe0... `ida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca'nti, bhikkhave, mayaa pa~n~natta.m. tattha aparimaa.naa va.n.naa aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa aparimaa.naa sa"nkaasanaa -- `itipida.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca'nti.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. dasama.m.

[22] sa.msita.m {sa.msarita.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) dii0 ni0 2.155} diighamaddhaana.m, taasu taasveva jaatisu..

[22] ucchinna.m muula.m dukkhassa, natthidaani punabbhavo''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 1092^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^T5.0542^ea^ hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca panete aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa ^a^M3.0379^ea^ vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa, te ^a^P5.0433^ea^ ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --

[22] yattha ca sabbaso dukkha.m, asesa.m uparujjhati..

[27] cetovimuttihiinaa ^a^T5.0543^ea^ te, atho pa~n~naavimuttiyaa.
[22] abhabbaa te antakiriyaaya, te ve jaatijaruupagaa..
[21] ``ye ^a^V3.0496^ea^ ca dukkha.m pajaananti, atho dukkhassa sambhava.m.

[03] 1094^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambujjhi.msu, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m ^a^M3.0380^ea^ abhisambujjhi.msu. ye ^a^P5.0434^ea^ hi {yepi hi (bahuusu)} keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambujjhissanti, sabbe te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambujjhissanti. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi arahanto sammaasambuddhaa yathaabhuuta.m abhisambujjhanti, sabbe ^a^T5.0544^ea^ te cattaari ariyasaccaani yathaabhuuta.m abhisambujjhanti.

[03] 1098^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, ariyasaccaani. katamaani cattaari? dukkha.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m. sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya tathaagato ariyo; tasmaa `ariyasaccaanii'ti vuccanti''.

[03] 1100^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu cetesu {cetiyesu (syaa0)} viharanti saha~ncanike {sahajaniye (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaana.m theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m ma.n.dalamaa.le sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``yo nu kho, aavuso, dukkha.m passati dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipadampi passatii''ti.
