[22] mitta.m tathaa ca loko ca, pari~n~neyya.m gavampatiiti..

[03] 1101^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0548^ea^ ^a^M3.0383^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati siisapaavane {si.msapaavane (sii0 pii0)}. atha kho bhagavaa parittaani siisapaapa.n.naani paa.ninaa gahetvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m -- yaani vaa mayaa parittaani siisapaapa.n.naani paa.ninaa gahitaani yadida.m upari siisapaavane''ti? ``appamattakaani ^a^P5.0438^ea^, bhante, bhagavataa parittaani siisapaapa.n.naani paa.ninaa gahitaani; atha kho etaaneva bahutaraani yadida.m upari siisapaavane''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, etadeva bahutara.m ya.m vo mayaa abhi~n~naaya anakkhaata.m. kasmaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa anakkhaata.m? na heta.m, bhikkhave, atthasa.mhita.m naadibrahmacariyaka.m na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati; tasmaa ta.m mayaa anakkhaata.m''.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, mayaa akkhaata.m? `ida.m dukkha'nti, bhikkhave, mayaa akkhaata.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti mayaa akkhaata.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti mayaa akkhaata.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti mayaa akkhaata.m''.

[03] ``kasmaa ^a^V3.0501^ea^ ceta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa akkhaata.m? eta~nhi, bhikkhave, atthasa.mhita.m eta.m aadibrahmacariyaka.m eta.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati; tasmaa ta.m mayaa akkhaata.m ^a^T5.0549^ea^.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 1102^b^.^eb^ ``yo, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca, dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca, dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca, dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0384^ea^, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m khadirapattaana.m vaa saralapattaana.m {palaasapattaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa aamalakapattaana.m vaa pu.ta.m ^a^P5.0439^ea^ karitvaa udaka.m vaa taalapatta.m vaa aaharissaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo ca kho, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca, dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca, dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca, dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m padumapattaana.m vaa palaasapattaana.m vaa maaluvapattaana.m vaa pu.ta.m karitvaa udaka.m vaa taalapatta.m vaa aaharissaamii'ti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca ^a^V3.0502^ea^ ...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m ^a^T5.0550^ea^ pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 1103^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, da.n.do uparivehaasa.m khitto sakimpi muulena nipatati, sakimpi aggena nipatati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjaaniivara.naa sattaa ta.nhaasa.myojanaa sandhaavantaa sa.msarantaa {ta.nhaasa.myojanabandhaa sandhaavataa (ka0)} sakimpi asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m gacchanti, sakimpi parasmaa lokaa ima.m loka.m aagacchanti. ta.m kissa hetu? adi.t.thattaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa.
[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^P5.0440^ea^, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 1104^b^.^eb^ ``aaditte ^a^M3.0385^ea^, bhikkhave, cele vaa siise vaa kimassa kara.niiya''nti? ``aaditte, bhante, cele vaa siise vaa, tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya''nti.

[03] ``aaditta.m, bhikkhave, cela.m vaa siisa.m vaa ajjhupekkhitvaa amanasikaritvaa anabhisametaana.m catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamayaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ^a^V3.0503^ea^ ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ^a^T5.0551^ea^ ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 1105^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii. tamena.m eva.m vadeyya -- `ehambho purisa, pubba.nhasamaya.m ta.m sattisatena hanissanti, majjhanhikasamaya.m sattisatena hanissanti, saayanhasamaya.m sattisatena hanissanti. so kho tva.m, ambho purisa, divase divase tiihi tiihi sattisatehi ha~n~namaano vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii vassasatassa accayena anabhisametaani cattaari ariyasaccaani ^a^P5.0441^ea^ abhisamessasii'''ti.

[03] ``atthavasikena, bhikkhave, kulaputtena ala.m upagantu.m. ta.m kissa hetu? anamataggoya.m, bhikkhave, sa.msaaro; pubbaa ko.ti nappa~n~naayati sattippahaaraana.m asippahaaraana.m usuppahaaraana.m pharasuppahaaraana.m {asippahaaraana.m pharasuppahaaraana.m (ka0)}. eva~nceta.m, bhikkhave, assa. na kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, saha dukkhena, saha domanassena catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m abhisamaya.m vadaami; api caaha.m, bhikkhave, sahaava sukhena, sahaava somanassena catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m abhisamaya.m vadaami. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa.
[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^M3.0386^ea^, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 1106^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso ya.m imasmi.m jambudiipe ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m ^a^T5.0552^ea^ tacchetvaa ekajjha.m sa.mhareyya; ekajjha.m sa.mharitvaa suula.m kareyya. suula.m karitvaa ye mahaasamudde mahantakaa ^a^V3.0504^ea^ paa.naa te mahantakesu suulesu aavuneyya, ye mahaasamudde majjhimakaa paa.naa te majjhimakesu suulesu aavuneyya, ye mahaasamudde sukhumakaa paa.naa te sukhumakesu suulesu aavuneyya. apariyaadinnaa ca, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde o.laarikaa paa.naa assu.

[03] ``atha imasmi.m jambudiipe ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya. ito bahutaraa kho, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde sukhumakaa paa.naa, ye na sukaraa suulesu aavunitu.m. ta.m kissa hetu? sukhumattaa ^a^P5.0442^ea^, bhikkhave, attabhaavassa. eva.m mahaa kho, bhikkhave, apaayo. eva.m mahantasmaa kho, bhikkhave, apaayasmaa parimutto di.t.thisampanno puggalo `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 1107^b^.^eb^ ``suuriyassa {suriyassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, udayato eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- aru.nugga.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamayaaya eta.m pubba"ngama.m eta.m pubbanimitta.m, yadida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi. tasseta.m bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m -- `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanissati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanissati.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti ^a^T5.0553^ea^ yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 1108^b^.^eb^ ``yaavakiiva~nca ^a^M3.0387^ea^, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaa loke nuppajjanti, neva taava mahato aalokassa paatubhaavo hoti mahato obhaasassa. andhatama.m tadaa hoti andhakaaratimisaa ^a^V3.0505^ea^. neva taava rattindivaa {rattidivaa (ka0)} pa~n~naayanti, na maasaddhamaasaa pa~n~naayanti, na utusa.mvaccharaa pa~n~naayanti.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaa loke uppajjanti, atha mahato aalokassa paatubhaavo hoti mahato obhaasassa. neva ^a^P5.0443^ea^ andhakaaratama.m tadaa hoti na andhakaaratimisaa. atha rattindivaa pa~n~naayanti, maasaddhamaasaa pa~n~naayanti, utusa.mvaccharaa pa~n~naayanti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaavakiiva~nca tathaagato loke nuppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho, neva taava mahato aalokassa paatubhaavo hoti mahato obhaasassa. andhatama.m tadaa hoti andhakaaratimisaa. neva taava catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m aacikkha.naa hoti desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho, atha mahato aalokassa paatubhaavo hoti mahato obhaasassa. neva andhatama.m tadaa hoti na andhakaaratimisaa. atha kho catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m aacikkha.naa hoti desanaa pa~n~naapanaa pa.t.thapanaa vivara.naa vibhajanaa uttaaniikamma.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa ^a^T5.0554^ea^.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 1109^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, te a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa mukha.m ullokenti {olokenti (sii0 syaa0)} -- `aya.m nuuna bhava.m jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passatii'''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0388^ea^, bhikkhave, tuulapicu vaa kappaasapicu vaa lahuko vaatuupaadaano same bhuumibhaage ^a^V3.0506^ea^ nikkhitto. tamena.m puratthimo ^a^P5.0444^ea^ vaato pacchimena sa.mhareyya, pacchimo vaato puratthimena sa.mhareyya, uttaro vaato dakkhi.nena sa.mhareyya, dakkhi.no vaato uttarena sa.mhareyya. ta.m kissa hetu? lahukattaa, bhikkhave, kappaasapicuno. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, te a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa mukha.m ullokenti -- `aya.m nuuna bhava.m jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passatii'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? adi.t.thattaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te na a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa ^a^T5.0555^ea^ vaa mukha.m ullokenti -- `aya.m nuuna bhava.m jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passatii'''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ayokhiilo vaa indakhiilo vaa gambhiiranemo sunikhaato acalo asampakampii. puratthimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi, neva sa"nkampeyya {neva na.m sa"nkampeyya (sii0 pii0)} na sampakampeyya na sampacaaleyya; pacchimaaya cepi disaaya...pe0... uttaraaya cepi disaaya...pe0... dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi, neva sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacaaleyya. ta.m kissa hetu? gambhiirattaa, bhikkhave, nemassa sunikhaatattaa indakhiilassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye ca kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti...pe0... aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te na a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa mukha.m ullokenti -- `aya.m nuuna bhava.m jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passatii'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? sudi.t.thattaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ^a^P5.0445^ea^ ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 1110^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^V3.0507^ea^ ^a^M3.0389^ea^ hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, puratthimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa vaadatthiko ^a^T5.0556^ea^ vaadagavesii -- `vaadamassa aaropessaamii'ti, ta.m vata sahadhammena sa"nkampessati vaa sampakampessati vaa sampacaalessati vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. pacchimaaya cepi disaaya...pe0... uttaraaya cepi disaaya...pe0... dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa vaadatthiko vaadagavesii -- `vaadamassa aaropessaamii'ti, ta.m vata sahadhammena sa"nkampessati vaa sampakampessati vaa sampacaalessati vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, silaayuupo so.lasa kukkuko. tassassu a.t.tha kukku he.t.thaa nema"ngamaa, a.t.tha kukku uparinemassa. puratthimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi, neva sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacaaleyya; pacchimaaya cepi disaaya...pe0... uttaraaya cepi disaaya...pe0... dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi, neva sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacaaleyya. ta.m kissa hetu? gambhiirattaa, bhikkhave, nemassa sunikhaatattaa silaayuupassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo hi koci bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; puratthimaaya ^a^P5.0446^ea^ cepi disaaya aagaccheyya sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa vaadatthiko vaadagavesii `vaadamassa aaropessaamii'ti, ta.m vata sahadhammena sa"nkampessati vaa sampakampessati vaa sampacaalessati vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. pacchimaaya cepi disaaya...pe0... uttaraaya ^a^T5.0557^ea^ cepi disaaya...pe0... dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa vaadatthiko vaadagavesii -- `vaadamassa aaropessaamii'ti, ta.m vata sahadhammena sa"nkampessati vaa sampakampessati vaa sampacaalessati vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? sudi.t.thattaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa.
[01] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V3.0508^ea^, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. dasama.m.
[06] siisapaavanavaggo catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] siisapaa ^a^M3.0390^ea^ khadiro da.n.do, celaa sattisatena ca.
[22] paa.naa suriyuupamaa dvedhaa, indakhiilo ca vaadinoti..

[03] 1111^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0558^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro puriso raajagahaa nikkhamitvaa `lokacinta.m ^a^P5.0447^ea^ cintessaamii'ti yena sumaagadhaa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa sumaagadhaaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire nisiidi lokacinta.m cintento. addasaa kho, bhikkhave, so puriso sumaagadhaaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire catura"ngini.m sena.m {catura"nginisena.m (ka0)} bhisamu.laala.m {bhisamuulaala.m (pii0 ka0)} pavisanta.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- `ummattosmi naamaaha.m, vicetosmi naamaaha.m! ya.m loke natthi ta.m mayaa di.t.tha'''nti.

[03] ``atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso nagara.m pavisitvaa mahaajanakaayassa aarocesi -- `ummattosmi naamaaha.m, bhante, vicetosmi naamaaha.m, bhante! ya.m loke natthi ta.m mayaa di.t.tha'''nti. ``katha.m pana tva.m, ambho purisa, ummatto katha.m viceto? ki~nca loke natthi ya.m tayaa di.t.tha''nti? ``idhaaha.m, bhante, raajagahaa nikkhamitvaa `lokacinta.m cintessaamii'ti yena sumaagadhaa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa sumaagadhaaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire nisiidi.m lokacinta.m cintento. addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhante, sumaagadhaaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire catura"ngini.m sena.m bhisamu.laala.m ^a^V3.0509^ea^ pavisanta.m. eva.m khvaaha.m, bhante, ummatto eva.m viceto. ida~nca loke natthi ya.m mayaa ^a^T5.0559^ea^ di.t.tha''nti. ``taggha tva.m, ambho purisa, ummatto taggha viceto. ida~nca loke natthi ya.m tayaa di.t.tha''nti.

[03] ``ta.m kho pana, bhikkhave, so puriso bhuuta.myeva addasa, no abhuuta.m. bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho ahosi. tasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sa"ngaame devaa jini.msu, asuraa paraajini.msu. paraajitaa ^a^M3.0391^ea^ ca ^a^P5.0448^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, asuraa bhiitaa bhisamu.laalena asurapura.m pavisi.msu devaana.myeva mohayamaanaa.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, maa lokacinta.m cintetha -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato loko'ti vaa, `antavaa loko'ti vaa `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa. ta.m kissa hetu? nesaa, bhikkhave, cintaa atthasa.mhitaa naadibrahmacariyakaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``cintentaa kho tumhe, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti cinteyyaatha...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti cinteyyaatha. ta.m kissa hetu? esaa, bhikkhave, cintaa atthasa.mhitaa esaa aadibrahmacariyakaa esaa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya ^a^T5.0560^ea^ sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 1112^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu ^a^V3.0510^ea^ aamantesi -- ``aayaama, bhikkhave, yena pa.tibhaanakuu.to tenupasa"nkamissaama divaavihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. atha ^a^P5.0449^ea^ kho bhagavaa sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m yena pa.tibhaanakuu.to tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu pa.tibhaanakuu.te mahanta.m papaata.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mahaa vataaya.m, bhante, papaato subhayaanako, bhante, papaato. atthi nu kho, bhante, imamhaa papaataa a~n~no papaato mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti? ``atthi kho, bhikkhu, imamhaa papaataa a~n~no papaato mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M3.0392^ea^ pana, bhante, imamhaa papaataa a~n~no papaato mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti? ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhiramanti, jaraasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhiramanti ^a^T5.0561^ea^, mara.nasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhiramanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhiramanti. te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhirataa jaraasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhirataa mara.nasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhirataa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhirataa jaatisa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharonti, jaraasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharonti, mara.nasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharonti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharonti. te jaatisa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharitvaa jaraasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharitvaa mara.nasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharitvaa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare abhisa"nkharitvaa jaatipapaatampi papatanti, jaraapapaatampi papatanti, mara.napapaatampi papatanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasapapaatampi ^a^P5.0450^ea^ papatanti. te na parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `na parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu naabhiramanti, jaraasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu naabhiramanti, mara.nasa.mvattanikesu ^a^V3.0511^ea^ sa"nkhaaresu naabhiramanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikesu ^a^T5.0562^ea^ sa"nkhaaresu naabhiramanti. te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu anabhirataa, jaraasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu anabhirataa, mara.nasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu anabhirataa, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu anabhirataa, jaatisa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare naabhisa"nkharonti, jaraasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare naabhisa"nkharonti, mara.nasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare naabhisa"nkharonti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikepi ^a^M3.0393^ea^ sa"nkhaare naabhisa"nkharonti. te jaatisa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare anabhisa"nkharitvaa, jaraasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare anabhisa"nkharitvaa, mara.nasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare anabhisa"nkharitvaa, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasasa.mvattanikepi sa"nkhaare anabhisa"nkharitvaa, jaatipapaatampi nappapatanti, jaraapapaatampi nappapatanti, mara.napapaatampi nappapatanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasapapaatampi nappapatanti. te parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 1113^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, mahaapari.laaho naama nirayo. tattha ya.m ki~nci cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, ani.t.tharuupa~n~neva passati ^a^P5.0451^ea^ no i.t.tharuupa.m; akantaruupa~n~neva passati no kantaruupa.m; amanaaparuupa~n~neva passati no manaaparuupa.m. ya.m ki~nci sotena sadda.m su.naati...pe0... ya.m ^a^T5.0563^ea^ ki~nci kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusati...pe0... ya.m ki~nci manasaa dhamma.m vijaanaati, ani.t.tharuupa~n~neva vijaanaati no i.t.tharuupa.m; akantaruupa~n~neva vijaanaati no kantaruupa.m; amanaaparuupa~n~neva vijaanaati no manaaparuupa''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mahaa vata so, bhante, pari.laaho, sumahaa vata so, bhante, pari.laaho! atthi nu kho, bhante, etamhaa pari.laahaa a~n~no pari.laaho ^a^V3.0512^ea^ mahantataro ceva bhayaanakataro caa''ti? ``atthi kho, bhikkhu, etamhaa pari.laahaa a~n~no pari.laaho mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana, bhante, etamhaa pari.laahaa a~n~no pari.laaho mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti? ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhiramanti...pe0... abhirataa...pe0... abhisa"nkharonti...pe0... abhisa"nkharitvaa jaatipari.laahenapi pari.dayhanti, jaraapari.laahenapi pari.dayhanti, mara.napari.laahenapi pari.dayhanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasapari.laahenapi pari.dayhanti ^a^M3.0394^ea^. te na parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `na parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti ^a^T5.0564^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti. te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu naabhiramanti...pe0... anabhirataa...pe0... naabhisa"nkharonti...pe0... anabhisa"nkharitvaa jaatipari.laahenapi na pari.dayhanti, jaraapari.laahenapi na pari.dayhanti, mara.napari.laahenapi na pari.dayhanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasapari.laahenapi na pari.dayhanti. te parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya ^a^P5.0452^ea^ mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 1114^b^.^eb^ ``yo hi, bhikkhave {yo ca kho bhikkhave (syaa0 ka0)}, eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0513^ea^, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m kuu.taagaarassa he.t.thima.m ghara.m akaritvaa uparima.m ghara.m aaropessaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m anabhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo ca kho, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m kuu.taagaarassa he.t.thima.m ghara.m ^a^T5.0565^ea^ karitvaa uparima.m ghara.m aaropessaamii'ti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati; evameva kho ^a^M3.0395^ea^, bhikkhave, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m yathaabhuuta.m abhisamecca sammaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamii'ti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.
[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^P5.0453^ea^, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 1115^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando sambahule licchavikumaarake santhaagaare upaasana.m karonte, duuratova sukhumena taa.lacchigga.lena asana.m atipaatente, po"nkhaanupo"nkha.m {pokhaanupokha.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} aviraadhita.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``sikkhitaa vatime licchavikumaarakaa, susikkhitaa vatime licchavikumaarakaa; yatra hi naama duuratova sukhumena taa.lacchigga.lena asana.m atipaatessanti po"nkhaanupo"nkha.m aviraadhita''nti.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0514^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando vesaali.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m ^a^T5.0566^ea^. addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhante sambahule licchavikumaarake santhaagaare upaasana.m karonte duuratova sukhumena taa.lacchigga.lena asana.m atipaatente po"nkhaanupo"nkha.m aviraadhita.m'. disvaana me etadahosi -- ``sikkhitaa vatime licchavikumaarakaa, susikkhitaa vatime licchavikumaarakaa; yatra hi naama duuratova sukhumena taa.lacchigga.lena asana.m atipaatessanti po"nkhaanupo"nkha.m aviraadhita''nti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^P5.0454^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, aananda, katama.m nu kho dukkaratara.m vaa durabhisambhavatara.m vaa -- yo duuratova sukhumena taa.lacchigga.lena asana.m atipaateyya po"nkhaanupo"nkha.m aviraadhita.m, yo vaa sattadhaa bhinnassa vaalassa ko.tiyaa ko.ti.m pa.tivijjheyyaa''ti? ``etadeva, bhante, dukkaratara~nceva durabhisambhavatara~nca yo ^a^M3.0396^ea^ vaa {yo (sii0)} sattadhaa bhinnassa vaalassa ko.tiyaa ko.ti.m pa.tivijjheyyaa''ti. ``atha kho {atha kho te (syaa0 ka.m0)}, aananda, duppa.tivijjhatara.m pa.tivijjhanti, ye `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pa.tivijjhanti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pa.tivijjhanti''.
[03] ``tasmaatihaananda, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 1116^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa, yatthamimesa.m candimasuuriyaana.m eva.mmahiddhikaana.m eva.m mahaanubhaavaana.m aabhaaya naanubhontii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mahaa vata so, bhante, andhakaaro, sumahaa vata so, bhante, andhakaaro! atthi ^a^T5.0567^ea^ nu kho, bhante, etamhaa andhakaaraa a~n~no ^a^V3.0515^ea^ andhakaaro mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti? ``atthi kho, bhikkhu, etamhaa andhakaaraa a~n~no andhakaaro mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana, bhante, etamhaa andhakaaraa a~n~no andhakaaro mahantataro ca bhayaanakataro caa''ti? ``ye hi keci, bhikkhu, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii ^a^P5.0455^ea^ pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu abhiramanti...pe0... abhirataa...pe0... abhisa"nkharonti...pe0... abhisa"nkharitvaa jaatandhakaarampi papatanti, jarandhakaarampi papatanti, mara.nandhakaarampi papatanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasandhakaarampi papatanti. te na parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `na parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhu, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te jaatisa.mvattanikesu sa"nkhaaresu naabhiramanti...pe0... anabhirataa...pe0... naabhisa"nkharonti...pe0... anabhisa"nkharitvaa jaatandhakaarampi nappapatanti ^a^M3.0397^ea^, jarandhakaarampi nappapatanti, mara.nandhakaarampi nappapatanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasandhakaarampi nappapatanti. te parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi ^a^T5.0568^ea^ dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi. `parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami''.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 1117^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso mahaasamudde ekacchigga.la.m yuga.m pakkhipeyya. tatraapissa kaa.no kacchapo. so vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena saki.m saki.m ummujjeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu kho kaa.no kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa ^a^V3.0516^ea^ accayena saki.m saki.m ummujjanto amusmi.m ekacchigga.le yuge giiva.m paveseyyaa''ti? ``yadi ^a^P5.0456^ea^ nuuna, bhante, kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayenaa''ti.

[03] ``khippatara.m kho so, bhikkhave, kaa.no kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena saki.m saki.m ummujjanto amusmi.m ekacchigga.le yuge giiva.m paveseyya, na tvevaaha.m, bhikkhave, saki.m vinipaatagatena baalena {viniitagatena bahulena (ka0)} manussatta.m vadaami''.

[03] ta.m kissa hetu? na hettha, bhikkhave, atthi dhammacariyaa, samacariyaa, kusalakiriyaa, pu~n~nakiriyaa. a~n~nama~n~nakhaadikaa ettha, bhikkhave, vattati dubbalakhaadikaa. ta.m kissa hetu? adi.t.thattaa, bhikkhave, catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m. katamesa.m catunna.m? dukkhassa ariyasaccassa...pe0... dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasaccassa.
[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ida.m dukkha'nti yogo kara.niiyo...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yogo kara.niiyo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 1118^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0398^ea^, bhikkhave, aya.m mahaapathavii ekodakaa assa. tatra ^a^T5.0569^ea^ puriso ekacchigga.la.m yuga.m pakkhipeyya. tamena.m puratthimo vaato pacchimena sa.mhareyya, pacchimo vaato puratthimena sa.mhareyya, uttaro vaato dakkhi.nena sa.mhareyya, dakkhi.no vaato uttarena sa.mhareyya. tatrassa kaa.no kacchapo. so vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena saki.m saki.m ummujjeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu kho kaa.no kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena saki.m saki.m ummujjanto ^a^P5.0457^ea^ amusmi.m ekacchigga.le yuge giiva.m paveseyyaa''ti? ``adhiccamida.m, bhante, ya.m so kaa.no kacchapo vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena saki.m saki.m ummujjanto amusmi.m ekacchigga.le yuge giiva.m paveseyyaa''ti.

[03] ``eva.m adhiccamida.m, bhikkhave, ya.m manussatta.m labhati. eva.m adhiccamida.m, bhikkhave, ya.m tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho. eva.m adhiccamida.m, bhikkhave, ya.m tathaagatappavedito ^a^V3.0517^ea^ dhammavinayo loke dibbati. tassida.m {tayida.m (?)}, bhikkhave, manussatta.m laddha.m, tathaagato loke uppanno araha.m sammaasambuddho, tathaagatappavedito ca dhammavinayo loke dibbati.

[03] 1119^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso sinerussa pabbataraajassa satta muggamattiyo paasaa.nasakkharaa upanikkhipeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0570^ea^, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m -- yaa vaa {yaa ca} satta muggamattiyo paasaa.nasakkharaa upanikkhittaa, yo vaa {yo ca (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) sa.m0 ni0 2.84} sinerupabbataraajaa''ti? ``etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m, yadida.m -- sinerupabbataraajaa; appamattikaa satta muggamattiyo paasaa.nasakkharaa upanikkhittaa. sa"nkhampi na upenti, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhaagampi na upenti sinerupabbataraajaana.m upanidhaaya satta muggamattiyo paasaa.nasakkharaa upanikkhittaa''ti. ``evameva ^a^P5.0458^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa ^a^M3.0399^ea^ abhisametaavino etadeva bahutara.m dukkha.m yadida.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadinna.m; appamattaka.m avasi.t.tha.m. sa"nkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhaagampi na upeti, purima.m dukkhakkhandha.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadinna.m upanidhaaya yadida.m sattakkhattuparamataa; yo `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati''.

[03] 1121^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T5.0572^ea^ ^a^M3.0400^ea^ kho bhagavaa paritta.m nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu.m aaropetvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m -- yo vaaya.m mayaa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito, aya.m vaa mahaapathavii''ti? ``etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m yadida.m -- mahaapathavii; appamattakaaya.m bhagavataa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito. sa"nkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na ^a^V3.0519^ea^ upeti, kalabhaagampi na upeti mahaapathavi.m upanidhaaya bhagavataa paritto nakhasikhaaya.m pa.msu aaropito''ti. ``evameva ^a^P5.0460^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa abhisametaavino etadeva bahutara.m dukkha.m yadida.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadinna.m; appamattaka.m avasi.t.tha.m. sa"nkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhaagampi na upeti purima.m dukkhakkhandha.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadinna.m upanidhaaya yadida.m sattakkhattuparamataa; yo `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati''.

[03] 1122^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, pokkhara.nii pa~n~naasayojanaani aayaamena, pa~n~naasayojanaani vitthaarena, pa~n~naasayojanaani ubbedhena, pu.n.naa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. tato puriso kusaggena ^a^T5.0573^ea^ udaka.m uddhareyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m -- ya.m vaa kusaggena ubbhata.m, ya.m vaa pokkhara.niyaa udaka''nti? ``etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m, yadida.m -- pokkhara.niyaa udaka.m; appamattaka.m kusaggena udaka.m ubbhata.m. sa"nkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhaagampi na upeti pokkhara.niyaa udaka.m upanidhaaya kusaggena udaka.m ubbhata''nti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa...pe0... yogo kara.niiyo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 1123^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0401^ea^, bhikkhave, yatthimaa mahaanadiyo sa.msandanti samenti, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa, yamunaa, aciravatii, sarabhuu, mahii, tato puriso dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani uddhareyya. ta.m ^a^P5.0461^ea^ ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave katama.m nu kho bahutara.m -- yaani dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani ubbhataani, ya.m vaa sa.mbhejjaudaka''nti? ``etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m, yadida.m -- sa.mbhejjaudaka.m; appamattakaani dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani ubbhataani. sa"nkhampi na upenti ^a^V3.0520^ea^, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhaagampi na upenti sa.mbhejjaudaka.m upanidhaaya dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani ubbhataanii''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa...pe0... yogo kara.niiyo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 1124^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yatthimaa mahaanadiyo sa.msandanti samenti, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa, yamunaa, aciravatii, sarabhuu, mahii, ta.m udaka.m parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya, .thapetvaa dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani ^a^T5.0574^ea^. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, katama.m nu kho bahutara.m -- ya.m vaa sa.mbhejjaudaka.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadinna.m, yaani dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani avasi.t.thaanii''ti? ``etadeva, bhante, bahutara.m sa.mbhejjaudaka.m yadida.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadinna.m; appamattakaani dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani avasi.t.thaani. sa"nkhampi na upenti, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhaagampi na upenti sa.mbhejjaudaka.m parikkhii.na.m pariyaadinna.m upanidhaaya dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani avasi.t.thaanii''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa...pe0... yogo kara.niiyo''ti. catuttha.m.
